In rural as in urban areas teenagers are bored.
Zài xiāngcūn yǔ zài chéngshì lǐ yíyàng，qīngshàonián zǒngshì hěn wúliáo。
在乡村与在城市里一样，青少年总是很无聊。
In rural as in urban areas teenagers are bored.
Zài xiāngcūn yǔ zài chéngshì lǐ yíyàng，qīngshàonián zǒngshì hěn wúliáo。
在乡村与在城市里一样，青少年总是很无聊。
晚饭后咱们聊聊。
Wǎnfàn hòu zánmen liáolǐao。
Let\'s have a chat after supper.
陪他聊聊，别冷落了他。
Péi tā liáoliáo，bié lěngluòle tā.
Why don\'t you go chat to him – you shouldn\'t be leaving him out.
我们经常聚在一起聊聊。
Wǒmen jīngcháng jùzài yìqǐ liáoliáo.
We often get together for a chat.
百无聊赖时我就随手抓过一本书来，强迫自己看下去。
Bǎiwúliáolài shí wǒ jiù suíshǒu zhuāguò yìběnshū lái，qiǎngpò zìjǐ kànxiàqù。
In times of sheer boredom I would pick up a book and force myself to read.
聊博一笑
liáobóyíxiào 
just for your entertainment
聊表寸心
liáo biǎo cùnxīn 
as a small token of my feelings; just to show my appreciation
两人蹲下就聊起来了。
Liǎng rén dūnxià jiù liáo qǐlái le。
Squatting down, the two of them started to have a chat.
孩子们玩飞盘，大人聊天。
Háizimen wán fēipán，dàrén liáotiān。
Kids flip frisbees while their elders chat.
海阔天空地聊个没完
hǎikuòtiānkōng de liáo gè méiwán
have a rambling chat about everything under the sun
《聊斋志异》所记鬼怪故事诚属荒诞不经，然而却能引人入胜，多年来为无数读者所喜爱。
《Liáozhāi ZhìYì》suǒ jì guǐguàigùshì chéngshǔ huāngdànbùjīng，rán\'ér quènéng yǐnrénrùshèng，duōniánlái wéi wúshù dúzhě suǒxǐ\'ài。
Though admittedly wild and fanciful, the ghost stories of the Liao Zhai Zhi Yi have a beauty that has captivated countless readers over the years.
聊表谢意
liáo biǎo xièyì 
just a token of gratitude; just to show my appreciation
你们在聊些什么？
Nǐmen zài liáo xiē shénme?

Wǒmen liáo le bàntiān tiānr。
We chatted for a long time.

Jūnfá hùnzhàn，mínbùliáoshēng。
Incessant fighting among the warlords made life impossible for the people.

Tā xián de wúliáo，zhǐhǎo qù kàn chǎngdiànyǐngpáiqiǎn páiqiǎn。
As time lay heavily on his hands, he went to the cinema to divert himself.
他俩已聊上天了。
Tāliǎ yǐ liáoshàngtiān le。
The two of them are having a good chat.
他俩只要一见面，就天南海北地神聊起来。
Tā liǎ zhǐyào yí jiànmiàn，jiù tiānnán hǎiběi de shénliáo qǐlai。
Whenever they met, they would start chattering away about everything under the sun.
读这种无聊的东西非但无益，而且有害。
Dú zhèzhǒng wúliáo de dōngxi fēidàn wúyì，érqiě yǒu hài。
Reading that trash is not only unprofitable but harmful.
没事也不能整天地瞎聊啊。
Méi shì yě bùnéng zhěngtiān de xiāliáo a。

她俩正在院子里闲聊呢。
Tā liǎ zhèngzài yuànzi lǐ xiánliáo ne。

她看中了一件漂亮衣服，可是囊中羞涩，所以没有买。

Zhège xiǎoháir，fēitú piàoliang，érqiě cōngming！
This child is not only handsome but also very smart.
这个漂亮的女明星，经常有绯闻。
Zhège piàoliang de nǚmíngxīng，jīngcháng yǒu fēiwén。
This pretty actress has had many sex scandals.
水上浮漂着一些花瓣。
Shuǐ shàng fúpiāo zhe yìxiē huābàn。
There are many petals floating on the surface of the water.
年轻人做事难免浮漂。
Niánqīngrén zuòshì nánmiǎn fúpiāo。
It\'s inevitable that young people will be careless.
她不仅长得漂亮而且身材高挑。
Tā bùjǐn zhǎng de piàoliàng érqiě shēncái gāotiǎo。
She is not only attractive but also tall and thin.
我们一定要把握好时机，打场漂亮的攻歼战。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎwò hǎo shíjī，dǎ chǎng piàoliàng de gōngjiānzhàn。
We must take this good opportunity to fight an excellent eradication battle.
她瓜子儿脸，高个头，是个挺漂亮的姑娘。
Tā guāzǐr liǎn，gāo gètóu，shì gè tǐng piàoliàng de gūniang。
She has an oval face and is very tall, which makes her a beautiful girl.
她很漂亮，皓齿明眸。
Tā hěnpiàoliàng，hàochǐ míngmóu。
She is very beautiful, having clear bright eyes and gleaming teeth.
不花钱还想穿漂亮衣服，门都没有！
Bùhuāqián hái xiǎng chuān piàoliàng yīfu，mén dōu méiyǒu！
There is no way for you to wear beautiful clothes without spending money.
她总是觉得自己不够漂亮，于是在医院做了换容术。
Tā zǒngshì juédé zìjǐ búgòu piàoliàng，yúshì zài yīyuàn zuò le huànróngshù。
She alwasys feels she isn\'t beautiful enough, so she has had plastic surgery at hospital.
他的浑家长得真是漂亮妖娆风情万种。
Tā de húnjiā zhǎng de zhēnshì piàoliàng yāoráo fēngqíng wànzhǒng。
His wife is beautiful and enchanting.
看着机窗外面一朵朵的云彩，我们像在云的世界里，好漂亮。
Kàn zhe jīchuāng wàimiàn yìduǒduǒ de yúncǎi，wǒmen xiàng zài yún de shìjiè lǐ，hǎo piàoliàng。
Looking at the clouds outside the plane window, I felt like I was living in a beautiful world of clouds.
她的帽子上有个很漂亮的蝴蝶结子。
Tā de màozi shàng yǒu gè hěnpiàoliàng de húdiéjiézi。
There is a pretty bowknot on her hat.
妈妈有一件淡蓝色的绢绸旗袍，特别漂亮！
Māma yǒu yíjiàn dànlánsè de juànchóu qípáo，tèbié piàoliàng！
Mother has a light blue silk cheongsam, it is very beautiful.
开衫配长裙，她这身打扮可真漂亮。
Kāishān pèi chángqún，tā zhè shēn dǎbàn kě zhēn piàoliàng。
She dressed in a sweater together with a long skirt, and looked very pretty.
他绘制的蛋壳彩画，精致漂亮，堪称一绝！
Tā huìzhì de dànké cǎihuà，jīngzhì piàoliàng，kānchēng yìjué！
The eggs he decorated with colored drawings are really exquisite and beautiful. They can be called unique.
她那么聪明漂亮，是他心中的可人儿！
Tā nàme cōngmíng piàoliàng，shì tā xīn zhōng de kěrénr！
She is so beautiful and smart, she\'s exactly as he likes.

The mare gave birth to another pretty colt this spring.
这条裤裙很漂亮，远看就像裙子一样。

The culottes are very beautiful and look like a skirt at a distance.
这些盔头的样式颜色都不一样，都很漂亮。

她新买的小皮包真是漂亮！
Tā xīnmǎi de xiǎopíbāo zhēnshì piàoliàng！
The little leather bag she just bought is really pretty.

A young and beautiful actress, she is very popular.

The beautiful scenery here is as gorgeous as an imperial garden.
莲座上的莲花还带着水珠，看着清新漂亮。

他新剪的刘海儿很漂亮。
Tā xīnjiǎn de liúhǎir hěnpiàoliàng。
His new fringe is quite good looking.

It is turning warm; many ice-floes are floating on the lake.
看他那隆准，就知道他长大后准漂亮。

这小姑娘长得虽然不是特别漂亮，但是很耐看。

她看中了一件漂亮衣服，可是囊中羞涩，所以没有买。

画儿上那个古装的小娘子可真漂亮。

那些水草都随着水波四处地漂荡。

她不像年轻时那样漂亮了，真是人老珠黄啊。

The running water has a peculiar smell, it has too much bleaching powder in it.

漂流
piāoliú
drift
你的迷你裙真漂亮。
Nǐ de mínǐqún zhēn piàoliang.
Your mini-skirt is really lovely.

你女儿真漂亮。
Nǐ nǚ\'ér zhēn piàoliang.
Your daughter is very pretty.
这场球踢得漂亮。
Zhè chǎng qiú tī de piàoliang.

这本小说很好，美中不足的是结尾太冗长了。
Zhèběn xiǎoshuō hěn hǎo，měi zhōng bùzú de shì jiéwěi tài rǒngcháng le。
This is a good novel, except for the long and tedious ending.
信的末尾
xìn de mòwěi
at the end of the letter
排队排在末尾
páiduì páizài mòwěi
stand at the end of a queue
牛尾汤
niúwěitāng
oxtail soup
阑尾脓肿
lánwěi nóngzhǒng
appendicular abscess
本书每篇各有头尾，自成起讫。
Běnshū měipiān gèyǒu tóuwěi，zìchéngqǐqì。
Each chapter is complete in itself, having beginning and end.
这把芹菜掐头去尾剩下不多了。
Zhèbǎ qíncài qiātóuqùwěi shèngxià bùduō le。
With both ends chopped off, there\'s not much left of this bunch of celery.
引用他这段话不能掐头去尾。
Yǐnyòngtā zhè duàn huà bùnéng qiātóuqùwěi。
If you quote a passage from him, you should quote it in full, not leave out the beginning and the end.
别一有成绩就翘尾巴。
Bié yì yǒu chéngjì jiù qiàowěibā。
Don\'t get cocky when you\'ve achieved something.
街头巷尾人们三五成群，议论纷纷。
Jiētóu xiàng wěi rénmen sānwǔchéngqún，yìlùn fēnfēn。
People were seen standing about in knots on street corners, talking and arguing.
扫尾工作
sǎowěi gōngzuò
rounding-off work
事情不多了，马上就可以煞尾。
Shìqíngbùduō le，mǎshàngjiù kěyǐ shāwěi。
There isn\'t much work left; we\'re winding up.
这出戏的煞尾很带劲。
Zhè chū xì de shāwěi hěn dàijìn。
The play has a powerful ending.
我们正在做收尾工作。
Wǒmen zhèngzài zuò shōuwěi gōngzuò。
We are winding up the job.
这个剧本收尾太没劲。
Zhège jùběn shōuwěi tài méi jìn。
The ending of the play is rather too tame.
首尾不能相顾。
Shǒuwěi bùnéng xiānggù。
The vanguard is cut off from the rear.
我对这个问题的看法是首尾一贯的。
Wǒ duì zhège wèntí de kànfǎ shì shǒuwěiyíguàn de。
I have always been consistent in my views on this subject.
甩掉尾巴
shuǎidiào wěiba
throw off a pursuer; throw off a tail
这篇文章的结尾显得有点秃。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi xiǎnde yǒudiǎn tū。
This article seems to end rather lamely.
问题要彻底解决，不要拖个尾巴。
Wèntí yào chèdǐ jiějué，búyào tuō gè wěiba。
The problem must be solved once for all, without leaving any loose ends.
两尾鱼
liǎngwěi yú 
two fish
夹起尾巴逃跑
jiāqǐ wěiba táopǎo 
run away with one\'s tail between one\'s legs
夹着尾巴做人
jiā zhe wěiba zuò rén 
tuck one\'s tail between one\'s legs; pull (or draw) one\'s horns in
彗星尾巴
huìxīngwěiba 
the tail of a comet
你为什么老做别人的尾巴，难道自己一点主见也没有？
Nǐ wèishénme lǎo zuò biérén de wěiba，nándào zìjǐ yìdiǎn zhǔjiàn yě méiyǒu? 
Why are you always tailing behind others? Don\'t you have any ideas of your own?
序幕和尾声
xùmù hé wěishēng
prologue and epilogue
会谈已接近尾声。
Huìtán yǐ jiējìn wěishēng。
The talks are drawing to an end.
孩子们尾随着巡回演出队走了好远。
Háizimen wěisuí zhe xúnhuí yǎnchūduì zǒu le hǎo yuǎn。
The kids followed the mobile cultural troupe for quite a distance.
小狗摇着尾巴跑了。
Xiǎogǒu yáo zhe wěiba pǎo le。
The little dog ran off wagging its tail.
长尾鹦鹉
chángwěi yīngwǔ 
parakeet
他太激动了，没法把自己的事有头有尾地讲给大家听。
Tā tài jīdòng le，méifǎ bǎ zìjǐ de shì yǒutóuyǒuwěi de jiǎnggěi dàjiā tīng。
He was too excited to tell them his story from beginning to end.
她的眼角已有几道明显的鱼尾纹。
Tā de yǎnjiǎo yǐ yǒu jǐ dào míngxiǎn de yúwěiwén。
At the corners of her eyes the crow\'s feet are quite noticeable.
机尾
jīwěi
tail (of an aircraft)
排尾
páiwěi
the last person in a row, procession or formation; the person at the end of a row, etc.
扫尾
sǎowěi
wind up; round off
尾蚴
wěiyòu
cercaria
他在半决赛中居榜尾。
Tā zài bànjuésài zhōng jū bǎngwěi。
He came last in the semi-final.
很多老房子都配有鸱尾，很好看。
Hěnduō lǎofángzi dōu pèiyǒu chīwěi，hěnhǎo kàn。
Many old houses have really beautiful ceramic decorations shaped like owl\'s tails.
回复函的末尾一般都写上“此复”二字。
Huífùhán de mòwěi yìbān dōu xiě shàng“cǐfù”èr zì。
&quot;In response&quot; is usually written at the end of a letter in reply.
字据的末尾一般都写上“此据”二字。
Zìjù de mòwěi yìbān dōu xiě shàng“cǐjù”èr zì。
&quot;This is evidence&quot; is usually put at the end of a written pledge.
入党申请书的末尾要写上“此致敬礼”。
Rùdǎng shēnqǐngshū de mòwěi yào xiě shàng“cǐzhì jìnglǐ”。
&quot;With best regards&quot; should be put at the end of an application to join the Communist Party.
你从头到尾把事情说清楚，不要着急。
Nǐ cóng tóu dào wěi bǎ shìqing shuō qīngchu，búyào zháojí。
Talk through this matter from beginning to end, don\'t be in a hurry.
在信的末尾，他写上了“特意奉达”。
Zài xìn de mòwěi，tā xiěshàng le“tèyì fèngdá”。
He added &quot;with best wishes&quot; at the end of his letter.
在这封信的结尾她画了一个大大的感叹号。
Zài zhèfēngxìn de jiéwěi tā huà le yígè dàdà de gǎntànhào。
She added a big exclamation mark at the end of this letter.
舵手把钢缆系在了船尾处。
Duòshǒu bǎ gānglǎn jìzài le chuánwěichù。
The cox tied the steel rope to the end of the boat.
前面的人太多，我站在后尾儿根本就看不见前头。
Qiánmiàn de rén tài duō，wǒ zhànzài hòuwěir gēnběn jiù kànbújiàn qiántóu。
There were too many people in front of me, so I could hardly see the front.
每个句子在结尾的地方都要画句号。
Měigè jùzi zài jiéwěi de dìfāng dōuyào huà jùhào。
Every sentence should have a full stop on the end.
简言之，这篇文章的结尾一定要写的感人。
Jiǎnyánzhī，zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi yídìng yào xiě de gǎnrén。
In short, the ending of this essay should be as impressive as possible.
他做事一贯是雷声大雨点小，有头没尾的。
Tā zuòshì yíguàn shì léishēng dà yǔdiǎn xiǎo，yǒutóu méiwěi de。
He is always a person of much cry and little wool. Everything he does always ends in nothing.
女孩子梳一个马尾辫，看着活泼可爱。
Nǚháizi shū yígè mǎwěibiàn，kàn zhe huópō kě\'ài。
The girl with a ponytail looks lively and lovely.
她家的小狗染上了囊尾虫病，只好带它去看兽医。
Tā jiā de xiǎogǒu rǎnshàng le nángwěichóngbìng，zhǐhǎo dài tā qù kàn shòuyī。
Her dog was infested cysticercus. She has to take it to see a veterinarian.
临近年尾时单位里最忙，大家天天加班。
Línjìn niánwěi shí dānwèi lǐ zuì máng，dàjiā tiāntiān jiābān。
At the end of the year, our company has a lot of work to do so we work overtime every day.

Qìchē páichū de wěiqì hányǒu hěnduō yǒuhài wùzhì。
Vehicle exhaust contains a lot of damaging materials.
骄傲的大公鸡翘棱着它的尾巴。
Jiāoào de dàgōngjī qiàoléng zhe tā de wěiba。
The proud cock is raising its tail.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.
他写的作文首尾相应、结构很严谨。
Tā xiě de zuòwén shǒuwěi xiāngyìng、jiégòu hěnyánjǐn。
The end of his composition echoes the beginning, the organization is well-knit.
她巧妙地甩脱了尾随她的小流氓，然后报了警。
Tā qiǎomiào de shuǎituō le wěisuítā de xiǎoliúmáng，ránhòu bào le jǐng。
She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
今年的岁尾天气特别冷。
Jīnnián de suìwěi tiānqì tèbié lěng。
It is extremely cold at the end of every year.
感叹句的结尾应该使用叹号。
Gǎntànjù de jiéwěi yīnggāi shǐyòng tànhào。
An exclamatory sentence should be followed by an exclamation mark.
经他一说我才知道，原来天南星就是虎尾草呀。
Jīng tā yìshuō wǒ cái zhīdào，yuánlái tiānnánxīng jiùshì hǔwěicǎo ya。
He helped me get to know a plant called araceae.
列车的头尾车厢都设有餐厅，欢迎旅客光顾。
Lièchē de tóuwěi chēxiāng dōu shèyǒu cāntīng，huānyíng lǚkè guānggù。
There are canteens in both the first carriage and the last carriage of the train. Travelers are welcome!
头尾四年的大学教育，使我受益不少。
Tóuwěi sì nián de dàxué jiàoyù，shǐ wǒ shòuyì bùshǎo。
Four years\' total education in the university has benefited me greatly.
你们要抓紧时间完成那个尾巴工程！
Nǐmen yào zhuājǐn shíjiān wánchéng nàge wěiba gōngchéng！
Hurry up to finish that protracted project!
与开头比起来，这篇文章的尾部写得更加精彩。
Yǔ kāitóu bǐqǐlái，zhèpiān wénzhāng de wěibùxiě de gèngjiā jīngcǎi。
The ending of this article outshines the beginning.
出版社请知名画家为这篇文章配画尾花。
Chūbǎnshè qǐng zhīmíng huàjiā wèi zhèpiān wénzhāng pèihuà wěihuā。
The publisher has invited a famous painter to paint an ornamental flower for this article.

Jīngguò zhěngzhěng shí nián，xiǎo Wáng cái bǎ gòufáng wěikuǎn quánbùfùqīng。
After ten whole years, Xiao Wang paid off all the remaining mortgage.
由于汽车尾牌破损严重，他被交警拦了下来。

Since the tailboard of the car was seriously broken, he was stopped by the traffic policeman.
尾羽对鸟类来说，具有至关重要的作用。
Wěiyǔ duì niǎolèi láishuō，jùyǒu zhìguān zhòngyào de zuòyòng。
Tail feathers are crucial to birds.

The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.

Bùduì zài xíngjìn zhōng xiánwěi xiāngsuí，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
The soldiers walk one by one in good order.

Bob finds it difficult to be consistent in his writing.

This whole book is printed with glazed paper.

信的末尾
xìn de mòwěi
at the end of the letter
排队排在末尾
páiduì páizài mòwěi
stand at the end of a queue
回复函的末尾一般都写上“此复”二字。
Huífùhán de mòwěi yìbān dōu xiě shàng“cǐfù”èr zì。
&quot;In response&quot; is usually written at the end of a letter in reply.
字据的末尾一般都写上“此据”二字。
Zìjù de mòwěi yìbān dōu xiě shàng“cǐjù”èr zì。
&quot;This is evidence&quot; is usually put at the end of a written pledge.
入党申请书的末尾要写上“此致敬礼”。
Rùdǎng shēnqǐngshū de mòwěi yào xiě shàng“cǐzhì jìnglǐ”。
&quot;With best regards&quot; should be put at the end of an application to join the Communist Party.
在信的末尾，他写上了“特意奉达”。
Zài xìn de mòwěi，tā xiěshàng le“tèyì fèngdá”。
He added &quot;with best wishes&quot; at the end of his letter.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.

结尾工程
jiéwěi gōngchéng
the winding-up work of a project
文章的结尾很有力量。
Wénzhāng de jiéwěi hěn yǒu lìliang。

In short, the ending of this essay should be as impressive as possible.

An exclamatory sentence should be followed by an exclamation mark.

坐牢
zuòláo
be in prison; be in jail; be imprisoned
循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。
Xúnlì nǐ shì yào zuòláo de，suàn nǐ xìngyùn，yùdào guìrén le，kěyǐ duǒguò cǐjié。
You were suppose to go to prison, according to past experience, but it is very lucky for you that someone helped you to dodge this misfortune.
他坐了三年牢。
Tā zuò le sān nián láo。

坐了三年牢。

三次坐牢的犯人

in prison

牢牢地记在心上
láoláo de jì zài xīn shàng
keep firmly in mind
这一点你必须牢牢记住。
Zhè yì diǎn nǐ bìxū láoláo jìzhù。
You must keep this firmly in mind.
洪水中，为了不被溺死，人们都牢牢地抱着水中飘浮的木头。
Hóngshuǐ zhōng，wèi le búbèi nìsǐ，rénmen dōu láoláo de bào zhe shuǐ zhōng piāofú de mùtou。
In order to avoid drowning and survive the flood, all the people held on firmly to the floating wood on the water.
牢牢抓住母亲的手
牢牢记住人民的嘱托。
to have a firm hold over someone
牢牢控制住某人
McDonald\'s has a strong hold over the fast food market.
麦当劳牢牢掌控着快餐市场。
I took a firm hold on the rope.
我牢牢地抓着绳子。
The rope was wet, but Nancy held on.
绳子湿了，但南希仍然牢牢地抓着。
The cover is bound to the book with glue.
Fēngmiàn yòng jiāoshuǐ láoláo de zhānzàile shū shàng。
封面用胶水牢牢地粘在了书上。
Using wood glue provides a strong bond between the two boards.
Tōngguò shùjiāo bǎ liǎngkuài bǎn láoláo zhānzài yìqǐ。
通过树胶把两块板牢牢粘在一起。

她慢慢伸出手去，牢牢的托起他的手。

那个旅行癖真正牢牢地抓住了他。

他们牢牢把握着那两项优先权。
He was magnetically attracted to her.
Tā bèi tā láoláo de xīyǐn zhù le。
他被她牢牢地吸引住了。
The tactically useful province is still firmly in the rebels\' hands.
Nàgè zhànlüè yào shěng réngrán láoláo de kòngzhì zài pànjūn shǒushàng。
那个战略要省仍然牢牢地控制在叛军手上。
这堵墙不太牢靠。
Zhè dǔ qiángbú tài láokào。
This wall is not very strong.
办事牢靠
bànshì láokào
dependable (or reliable) in handling matters
这个厂的合同制工人都曾担心“纸饭碗”不牢靠。
Zhège chǎng de hétongzhì gōngrén dōu céngdānxīn“zhǐ fànwǎn”bùláokào。
All contract workers worry about the insecurity of their &quot;paper rice bowl&quot;.
梯子靠这儿比较牢稳。
Tīzi kào zhèr bǐjiào láowěn。
The ladder will be more secure here.
牢靠
牢靠。
把梯子放牢靠点，千万别摔着。
这种口头协议不牢靠。
Our relationship has no substance so I think we should go our separate ways.
我们的关系太不牢靠，所以最好还是分道扬镳吧。
老师的教导我牢记在心。
Lǎoshī de jiàodǎo wǒ láojì zài xīn。
I always bear in mind my teacher\'s instructions.
这一点你必须牢牢记住。
Zhè yì diǎn nǐ bìxū láoláo jìzhù。
You must keep this firmly in mind.
牢记心中
láojì xīn zhōng
keep firmly in mind
我们一定要牢记这些前辈，吃水不忘挖井人。
Wǒmen yídìng yào láojì zhèxiē qiánbèi，chī shuǐ búwàng wājǐng rén。
We must remember the older generation, just as when drink  water we shouldn\'t forget those who dug the well.
一定要牢记得道多助，这对你管理企业大有益处。
Yídìng yào láojì dédào duōzhù，zhè duì nǐ guǎnlǐ qǐyè dàyǒu yìchù。
Remember that a just cause enjoys abundant support, which is very beneficial for managing your enterprise.
不论走在哪里，你都要牢记父训。
Bùlùn zǒuzài nǎlǐ，nǐ dōuyào láojì fùxùn。
Keep what your father told you firmly in mind wherever you go.
这句警语有很强的指导作用，要牢记在心。
Zhè jù jǐngyǔ yǒu hěnqiáng de zhǐdǎo zuòyòng，yào láojì zài xīn。
We must bear in mind this instructive epigram.
毛主席的话我们将永远牢记心间。
Máo zhǔxí de huà wǒmen jiāng yǒngyuǎn láojì xīnjiān。
We will always keep the words of Chairman Mao in our minds.
牢牢地记在心上
láoláo de jì zài xīn shàng
keep firmly in mind
牢记。
牢记恩师教诲。
牢记心间。
牢记父亲的教导。
牢记历史教训。
时刻牢记为人民服务的宗旨。
牢牢记住人民的嘱托。
默读几遍，牢记在心。
牢记师训。
牢记母亲的嘱咐。
to bear a secret
牢记一项秘密
carry memories
牢记不忘
The incident was stamped in her memory.
这一事件使她牢记不忘。
Bear in mind what I told you, it will help you in the future.
牢记我跟你说过的话，它将来会对你有帮助的。
Believers believe, as long as they have Jesus\' words embedded in them, they can stand strong and not be shaken.
信徒们相信，只要牢记基督的教导，他们就能坚强地站起来，不被动摇。
Remember the discipline he gave you because it will benefit you the whole life.
他对你的教导会让你受益终身，请一定牢记。
He was in class，grinding in his thoughts.
Tā zài shàngkè，kèkǔ gōngdú yǐ láojì tā de sīxiǎng。
他在上课，刻苦攻读以牢记他的思想。
The advice you give me, I will take to heart.
Nǐ gěi de jiànyì， wǒ huì láojì zài xīn。
你给的建议，我会牢记在心。
Keep in mind the dangers of imposing our own values and prejudices too forcibly.
Yào láojì bǎ wǒmen de jiàzhíguān hé piānjiàn jiànjiě qiángjiāgěi biérén de wēixiǎn。
要牢记把我们的价值观和偏见见解强加给别人的危险。
He made a mental note to send her flowers.
Tā láojì yào gěi tā sòng huā de shì。
他牢记要给她送花的事。
to know the multiplication tables
记牢乘法运算表
The same words will be repeated to make them stick in your mind.
Tóngyàng de huà huì búduàn chóngfù，zhèyàng nǐ cáinéng jìláo。
同样的话会不断重复，这样你才能记牢。
No journalist will risk prison to put an article in the paper.
Méiyǒu jìzhě màozhe zuòláo de fēngxiǎn ér fābiǎo zhè lèi wénzhāng。
没有记者冒着坐牢的风险而发表这类文章。
根基牢固
gēnjī láogù
a firm foundation
地基很牢固。
Dìjī hěn láogù。
The foundations are very firm.
这个跌水是使用混凝土浇筑成的，相当牢固。
Zhège diēshuǐ shì shǐyòng hùnníngtǔ jiāozhù chéng de，xiāngdāng láogù。
This ladder in the canal is made of concrete and is very secure.
他们虽身处两地，但彼此的感情还是那样的牢固。
Tāmen suī shēnchǔ liǎngdì，dàn bǐcǐ de gǎnqíng háishi nàyàng de láogù。
Though they are in two different places, their love for each other is still firm.
由于子埝没有建设牢固，洪水最后还是淹没了小村。

As the embankment was built solidly, the flood was long in engulfing the small village.

láogù
firm
牢固

to put a business on a sound footing

a solid friendship

a tight joint

a sound theoretical foundation

平足需要额外的动作控制和牢固的鞋跟。

Bǎ suǒyǒu de pèiliào hùnhé zài yìqǐ zuòchéng yí gè láogù de húzhuàng wù。
把所有的配料混合在一起做成一个牢固的糊状物。
The secure knowledge of a parent\'s presence is important for a child.
Jiāzhǎng láogù zhīshi de biǎodá duì háizi hěn zhòngyào。
家长牢固知识的表达对孩子很重要。
If your front and back doors aren\'t secure, then neither is your home.
Rúguǒ nǐ jiā lián qiánmén gēn hòumén dōu bù láogù，zhè bù kěnéng shì yí gè jiā。
如果你家连前门跟后门都不牢固，这不可能是一个家。
Their marriage had a real strength behind it.
Tāmen de hūnyīn zhēn de hěn láogù。
他们的婚姻真的很牢固。
The building was built on top of a very strong foundation.
Zhè zuò lóufáng jiànlìzài yí zuò hěn láogù de dìjī zhīshàng。
这座楼房建立在一座很牢固的地基之上。
Put any valuables out of sight, preferably in a strong locker with a secure padlock.
Jiāng rènhé guìzhòng wùpǐn shōucáng qǐlái，zuìhǎo fàngzài yí gè láogù de dài bǎoxiǎn guàsuǒ de jìcúnguì zhōng。

The campers looked for firm ground to rest on.
Zhèxiē yěyíngzhě zhǎodào yí kuài láogù de Dìfang zhāyíng。
这些野营者找到一块牢固的地方扎营。
There were no firm foundations for economic recovery.

经济复苏的基础并不牢固。
He dug himself in well and found himself in a strong position.
Tā quèlìle zìjǐ de láogù dìwèi，fāxiàn zìjǐ hěn qiángshì。
他确立了自己的牢固地位，发现自己很强势。
The post was still firm after being hit by the car.

He tested the set of the glue.
Tā cèshìle jiāoshuǐ de láogùdù。
他测试了胶水的牢固度。
These will be fastened on with a hook.
Yòng gōuzi bǎ tāmen láoláo de gùdìng shàng。

屋基务必要打牢一点，否则盖好的房子也不会结实！
Wūjī wùbì yào dǎ láo yìdiǎn，fǒuzé gàihǎo de fángzi yě bùhuì jiēshi！
The groundsill should be firm, otherwise the house would be unstable.
I was held overnight in a cell.
我整个晚上被拘留在牢房。
Jack often dreamed of home from his prison cell.
杰克在监狱牢房里常常梦见家乡。
The murderer is safely in his cell.
这个杀人犯乖乖地待在他的牢房里。
None of the prisoners wanted to spend time in the tank.

没有犯人愿意被关在牢房里。
The room was as small and bare as a prison cell.

这个房间又小又空，就像一间小牢房。

The mere thought of an isolation cell panicked the prisoners.

一想到单间牢房，囚犯们就不寒而栗。
Their pitiful laments could be heard throughout the ward.

麦当劳牢牢掌控着快餐市场。

我牢牢地抓着绳子。

绳子湿了，但南希仍然牢牢地抓着。

封面用胶水牢牢地粘在了书上。

Tā mànmàn shēnchū shǒu qù，láoláo de tuōqǐ tā de shǒu。

with best wishes

zhì yǐ liánghǎo de zhùyuàn 
with best wishes
祝愿祖国岁岁安澜、年年昌盛！
Zhùyuàn zǔguó suìsuì ānlán、niánnián chāngshèng！
May our country thrive in peace, and prosperity every year.
今天姥姥过生日，我们衷心祝愿她康宁安泰！
Jīntiān lǎolao guò shēngrì，wǒmen zhōng xīn zhùyuàn tā kāngníng āntài！
We wish Grandma a peaceful, and healthy life on her birthday.
祝愿大家在新的一年，学业、事业更上一层楼。
Zhùyuàn dàjiā zài xīn de yì nián，xuéyè、shìyè gèng shàng yì céng lóu。
I hope everyone attains better results in their study and career in the new year.
我忠心祝愿爷爷安享晚年，洪福齐天。

考试前，同学们互勉着，祝愿彼此取得好成绩。

On National Day, all the people wish their country prosperity and eternal peace.
春节到了，祝愿您笑口常开，万事如意！

dáxiè zhùjiǔ 
respond (or reply) to a toast

Zhù nín zǎorì kānɡfù。
Hope you\'ll soon be well again. or I wish you a speedy recovery.
《梁山伯与祝英台》是个很浪漫的爱情故事。
《Liáng Shānbó yǔ Zhù Yīngtái》shìgè hěnlàngmàn de àiqínggùshì。
Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai is a very romantic love story.
祝你旅途愉快！
Zhù nǐ lǚtú yúkuài。
Have a pleasant journey. or Bon voyage.
祝你马到成功！
zhù nǐ mǎdàochénɡɡōnɡ! 
I wish you instant success!
致以美好的祝愿
zhì yǐ měihǎo de zhùyuàn 
with best wishes
祝你学业猛进！
Zhù nǐ xuéyè měnɡjìn! 
I wish you a rapid progress in your studies.
庆祝国庆
qìngzhù guóqìng
celebrate National Day
热烈的祝贺
rèliè de zhùhè
warm congratulations
祝万事如意。
Zhù wànshìrúyì。
May everything turn out as you wish.
恭祝圣诞，并贺新禧
gōngzhù shèngdàn，bìng hè xīn xǐ
With Best Wishes for a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year
祝你幸福。
Zhù nǐ xìnɡfú。
I wish you happiness.
应邀派代表团参加庆祝活动
yìngyāo pài dàibiǎotuán cānjiā qìngzhù huódòng
send a delegation to attend the celebrations at sb.\'s invitation
祝你在中国逗留期间过得愉快。
Zhù nǐ zài Zhōngguó dòuliú qījiān guò de yúkuài。
I hope you\'ll have a pleasant stay in China.
预祝你取得成功。
Yùzhù nǐ qǔdé chénggōng。
I wish you success.
祝你早日恢复健康。
Zhù nǐ zǎorì huīfù jiànkānɡ。
I hope you\'ll get well soon. or I wish you a speedy recovery.
表示衷心的祝贺
biǎoshì zhōngxīn de zhùhè 
extend cordial greetings
祝您诸事顺遂。
Zhù nín zhū shì shùnsuì。
Hope everything goes well with you! or Wishing you every success!
祝你健康。
Zhù nǐ jiànkānɡ。 
I wish you the best of health.
为你祝福。
Wèi nǐ zhùfú。
Blessings on you.
祝贺艺术家们演出成功
zhùhè yìshùjiāmen yǎnchū chénggōng
congratulate the artists on their successful performance
向你祝贺！
Xiànɡ nǐ zhùhè! 
Congratulations!
向来宾们祝酒
xiàng láibīnmen zhùjiǔ 
toast the guests
致祝酒辞
zhì zhùjiǔcí 
propose a toast
答谢祝酒
dáxiè zhùjiǔ 
respond (or reply) to a toast
致以良好的祝愿
zhì yǐ liánghǎo de zhùyuàn 
with best wishes
祝你走运。
Zhù nǐ zǒuyùn。 
Good luck to you. or Good luck!
咱们找个馆子庆祝一下，我来做东。
Zánmen zhǎo gè guǎnzi qìngzhù yíxià，wǒ lái zuòdōng。
We should find a restaurant and celebrate a little. It is my treat.
祝寿
zhùshòu
congratulate (an elderly person) on his or her birthday
祝愿祖国岁岁安澜、年年昌盛！
Zhùyuàn zǔguó suìsuì ānlán、niánnián chāngshèng！
May our country thrive in peace, and prosperity every year.
今天姥姥过生日，我们衷心祝愿她康宁安泰！
Jīntiān lǎolao guò shēngrì，wǒmen zhōng xīn zhùyuàn tā kāngníng āntài！
We wish Grandma a peaceful, and healthy life on her birthday.
我祝你百尺竿头更进一步！
Wǒ zhù nǐ bǎichǐ gāntóu gèngjìn yíbù！
I wish you even greater success.
给父母拜节，祝二老健康吉祥！
Gěi fùmǔ bàijié，zhù èrlǎo jiànkāng jíxiáng！
Happy New Year to you, mom and dad! I wish you a long and healthy life!
敬祝宝号生意兴隆、财源滚滚！
Jìngzhù bǎohào shēngyì xīnglóng、cáiyuán gǔngǔn！
I wish you thriving business and great fortune!
为了庆祝春节，村子里搭起了高高的彩牌楼。
Wèile qìngzhù chūnjié，cūnzi lǐ dāqǐ le gāogāo de cǎipáilóu。
The villagers put up a tall archway to celebrate Spring Festival.
为了庆祝春节，村子里搭起了彩棚。
Wèile qìngzhù chūnjié，cūnzi lǐ dāqǐ le cǎipéng。
The villagers put up a decorated marquee to celebrate Spring Festival.
祝您身体健康，长命百岁。
Zhù nín shēntǐjiànkāng，chángmìng bǎisuì。
May you have a long and healthy life.
寄此寸函，以表达对您的节日祝福。
Jìcǐ cùnhán，yǐ biǎodá duì nín de jiérì zhùfú。
I send you this short letter so as to extend my holiday greetings to you.
他在焚香祷祝。
Tā zài fénxiāng dǎozhù.
He is praying with incense burning.
祝你们俩的友情地久天长。
Zhù nǐmen liǎ de yǒuqíng dìjiǔ tiāncháng。
May your friendship go on forever.
学生顿首再拜，恭祝先生安泰。
Xuésheng dùnshǒu zài bài，gōngzhù xiānsheng āntài。
The student kowtowed and wished his teacher well.
祝愿大家在新的一年，学业、事业更上一层楼。
Zhùyuàn dàjiā zài xīn de yì nián，xuéyè、shìyè gèng shàng yì céng lóu。
I hope everyone attains better results in their study and career in the new year.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
黄澄澄的谷穗随风摇摆，仿佛在庆祝即将到来的丰收。
Huángdèngdèng de gǔsuì suífēng yáobǎi，fǎngfó zài qìngzhù jíjiāng dàolái de fēngshōu。
The yellow grains are swaying with the wind as if to celebrate the coming harvest.
我们祝贺老师龟鹤延年，健康幸福！
Wǒmen zhùhè lǎoshī guīhè yánnián，jiànkāng xìngfú！
May our teacher have a long, healthy and happy life!
祝您老龟年鹤寿，福如东海。
Zhù nínlǎo guīnián hèshòu，fúrú dōnghǎi。
May you have a long life and may your fortune be as boundless as the East Sea.
贵子降生，我们特来祝贺。
Guìzǐ jiàngshēng，wǒmen tè lái zhùhè。
Congratulations to your newborn baby!
我忠心祝愿爷爷安享晚年，洪福齐天。
Wǒ zhōng xīn zhùyuàn yéye ānxiǎng wǎnnián，hóngfú qítiān。
I wish grandpa a peaceful life in his late years, and a good fortune.
祝你在新的一年事业有成，虎跃龙腾。
Zhù nǐ zài xīn de yìnián shìyè yǒuchéng，hǔyuè lóngténg。
I wish you a successful career in the new year, and a scene of bustling activity.
考试前，同学们互勉着，祝愿彼此取得好成绩。
Kǎoshì qián，tóngxuémen hùmiǎn zhe，zhùyuàn bǐcǐ qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
Before the exam, the students encouraged each other and wished each other a good score.
当房屋架起脊檩，建房者会举行庆祝仪式。
Dāng fángwū jiàqǐ jǐlǐn，jiànfángzhě huì jǔxíng qìngzhù yíshì。
When ridge-poles are put up in a house, its owner will hold a celebration.
在教师节来临之际，祝所有的教师节日快乐！
Zài jiàoshījié láilín zhī jì，zhù suǒyǒu de jiàoshī jiérì kuàilè！
We wish all teachers a happy Teachers\' Day!
开幕词的写作要点是：短小简洁，表达祝福和希望。
Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.
在这新春之际，我祝愿您福寿康宁。
Zài zhè xīnchūn zhījì，wǒ zhùyuàn nín fúshòu kāngníng。
At the time of the Spring Festival, I wish you happiness and a long and undisturbed life.
国庆节时，全国人民祝愿祖国昌盛康泰！
Guóqìngjié shí，quánguó rénmín zhùyuàn zǔguó chāngshèng kāngtài！
On National Day, all the people wish their country prosperity and eternal peace.
今天是良辰吉日，让我们大家共同为这对新人祝福。
Jīntiān shì liángchén jírì，ràng wǒmen dàjiā gòngtóng wèi zhè duì xīnrén zhùfú。
Today is a happy, and auspicious day. Let\'s wish the new couple good luck together.
新的一年，我祝大家生意隆盛。
Xīn de yì nián，wǒ zhù dàjiā shēngyì lóngshèng。
I wish you a prosperous business in the new year.
纸短情长，我仅在这里敬祝你曼福。
Zhǐduǎn qíngcháng，wǒ jǐn zài zhèlǐ jìngzhù nǐ mànfú。
The letter can not carry my feelings. I just wish you long-lasting happiness.
等到你的孩子弥月的时候，我一定去你家庆祝。
Děngdào nǐ de háizi míyuè de shíhou，wǒ yídìng qù nǐ jiā qìngzhù。
I will visit you to celebrate the completion of his first month of life.
我祝大家在新的一年里都有好气运！
Wǒ zhù dàjiā zài xīn de yìnián lǐ dōu yǒu hǎo qìyùn！
I wish everyone good luck in the new year!
咱们干一杯吧，祝贺你乔迁之喜！
Zánmen gān yì bēi ba，zhùhè nǐ qiáoqiān zhī xǐ！
Let\'s propose a toast to your new house.
亲家母，我们祝您寿比南山！
Qìngjiāmǔ，wǒmen zhù nín shòubǐ nánshān！
Mother-in-law, may you live as long as the Southern Mountains!
祝你在新的一年里三星高照、吉祥如意！
Zhù nǐ zài xīn de yìnián lǐ sānxīnggāozhào，jíxiángrúyì ！
Wishing you the best of luck in the new year, may the heavens bless you with fortune, success, and longevity!
每当我生日时，父亲都会寄给我一张生日卡表示祝贺。
Měidāng wǒ shēngrì shí，fùqīn dōuhuì jìgěi wǒ yìzhāng shēngrìkǎ biǎoshì zhùhè。
On every one of my birthdays, my father sends me a congratulatory birthday card.
预祝我们的首度合作愉快、成功！
Yùzhù wǒmen de shǒudù hézuò yúkuài、chénggōng！
I wish our first cooperation happiness and success!
今天是奶奶的80寿诞，全家人聚在一起给奶奶祝寿。
Jīntiān shì nǎinai de bā0 shòudàn，quánjiā rén jùzài yìqǐ gěi nǎinai zhùshòu。
Today is grandma\'s 80th birthday, and all the family have got together to congratulate her.
我们祝您在新的一年中万事顺意！
Wǒmen zhù nín zài xīn de yìnián zhōng wànshì shùnyì！
We hope that everything goes as you wish in the new year!
今天这顿饭算作给你饯行，祝你一路顺风！
Jīntiān zhè dùn fàn suànzuò gěi nǐ jiànxíng，zhù nǐ yílù shùnfēng！
Just take this meal as a farewell party, we wish you a smooth journey!
今天你的餐馆开业，他特为打来电话祝贺。
Jīntiān nǐ de cānguǎn kāiyè，tā tèwéi dǎlái diànhuà zhùhè。
Your restaurant opened today, and he has called especially to congratulate you.
值此新春佳节，祝您新年快乐，万事大吉！
Zhícǐ xīnchūn jiājié，zhù nín xīnniánkuàilè，wànshì dàjí！
I wish you a happy New Year and hope everything is good for this Spring Festival!
新年到了，恭祝大家新年快乐，万事亨通！
Xīnnián dào le，gōngzhù dàjiā xīnniánkuàilè，wànshì hēngtōng！
I wish you a happy New Year and for everything to be successful in the new year!
祝你在新的一年里万事如意！
Zhù nǐ zàixīn de yìnián lǐ wànshì rúyì！
May everything go well with you in the new year!
相公，明日我父亲过七十大寿，你陪我回家祝寿吧！
Xiànggong，míngrì wǒ fùqīn guò qīshí dàshòu，nǐ péi wǒ huíjiā zhùshòu ba！
Dear husband, my father is going to have his 70th birthday, go and visit him with me, please!
春节到了，祝愿您笑口常开，万事如意！
Chūnjié dào le，zhùyuàn nín xiàokǒu chángkāi，wànshì rúyì！
Spring Festival is coming. I wish you a life of happiness and smiles!
新春到了，祝你万事如意！
Xīnchūn dào le，zhù nǐ wànshì rúyì！
As the New Year comes, I wish you all the best.
遥祝远方的情人幸福快乐 。
Yáozhù yuǎnfāng de qíngrén xìngfú kuàilè。
Wish my love happiness from a distance.
如今我们天各一方，只能默默为彼此祝福。
Rújīn wǒmen tiāngè yìfāng，zhǐnéng mòmò wèi bǐcǐ zhùfú。
Now that we are apart, we can only bless each other in our hearts.
那天知道他要走，我只能在心里祝他一路顺风。
Nàtiān zhīdào tā yào zǒu，wǒ zhǐnéng zài xīnlǐ zhù tā yílù shùnfēng。
That day I heard that he was leaving, I could not but wish him a nice trip in my mind.
祝亲爱的妈妈青春永驻，笑口常开！
Zhù qīnài de māma qīngchūn yǒngzhù，xiàokǒu chángkāi！
Wish my dear mother an everlasting youth and eternal happiness.
他早早回家做饭庆祝这次单位涨钱。
Tā zǎozǎo huíjiā zuòfàn qìngzhù zhècì dānwèi zhǎngqián。
He returned home early to cook, so as to celebrate his raise.
在教师节来临之际，我们向老师送上诚挚的祝福。
Zài jiàoshījié láilín zhījì，wǒmen xiàng lǎoshī sòngshàng chéngzhì de zhùfú。
With the coming of Teacher\'s Day, we would like to give the teachers our best wishes.
远在千里之外的他送来了最深情的节日祝福。
Yuǎnzài qiānlǐ zhīwài de tā sònglái le zuì shēnqíng de jiérì zhùfú。
He, who is thousands of miles away from here, sends us his best holiday wishes.
老总亲自在新年酒会上念祝辞。
Lǎozǒng qīnzì zài xīnnián jiǔhuì shàng niàn zhùcí。
The president proposed a toast in person at the New Year\'s cocktail party.
许多上年纪的老人都喜欢在新年钟声敲响那一刻祝告。
Xǔduō shàng niánjì de lǎorén dōu xǐhuan zài xīnnián zhōng shēng qiāoxiǎng nà yíkè zhùgào。
Many old people like to pray when the New Year\'s bell rings.
探险队顺利归来，群众纷纷到探险队大本营祝捷。
Tànxiǎnduì shùnlì guīlái，qúnzhòng fēnfēn dào tànxiǎnduì dàběnyíng zhùjié。
When the exploration team returned successfully, many people came to their base camp to celebrate the victory.
念完祝酒词后，他一饮而尽。
Niànwán zhùjiǔcí hòu，tā yìyǐnérjìn。
After finishing the toast, he drank all the wine in the cup.
漂亮的藏族姑娘一边唱着祝酒歌，一边慢步走到客人的面前。
Piàoliàng de zàngzú gūniang yìbiān chàng zhe zhùjiǔgē，yìbiān mànbùzǒudào kèrén de miànqián。
The beautiful Zang girl walked slowly towards the guest while singing toast songs.
作为一代君王，他得到了天下子民的祝颂。
Zuòwéi yídài jūnwáng，tā dédào le tiānxià zǐmín de zhùsòng。
As an emperor, he received the good wishes of his people.
每到国际儿童节，全世界的小朋友都一同庆祝自己的节日。
Měi dào guójì értóngjié，quánshìjiè de xiǎopéngyou dōu yìtóng qìngzhù zìjǐ de jiérì。
Children all over the world will celebrate their festivals on  International Children\'s Day.
远行的朋友，祝你们一路平安。
Yuǎnxíng de péngyou，zhù nǐmen yílù píngān。
I wish you a safe journey, my friend.
祝愿这对新人白头偕老，永远幸福。
Zhùyuàn zhèduìxīnrén báitóuxiélǎo，yǒngyuǎn xìngfú。
May the bride and groom live happily ever after to a ripe old age.
祝您长寿！
Zhù nín chángshòu！
Here\'s to a long life!
传递祝福
chuándì zhùfú
extend good wishes

Qīnpénghǎoyǒu gòngjùyìtáng，zhùhè tāde chénggōng。
His relatives and close friends gathered together to congratulate him on his success.

Zhù nín zǎorì kāngfù！

Zhù nǐ lǚtú yúkuài！

祝你平安。

向优胜者祝贺
drink someone\'s health

应予庆祝的节日

to wish someone good speed

to speed the parting guest

to wish someone good luck

to wish a person good morning
祝某人早安
to offer one\'s best wishes
表示最良好的祝愿

这座城市明天将庆祝建城一千周年。

1914 nián 8 yuè，zhèlǐ jǔbànle yígè chénmèn bēishāng de xiǎoxíng wǎnyàn，ér dāngshí Fǎguó、 Déguó、Àodìlì hé Bǐlìshí de tóngméngguó wěiyuánhuì chéngyuán què zhèngzài jǔbēi tóng zhù wèilái hépíng。
1914年8月，这里举办了一个沉闷悲伤的小型晚宴，而当时法国、德国、奥地利和比利时的同盟国委员会成员却正在举杯同祝未来和平。

这地区饮用水的水质不好，全靠净化器净化。
Zhè dìqū yǐnyòngshuǐ de shuǐzhì bùhǎo，quánkào jìnghuàqì jìnghuà。
The water quality in this district is not good, so the water must be purified with cleaning cartridges.
我们通过立井把食物和饮用水送到矿井下。
Wǒmen tōngguò lìjǐng bǎ shíwù hé yǐnyòngshuǐ sòngdào kuàngjǐng xià。
We send the food and water down into the mine through silos.
虽然海水淡化技术能够将海水变为饮用淡水，但成本太昂贵，无法实现规模化。
Suīrán hǎishuǐ dànhuà jìshù nénggòuj iāng hǎishuǐ biànwéi yǐnyòng dànshuǐ，dàn chéngběn tài ángguì，wúfǎ shíxiàn guīmóhuà。
Seawater can be changed into fresh water through seawater desalination technology, but it cannot be mass produced due to its high cost.
过多饮用矿泉水对身体无益。
Guòduō yǐnyòng kuàngquánshuǐ duì shēntǐ wúyì。
Excessive mineral water is not good for your health.
国家对饮用纯净水有严格的卫生规定。
Guójiā duì yǐnyòng chúnjìngshuǐ yǒu yángé de wèishēng guīdìng。
The state has strict hygienic regulations for potable water.
每天饮用适量的白水有益健康。
Měitiān yǐnyòng shìliàng de báishuǐ yǒuyì jiànkāng。
Drinking an appropriate amount of water every day is good for one\'s health.
这条小河的水是净水，可以放心饮用。
Zhè tiáo xiǎohé de shuǐ shì jìngshuǐ，kěyǐ fàngxīn yǐnyòng。
The water in this river is clean and safe to drink.
这种水硬度太高，不适合饮用。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐ yìngdù tài gāo，bú shìhé yǐnyòng。
This kind of water is too hard: it\'s not suitable for drinking.
这里的水清凌凌的，可以直接饮用。
Zhèlǐ de shuǐ qīnglínglíng de，kěyǐ zhíjiē yǐnyòng。
The water here is clear and rippling and can be drunk directly.
饮用水
这次痢疾流行的病源是饮用了被污染的河水。
There is a major problem in some pockets of the country with respect to potable water.
在这个国家的局部地区，饮用水仍然是个重要的问题。
The area has no modern roads, electricity, or clean drinking water.
该地区没有现代化的道路，没有电，也没有清洁的饮用水。
Clean drinking water must be available at all times.
Bìxū suíshí dōu tígōng chúnjìng de yǐnyòngshuǐ。
必须随时都提供纯净的饮用水。
She detected high levels of lead in her drinking water.
Tā fājué tā de yǐnyòngshuǐ lǐ qiānhánliàng tài gāo le。
她发觉她的饮用水里铅含量太高了。
The percentage of lead in our drinking water is unacceptably high.
Wǒmen de yǐnyòngshuǐ zhōng de qiān hánliàng gāo de nányǐ jiēshòu。
我们的饮用水中的铅含量高得难以接受。
Don\'t drink the water--it\'s contaminated.
Bú yào yǐnyòng zhèli de shuǐ，tāmen bèi wūrǎn le。
不要饮用这里的水，它们被污染了。
He drank a mixture of beer and lemonade.
Tā yǐnyòng píjiǔ hé níngméng shuǐ de hùnhé yǐnliào。
他饮用啤酒和柠檬水的混合饮料。
The water was acceptable for drinking.
Zhèxiē shuǐ bùnéng yǐnyòng。
这些水不能饮用。
每天饮用适量的白水有益健康。
Měitiān yǐnyòng shìliàng de báishuǐ yǒuyì jiànkāng。
Drinking an appropriate amount of water every day is good for one\'s health.
如果瓶中出现沉积物，请不要饮用。
Rúguǒ píng zhōng chūxiàn chénjīwù，qǐng búyào yǐnyòng。
Please don\'t drink it if there is any sediment in the bottle.
据说适量饮用发酵酒，对身体有好处。
Jùshuō shìliàng yǐnyòng fājiàojiǔ，duì shēntǐ yǒu hǎochu。
It is good for your health to drink a moderate amount of fermented liquor.
适量蜂花粉与蜂蜜调合，每天饮用一些，既滋补又美容。
Shìliàng fēnghuāfěn yǔ fēngmì tiáohé，měitiān yǐnyòng yìxiē，jì zībǔ yòu měiróng。
Drinking some bee pollen mixed with honey every day is good for your health and can make you more attractive.
这条小河的水是净水，可以放心饮用。
Zhè tiáo xiǎohé de shuǐ shì jìngshuǐ，kěyǐ fàngxīn yǐnyòng。
The water in this river is clean and safe to drink.
这地区饮用水的水质不好，全靠净化器净化。
Zhè dìqū yǐnyòngshuǐ de shuǐzhì bùhǎo，quánkào jìnghuàqì jìnghuà。
The water quality in this district is not good, so the water must be purified with cleaning cartridges.
过多饮用矿泉水对身体无益。
Guòduō yǐnyòng kuàngquánshuǐ duì shēntǐ wúyì。
Excessive mineral water is not good for your health.
我们通过立井把食物和饮用水送到矿井下。
Wǒmen tōngguò lìjǐng bǎ shíwù hé yǐnyòngshuǐ sòngdào kuàngjǐng xià。
We send the food and water down into the mine through silos.
这里的水清凌凌的，可以直接饮用。
Zhèlǐ de shuǐ qīnglínglíng de，kěyǐ zhíjiē yǐnyòng。
The water here is clear and rippling and can be drunk directly.
酸牛奶有助于肠胃消化，很适合老人、儿童饮用。
Suānniúnǎi yǒuzhùyú chángwèi xiāohuà，hěnshìhé lǎorén、értóng yǐnyòng。
Yogurt can accelerate digestion in the bowels, and so is suitable for the elderly and children to drink.
据说天天饮用鲜奶有助于骨骼的生长。
Jùshuō tiāntiān yǐnyòng xiānnǎi yǒuzhùyú gǔgé de shēngzhǎng。
It is said that drinking milk every day can help your bones grow.
国家对饮用纯净水有严格的卫生规定。
Guójiā duì yǐnyòng chúnjìngshuǐ yǒu yángé de wèishēng guīdìng。
The state has strict hygienic regulations for potable water.
虽然海水淡化技术能够将海水变为饮用淡水，但成本太昂贵，无法实现规模化。
Suīrán hǎishuǐ dànhuà jìshù nénggòuj iāng hǎishuǐ biànwéi yǐnyòng dànshuǐ，dàn chéngběn tài ángguì，wúfǎ shíxiàn guīmóhuà。
Seawater can be changed into fresh water through seawater desalination technology, but it cannot be mass produced due to its high cost.
这种水硬度太高，不适合饮用。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐ yìngdù tài gāo，bú shìhé yǐnyòng。
This kind of water is too hard: it\'s not suitable for drinking.
镀锡铁皮可以用来生产饮料罐子。
Dùxī tiěpí kěyǐ yòng lái shēngchǎn yǐnliào guànzi。
Tin can be used to make cans.
超市用雪柜储藏冷饮。
Chāoshì yòng xuěguì chǔcáng lěngyǐn。
The supermarket uses a refrigerator to store drinks.
这次痢疾流行的病源是饮用了被污染的河水。

他因饮用烈酒而感到非常不适。

He aroused his drink with his finger.
Tā yòng shǒuzhǐ jiǎodòng zìjǐ de yǐnliào。
他用手指搅动自己的饮料。
Diet soft drinks contain aspartame or other artificial sweeteners in place of corn syrup.
减肥软饮料含有阿斯巴特(糖精)或其他人造甜味剂用来替代玉米糖浆。
The skim milk substitutes for cream--we are on a strict diet.

饮食过量
yǐnshí guòliàng
excessive eating and drinking
节制饮食
jiézhì yǐnshí 
be moderate in eating and drinking; be (or go) on a diet
孩子在托儿所饮食起居都有规律。
Háizi zài tuō\'érsuǒ yǐnshí qǐjū dōu yǒu guīlǜ。
Life in a nursery provides children with a strict daily regimen.
饮食无度
yǐnshí wúdù 
excessive (or immoderate) eating and drinking
给病人规定饮食
gěi bìngrén guīdìngyǐnshí 
put a patient on a diet
饮食卫生
yǐnshí wèishēng
dietetic hygiene
不规律的饮食习惯，经常诱发肠胃病。
Bùguīlǜ de yǐnshí xíguàn，jīngcháng yòufā chángwèibìng。
Irregular eating habits often lead to bowel disorders.
胃病患者的秋季饮食应忌嘴保养。
Wèibìng huànzhě de qiūjì yǐnshí yīng jìzuǐ bǎoyǎng。
People with stomach illnesses should avoid certain foods in autumn.
他对于饮食非常有研究，可以算得上是名副其实的美食家了。
Tā duìyú yǐnshí fēicháng yǒu yánjiū，kěyǐ suàndéshàng shì míngfùqíshí de měishíjiā le。
He researches diets carefully, and is a true epicure.
要想身体健康，就要多注意饮食营养配比。
Yào xiǎng shēntǐjiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì yǐnshí yíngyǎng pèibǐ。
Pay attention to the amount of nutrition in your food if you want to be healthy.
要想饮食健康，就要多注意合理配膳。
Yào xiǎng yǐnshí jiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì hélǐ pèishàn。
You\'d better arrange different foods appropriately, if you want a healthy diet.
医生要求父亲饮食清淡，预防狭心症。
Yīshēng yāoqiú fùqīn yǐnshí qīngdàn，yùfáng xiáxīnzhèng。
The docter asked my father to have light diet to avoid angina.
饮食业已经成为这个城市的支柱产业。
Yǐnshíyè yǐjing chéngwéi zhège chéngshì de zhīzhù chǎnyè。
The catering trade has become a mainstay for the city.
良好的饮食习惯可以预防动脉硬化。
Liánghǎo de yǐnshí xíguàn kěyǐ yùfáng dòngmài yìnghuà。
Good eating habits prevent one from getting arteriosclerosis.
饮食中的植物油是必不可少的。
Yǐnshí zhōng de zhíwùyóu shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
Vegetable oil is indispensable for a healthy diet.
譬如饮食习惯，南北各不相同。
Pìrú yǐnshíxíguàn，nánběi gèbùxiāngtóng.
Taking eating habits as an example, there are big differences between the north and the south.
挑拣饮食
tiāojiǎn yǐnshí
be particular about one\'s food

Tā shēntǐ bùhǎo，xūyào tiáolǐ yǐnshí。
She\'s not in good health and has to take care with what she eats.
饮食业
Yǐnshíyè
the food and drink industry
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí duì jiànkāng búlì，yě róngyì fāpàng a。
Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.
暴饮暴食很伤身体。
Bàoyǐn bàoshí hěn shāngshēntǐ。
Binge-eating is very bad for one\'s health.
由于长期暴饮暴食，他现在已经痴肥得不象样了。
Yóuyú chángqī bàoyǐn bàoshí，tā xiànzài yǐjing chīféi de bú xiàng yàng le。
After long time of over eating, he is now obese.
由于暴饮暴食，他现在已经胖得没有人样儿了。
Yóuyú bàoyǐn bàoshí，tā xiànzài yǐjing pàng de méiyǒu rényàngr le。
Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is  really fat now.
经常暴饮暴食对消化道有不良影响。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí duì xiāohuàdào yǒu bùliáng yǐngxiǎng。
Often eating and drinking too much is bad for the digestive system.
经常暴饮暴食使他的体重增至200斤。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí shǐ tā de tǐzhòng zēngzhì èrbǎijīn。
His weight increased to 200 jin, because he eats and drinks too much at each meal.

过多饮酒对身体十分有害。
Guòduō yǐnjiǔ duì shēntǐ shífēn yǒuhài。
Drinking too much alcohol is detrimental to one\'s health.
这种饮料含有人体所需的维生素。
Zhèzhǒng yǐnliào hányǒu réntǐ suǒxū de wéishēngsù。
This beverage contains vitamins necessary for human beings.
联欢会上大家开怀畅饮，尽情欢娱。
Liánhuānhuì shàng dàjiā kāihuái chàngyǐn，jìnqíng huānyú。
During the get-together every one drank to their hearts\' content, and had fun as much as they liked.
他日夜兼程一路饥餐渴饮，两天就赶出了很远的路。
Tā rìyè jiānchéng yílù jīcān kěyǐn，liǎng tiān jiù gǎnchū le hěnyuǎn de lù。
He kept on walking on the journey, having food for hunger and water for thirst, and covered quite a long distance in just two days.
胃病患者的秋季饮食应忌嘴保养。
Wèibìng huànzhě de qiūjì yǐnshí yīng jìzuǐ bǎoyǎng。
People with stomach illnesses should avoid certain foods in autumn.
这条小河的水是净水，可以放心饮用。
Zhè tiáo xiǎohé de shuǐ shì jìngshuǐ，kěyǐ fàngxīn yǐnyòng。
The water in this river is clean and safe to drink.
这地区饮用水的水质不好，全靠净化器净化。
Zhè dìqū yǐnyòngshuǐ de shuǐzhì bùhǎo，quánkào jìnghuàqì jìnghuà。
The water quality in this district is not good, so the water must be purified with cleaning cartridges.
老朋友重逢你不得剧饮几杯？
Lǎopéngyou chóngféng nǐ bùděi jùyǐn jǐ bēi？
Shouldn\'t you drink more when meeting old friends again?
他太渴了，见到水壶就抱着一通狂饮。
Tā tài kě le，jiàndào shuǐhú jiù bào zhe yítòng kuángyǐn。
He is so thirsty that he drinks heavily while holding a jug.
过多饮用矿泉水对身体无益。
Guòduō yǐnyòng kuàngquánshuǐ duì shēntǐ wúyì。
Excessive mineral water is not good for your health.
我们通过立井把食物和饮用水送到矿井下。
Wǒmen tōngguò lìjǐng bǎ shíwù hé yǐnyòngshuǐ sòngdào kuàngjǐng xià。
We send the food and water down into the mine through silos.
他对于饮食非常有研究，可以算得上是名副其实的美食家了。
Tā duìyú yǐnshí fēicháng yǒu yánjiū，kěyǐ suàndéshàng shì míngfùqíshí de měishíjiā le。
He researches diets carefully, and is a true epicure.
要想身体健康，就要多注意饮食营养配比。
Yào xiǎng shēntǐjiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì yǐnshí yíngyǎng pèibǐ。
Pay attention to the amount of nutrition in your food if you want to be healthy.
要想饮食健康，就要多注意合理配膳。
Yào xiǎng yǐnshí jiànkāng，jiùyào duō zhùyì hélǐ pèishàn。
You\'d better arrange different foods appropriately, if you want a healthy diet.
这里的水清凌凌的，可以直接饮用。
Zhèlǐ de shuǐ qīnglínglíng de，kěyǐ zhíjiē yǐnyòng。
The water here is clear and rippling and can be drunk directly.
由于暴饮暴食，他现在已经胖得没有人样儿了。
Yóuyú bàoyǐn bàoshí，tā xiànzài yǐjing pàng de méiyǒu rényàngr le。
Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is  really fat now.
这种饮料的营养价值甚于两个新鲜苹果。
Zhèzhǒng yǐnliào de yíngyǎng jiàzhí shènyú liǎnggè xīnxiān píngguǒ。
The nutritional value of this drink is better than two fresh apples.
那时候生番还过着茹毛饮血的原始生活呢。
Nà shíhou shēngfān hái guò zhe rúmáo yǐnxiě de yuánshǐ shēnghuó ne。
At that time, backward nationalities were still leading a primitive life in which they ate uncooked animals.
要说我喜欢的饮品，应该首推普洱茶。
Yào shuō wǒ xǐhuan de yǐnpǐn，yīnggāi shǒutuī pǔěrchá。
As to my favorite drink, I like pu\'er tea best.
难得老友重逢，我们要舒怀畅饮几杯！
Nándé lǎoyǒu chóngféng，wǒmen yào shūhuái chàngyǐn jǐ bēi！
It\'s a rare opportunity for us old friends to get together again, so let\'s relax and have fun!
“谢绝自带水酒”是餐饮行业的霸王条款，消费者有权反对。
“Xièjué zìdài shuǐjiǔ”shì cānyǐnhángyè de bàwángtiáokuǎn，xiāofèizhě yǒuquánfǎnduì。
&quot;No bring your own.&quot; is an overbearing rule in the catering industry, and consumers have the right to oppose it.
酸梅汤是很好的消暑饮品。
Suānméitāng shì hěnhǎo de xiāoshǔ yǐnpǐn。
Dark plum soup is the best thing to drink in summer.
酸牛奶有助于肠胃消化，很适合老人、儿童饮用。
Suānniúnǎi yǒuzhùyú chángwèi xiāohuà，hěnshìhé lǎorén、értóng yǐnyòng。
Yogurt can accelerate digestion in the bowels, and so is suitable for the elderly and children to drink.
这就是庭院主人饮宴的亭台。
Zhèjiùshì tíngyuàn zhǔrén yǐnyàn de tíngtái。
This is the pavilion in which the host arranges feasts.
他们约定在端阳佳节，共饮屠苏。
Tāmen yuēdìng zài duānyáng jiājié，gòngyǐn túsū。
They decided on drinking Tu Su (a kind of famous wine in ancient times) during the Dragon Boat Festival.
医生要求父亲饮食清淡，预防狭心症。
Yīshēng yāoqiú fùqīn yǐnshí qīngdàn，yùfáng xiáxīnzhèng。
The docter asked my father to have light diet to avoid angina.
据说天天饮用鲜奶有助于骨骼的生长。
Jùshuō tiāntiān yǐnyòng xiānnǎi yǒuzhùyú gǔgé de shēngzhǎng。
It is said that drinking milk every day can help your bones grow.
经常暴饮暴食对消化道有不良影响。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí duì xiāohuàdào yǒu bùliáng yǐngxiǎng。
Often eating and drinking too much is bad for the digestive system.
超市用雪柜储藏冷饮。
Chāoshì yòng xuěguì chǔcáng lěngyǐn。
The supermarket uses a refrigerator to store drinks.
那杯鸭蛋青的饮料谁喝了，我都不知道。
Nà bēi yādànqīng de yǐnliào shuí hē le，wǒ dōu bùzhīdào。
I don\'t even know who took that glass with the pale blue drink.
最近宴饮颇多，伤神伤身。
Zuìjìn yànyǐn pōduō，shāngshén shāngshēn。
Recently, I have to drink at many banquets, which is harmful to my nerves and health.
饮食业已经成为这个城市的支柱产业。
Yǐnshíyè yǐjing chéngwéi zhège chéngshì de zhīzhù chǎnyè。
The catering trade has become a mainstay for the city.
他们老同学正在饮宴，不要去打扰了。
Tāmen lǎotóngxué zhèngzài yǐnyàn，búyào qù dǎrǎo le。
These old classmates are having a drink together to celebrate;  we\'d better not interrupt them.
饮宴设在市政府接待中心，你可不要迟到啊！
Yǐnyàn shèzài shìzhèngfǔ jiēdài zhōng xīn，nǐ kě búyào chídào a！
The feast will be held at the reception center of the municipal government. Don\'t be late!
国家对饮用纯净水有严格的卫生规定。
Guójiā duì yǐnyòng chúnjìngshuǐ yǒu yángé de wèishēng guīdìng。
The state has strict hygienic regulations for potable water.
由于饮场时间太长，观众们等得有点不耐烦了。
Yóuyú yìnchǎng shíjiān tài cháng，guānzhòngmen děng de yǒudiǎn búnàifán le。
Having waited a long time for the actors\' drink break, the audience became a little impatient.
弼马温尽责尽职，经常到天河去饮马。
Bìmǎwēn jìnzé jìnzhí，jīngcháng dào tiānhé qù yìnmǎ。
The marshal is very responsible, and always waters the horses at Tian River.
经常暴饮暴食使他的体重增至200斤。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí shǐ tā de tǐzhòng zēngzhì èrbǎijīn。
His weight increased to 200 jin, because he eats and drinks too much at each meal.
念完祝酒词后，他一饮而尽。
Niànwán zhùjiǔcí hòu，tā yìyǐnérjìn。
After finishing the toast, he drank all the wine in the cup.
良好的饮食习惯可以预防动脉硬化。
Liánghǎo de yǐnshí xíguàn kěyǐ yùfáng dòngmài yìnghuà。
Good eating habits prevent one from getting arteriosclerosis.
虽然海水淡化技术能够将海水变为饮用淡水，但成本太昂贵，无法实现规模化。
Suīrán hǎishuǐ dànhuà jìshù nénggòuj iāng hǎishuǐ biànwéi yǐnyòng dànshuǐ，dàn chéngběn tài ángguì，wúfǎ shíxiàn guīmóhuà。
Seawater can be changed into fresh water through seawater desalination technology, but it cannot be mass produced due to its high cost.
她喜欢喝添加了柠檬酸的果味饮料。
Tā xǐhuan hē tiānjiā le níngméngsuān de guǒwèi yǐnliào。
She likes to drink fruit beverages containing citric acid.
饮食中的植物油是必不可少的。
Yǐnshí zhōng de zhíwùyóu shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
Vegetable oil is indispensable for a healthy diet.
你去冰冷饮，我来煮咖啡。
Nǐ qù bīnglěngyǐn，wǒ lái zhǔkāfēi。
You cool the drinks and I\'ll make the coffee.

qīngliáng yǐnliào

他和他的音乐吸引了一大批崇拜者的追随。
He hired someone to answer his fan mail.
Tā gùle gèrén bāng tā huífù chóngbàizhě de láixìn。
他雇了个人帮他回复崇拜者的来信。
I\'m adoringly staring the miracle maker in the face.
Wǒ chóngbài de kànzhe zhège qíjì de dìzàozhě。
我崇拜地看着这个奇迹的缔造者。
她很崇拜她父亲。
Tā hěn chóngbài tā fùqīn。
She worships her father.
崇拜偶像
chónɡbài ǒuxiànɡ
worship of idols; idolatry
盲目崇拜
mánɡmù chónɡbài
worship blindly
偶像崇拜
ǒuxiànɡ chónɡbài
idolatry
祖宗崇拜
zǔzonɡ chónɡbài 
ancestor (or ancestral) worship
个人崇拜往往带有主观性、盲目性。
Gèrén chóngbài wǎngwǎng dàiyǒu zhǔguānxìng、mángmùxìng。
Personality cults are always subjective and blind.
我对你的崇拜之情犹如滔滔江水延绵不绝。
Wǒ duì nǐ de chóngbài zhī qíng yóurú tāotāo jiāngshuǐ yánmián bùjué。
My admiration for you is like the flowing water which never ends.
他们都是我们崇拜的新时期的忠烈人士。
Tāmen dōushì wǒmen chóngbài de xīn shíqī de zhōng liè rénshì。
They are the martyrs of the new time who we respect very much.

mángmù chóngbài

我很崇拜他渊博的历史和政治知识。

Zài jiàotáng kěyǐ kàndào rénmen duì shén de chóngbài。

He and his music attracted a huge cult following.
Tā hé tā de yīnyuè xīyǐnle yídàpī chóngbàizhě de zhuīsuí。

很多早期宗教崇拜都以性为主要内容。
Her voice is absolutely sublime and needs to be heard.
Tā de gēshēng juéduì shì lìng rén chóngbài de，zhídé yì tīng。
她的歌声绝对是令人崇拜的，值得一听。
She often rebels at her mother \'s authority but idolizes her aunt.
Tā chángcháng duì tā māma de quánwēi chǎnshēng dǐkàng qíngxù，dànshì què chóngbài tā de gūmā。

He worships the almighty dollar.
Tā chóngbài cáifù。
他崇拜财富。
Many Hindus worship Shiva.

The whole country worshipped him.
Zhěnggè guójiā dōu chóngbài tā。
整个国家都崇拜他。
His respect for the law bordered on veneration.
Tā zūnzhòng fǎlǜ，jiǎnzhí dàole chóngbài de chéngdù。
他尊重法律，简直到了崇拜的程度。
He hired someone to answer his fan mail.
Tā gùle gèrén bāng tā huífù chóngbàizhě de láixìn。
他雇了个人帮他回复崇拜者的来信。
He looked at his wife adoringly.
Tā chóngbài de kànzhe tā qīzǐ。
他崇拜地看着他妻子。
These young men deify financial success.
Zhèxiē niánqīngrén chóngbài cáiwù shàng de chénggōng。
这些年轻人崇拜财务上的成功。
Many teenagers idolized the Beatles.
Xǔduō qīngshàonián jídù chóngbài jiǎqiàochóng yuèduì。
许多青少年极度崇拜甲壳虫乐队。
We venerate genius.
Wǒmen chóngbài tiāncái。
我们崇拜天才。
The French treat food with gentle reverence.

法国人崇拜食物，但不过分。
The tenor was lionized in Vienna.
Zhè wèi nángāoyīn zài Yuènán guǎng shòu chóngbài。
这位男高音在越南广受崇拜。
“崇高”总带有褒义。
“Chónggāo”zǒng dàiyǒu bāoyì。
The word 崇高 is always commendatory.
人人称颂他的崇高品德。
Rénrén chēngsòng tā de chónggāo pǐndé。
Everyone extols his noble qualities.
她很崇拜她父亲。
Tā hěn chóngbài tā fùqīn。
She worships her father.
崇拜偶像
chónɡbài ǒuxiànɡ
worship of idols; idolatry
崇高的理想
chónggāo de lǐxiǎng
a lofty ideal
崇高的威望
chónggāo de wēiwàng
high prestige
顺致最崇高的敬意。
Shùnzhì zuì chónggāo de jìngyì。
I avail myself of this opportunity to renew to you the assurances of my highest consideration.
我很崇敬这位老教授。
Wǒ hěn chóngjìngzhè wèi lǎojiàoshòu。
I have great respect for the old professor.
怀着十分崇敬的心情
huái zhe shífēn chóngjìng de xīnqíng
cherish a feeling of great reverence for
崇尚勤俭
chónɡshànɡ qínjiǎn 
advocate industry and thrift
盲目崇拜
mánɡmù chónɡbài
worship blindly
偶像崇拜
ǒuxiànɡ chónɡbài
idolatry
要实现一个崇高的目标，必须从切近处做起。
Yào shíxiàn yígè chónggāo de mùbiāo，bìxū cóngqièjìn chù zuòqǐ。
To achieve a lofty goal, we must proceed from what is close at hand.
推崇备至
tuīchónɡbèizhì 
have the greatest esteem for
享有崇高的威望
xiǎngyǒu chónggāo de wēiwàng
enjoy high prestige; be held in esteem
祖宗崇拜
zǔzonɡ chónɡbài 
ancestor (or ancestral) worship
崇山峻岭
chóngshānjùnlǐng
lofty ridges and towering mountains
尊崇
zūnchóng
worship; revere; venerate
这位大师的崇论闳议，我们一定要铭记于心。
Zhèwèi dàshī de chónglùn hóngyì，wǒmen yídìng yào míngjì yú xīn。
We must embalm the master\'s wise opinions.
让我们听听他的崇论宏议吧。
Ràng wǒmen tīngtīng tā de chónglùn hóngyì ba。
Let\'s listen to his wise remarks and intelligent opinions.
我们的队伍翻越崇山峻岭，终于到达了目的地。
Wǒmen de duìwu fānyuè chóngshān jùnlǐng，zhōng yú dàodá le mùdìdì。
After climbing across the toweringly steep mountains, our army finally reached their destination.
我们没必要崇洋媚外。
Wǒmen méibìyào chóngyángmèiwài。
There is no need for us to worship, or place blind faith in foreign things.
一直以来，我都非常崇仰这位老先生。
Yìzhí yǐlái，wǒ dōu fēicháng chóngyǎng zhèwèi lǎoxiānshēng。
I have always been admired this elderly gentleman.
《武成》篇：“敦信明义，崇德报功，垂拱而天下治。”
《Wǔchéng》piān：“dūnxìn míngyì，chóngdé bàogōng，chuígǒng ér tiānxiàzhì。”
个人崇拜往往带有主观性、盲目性。
Gèrén chóngbài wǎngwǎng dàiyǒu zhǔguānxìng、mángmùxìng。
Personality cults are always subjective and blind.
这个会首因为其崇高的品格而深受会员们的爱戴。
Zhège huìshǒu yīnwèi qí chónggāo de pǐngé ér shēnshòu huìyuánmen de àidài。
This organization leader won its members\' respect with his lofty sentiments.
儒学在汉代得到了统治者的推崇。
Rúxué zài Hàndài dédào le tǒngzhìzhě de tuīchóng。
Confucian teachings were advocated by rulers in the Han dynasty.
我崇敬的是光明磊落的人，痛恨的是势利小人。
Wǒ chóngjìng de shì guāngmínglěiluò de rén，tònghèn de shì shìlì xiǎorén。
The people I respect are straightforward ones; the ones I hate are snobs.
我对你的崇拜之情犹如滔滔江水延绵不绝。
Wǒ duì nǐ de chóngbài zhī qíng yóurú tāotāo jiāngshuǐ yánmián bùjué。
My admiration for you is like the flowing water which never ends.
作为医生，他们有着崇高的职业道德。
Zuòwéi yīshēng，tāmen yǒu zhe chónggāo de zhíyè dàodé。
As doctors, they have high professional morals.
他们都是我们崇拜的新时期的忠烈人士。
Tāmen dōushì wǒmen chóngbài de xīn shíqī de zhōng liè rénshì。
They are the martyrs of the new time who we respect very much.

tuīchóng

We paid tribute to the nurses who worked on the front line.

The majority revere him in spite of all the bad he\'s done

尽管他做过很多坏事，多数人还是都很崇敬他。
I think this man is just a little tin god.
Wǒ rènwéi zhège rén bù yīnggāi shòudào chóngjìng。
我认为这个人不应该受到崇敬。
We want to donate money to a good cause.
Wǒ xiǎng bǎ qián juānxiàn gěi chónggāo de shìyè。

村中自流井里的水源源不断地流向麦田。
Cūn zhōng zìliújǐng lǐ de shuǐ yuányuán búduàn dì liú xiàng màitián。
Water from the artesian well in the village is flowing continuously into the wheatland.
自流井。
In Libya, pumping water from wells has reduced the natural outflow.
Zài lìbǐyà，cóng jǐng lǐ bèng shuǐ yǐjīng jiǎnshǎole zìrán shuǐ de liúchū。
在利比亚，从井里泵水已经减少了自然水的流出。
油井终于喷油了。
Yóujǐng zhōngyú pēnyóule.
Finally oil gushed from the well.
钻一口油井
zuàn yìkǒu yóujǐng
drill (or bore) a well
油井
yóujǐng
oil well
打油井
dǎyóujǐng
dig an oil well
测量油井的深度
Cèliáng yóujǐng de shēndù
gauge the depth of an oil well
海洋石油钻井船
hǎiyángshíyóu zuànjǐngchuán
offshore oil drilling rig
海洋石油钻井平台
hǎiyángshíyóu zuànjǐngpíngtái
offshore oil drilling platform
石油从井口喷了出来。
Shíyóu cóngjǐngkǒu pēn le chūlái。
Oil gushed from the well.
一支能打硬仗的石油钻井队
yì zhī néngdǎ yìngzhàng de shíyóu zuànjǐngduì 
a drilling crew equal to the most formidable tasks
钻探队正在打油气井，准备开采天然气。
Zuāntànduì zhèngzài dǎ yóuqìjǐng，zhǔnbèi kāicǎi tiānránqì。
The drilling team is working on a petroleum associated gas well to exploit natural gas.
未下油管的井
wèi xià yóuguǎn de jǐng

连畜棚都井然有序。
The guerrillas still fire rockets from well inside the security perimeter.
Yóujīduì réngrán zài ānquán fànwéi nèi cóng jǐng xià fāshè xìnhàodàn。
游击队仍然在安全范围内从井下发射信号弹。
In Libya, pumping water from wells has reduced the natural outflow.
Zài lìbǐyà，cóng jǐng lǐ bèng shuǐ yǐjīng jiǎnshǎole zìrán shuǐ de liúchū。
在利比亚，从井里泵水已经减少了自然水的流出。
Her house is always so neat, despite her children.
虽然有好几个孩子，但她的房间总是井井有条的。
井口气
jǐnɡkǒuqì
wellhead gas; casinghead gas
井口装置
jǐnɡkǒu zhuānɡzhì
wellhead assembly
石油从井口喷了出来。
Shíyóu cóngjǐngkǒu pēn le chūlái。
Oil gushed from the well.
工作人员通过吊盘进出井口。
Gōngzuò rényuán tōngguò diàopán jìnchū jǐngkǒu。
Workers use hanging scaffolds to enter and get out of the well.
一口井
yì kǒu jǐnɡ
a well
第一口井井斜是1．7度。
Dìyīkǒu jǐng jǐngxié shì yīdiǎnqī dù。
The first well had a deviation of 1．7 degrees from the vertical.
雪把这口井埋起来了。
Xuě bǎ zhè kǒu jǐngmái qǐlái le。
The well is buried in snow.
这口井没打到含水层，当然不会出水。
Zhè kǒu jǐng méi dǎdào hánshuǐcéng，dāngrán búhuì chūshuǐ。
Haven\'t been dug into the water-bearing stratum, the well certainly will not produce water.
一口井
yìkǒu jǐng
one well
这口井有10米深。
Zhèkǒu jǐng yǒu shímǐ shēn。
This well is 10 metres (英) {或} meters (美) deep.
一口深井
yì kǒu shēn jǐng
a deep well
钻一口油井
zuàn yìkǒu yóujǐng
drill (or bore) a well
忙了半天，打出的却是口干井。
Máng le bàntiān，dǎchū de què shì kǒu gānjǐng。
After a long time of working hard, what they drilled turned out to be a dry well.
我打算在院子里挖一口渗井。
Wǒ dǎsuàn zài yuànzi lǐ wā yìkǒu shènjǐng。
I intend to dig a seepage pit in the courtyard.
打过下班铃后，井下的工人们就从坑口上来了。
Dǎguò xiàbān líng hòu，jǐngxià de gōngrénmen jiù cóng kēngkǒu shànglái le。
After the knock-off bell, workers came up from the mining pits.
矿井里发生了塌方，工人们都从通风口里逃生了。
Kuàngjǐng lǐ fāshēng le tāfāng，gōngrénmen dōu cóng tōngfēngkǒu lǐ táoshēng le。
The mine pit caved in, and the workers escaped via the air vent.
一口井
填上这口废井。
矿井里设有通风口。
The well is enclosed with a fence for children\'s safety.
为了孩子们的安全，这口井被用围栏围起来了。
You should have seen the depth of that well today.
Jīntiān nǐ běnyīng kànchū nà kǒu jǐng yǒu duō shēn。
今天你本应看出那口井有多深。
This well bears fresh water.
Zhè kǒu jǐng lǐ de shuǐ hěn qīngchè。
这口井里的水很清澈。
There was only a flask of water left in the entire well.
Zhěngkǒu jǐnglǐ zhǐ shèngxià yì píng shuǐ le。
整口井里只剩下一瓶水了。
The moon\'s reflection shone down in the well.
Yuèliang de dàoyǐng yìngzài nà kǒu jǐngli。
月亮的倒影映在那口井里。
The well was spudded in April.
Zhè kǒu jǐng shì zài sì yuèfèn yòng cǎochú wā chūlái de。
这口井是在四月份用草锄挖出来的。
The oil well delivered 20 barrels a day.
这口油井每天出20桶油。
Dig an oil well.
挖一口油井。
We can derive water from that old well.
我们可以从这口老井中汲水。
The door opens to the patio.
Ménkǒu duìzhe tiānjǐng。
门口对着天井。
井井有条地工作
jǐngjǐngyǒutiáo de gōngzuò
work methodically
各种仪器、工具摆得井井有条。
Gèzhǒng yíqì、gōngjù bǎi de jǐngjǐngyǒutiáo。
All the instruments and tools are kept in perfect order.
井井有条。
井井有条。
把家料理得井井有条
Her house is always so neat, despite her children.
虽然有好几个孩子，但她的房间总是井井有条的。
Everything inside the chest was in perfect condition.
衣柜里的东西井井有条。
I like to keep my work desk clear and clean.
我喜欢把我的办公桌整理得井井有条、干干净净。
I\'ve got to put my affairs in order.
Wǒ děi bǎ wǒ de shìwù chǔlǐ de jǐngjǐngyǒutiáo。
我得把我的事务处理得井井有条。
His life was almost too organized.
Tā de shēnghuó sìhū tài guòyú jǐngjǐng-yǒutiáo le。
他的生活似乎太过于井井有条了。
How well organized she is.
Tā shì duōme jǐngjǐng-yǒutiáo a。
她是多么井井有条啊。

Diàodào jǐng lǐ de háizi de mǔqīn zài jǐngbiān hǎn de yǐjing shēngsī lìjié le，jiùyuán gōngzuò hái zài jǐnzhāng de jìnxíng zhe。
The mother of the child who has fallen into the well has shouted herself hoarse. The succor is still going on tensely.
我们通过立井把食物和饮用水送到矿井下。
Wǒmen tōngguò lìjǐng bǎ shíwù hé yǐnyòngshuǐ sòngdào kuàngjǐng xià。

为了防止有人掉到井里，人们用木板把井盖上了。

他们在挖井时，无意中发现了一些古代文物。
Tāmen zài wā jǐngshí，wúyì zhōng fāxiàn le yìxiē gǔdài wénwù。
While digging a well they accidentally unearthed some ancient relics.

dòngjiéfǎ záojǐng

bèijǐnglíxiāng

油井
yóujǐng
oil well
井然
jǐngrán
orderly; neat and tidy; shipshape; methodical
枯井
kūjǐng
a dry well
花坛中间有个方形的暗井，不知道是做什么用的。
Huātánzhōngjiān yǒu gè fāngxíng de ànjǐng，bùzhīdào shì zuò shénme yòng de。
There is a covered shaft in the middle of the flowerbed. Nobody knows what it is for.
这个商店唱付唱收，井然有序。
Zhège shāngdiàn chàngfù chàngshōu，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This shop is in good order, calling out all the received and paid money.
我们一定要牢记这些前辈，吃水不忘挖井人。
Wǒmen yídìng yào láojì zhèxiē qiánbèi，chī shuǐ búwàng wājǐng rén。
We must remember the older generation, just as when drink  water we shouldn\'t forget those who dug the well.
石油勘探者们正在打井。
Shíyóu kāntànzhěmen zhèngzài dǎjǐng。
The oil explorers are drilling well.
工作人员通过吊盘进出井口。
Gōngzuò rényuán tōngguò diàopán jìnchū jǐngkǒu。
Workers use hanging scaffolds to enter and get out of the well.
有点点的野花点缀在这断井颓垣之中。
Yǒu diǎndiǎn de yěhuā diǎnzhuì zài zhè duànjǐng tuíyuán zhī zhōng。
There are wild flowers all around this dilapidated place.
忙了半天，打出的却是口干井。
Máng le bàntiān，dǎchū de què shì kǒu gānjǐng。
After a long time of working hard, what they drilled turned out to be a dry well.
这口井没打到含水层，当然不会出水。
Zhè kǒu jǐng méi dǎdào hánshuǐcéng，dāngrán búhuì chūshuǐ。
Haven\'t been dug into the water-bearing stratum, the well certainly will not produce water.
打水的人在井栏旁闲聊起来。
Dǎshuǐ de rén zài jǐnglán páng xiánliáo qǐlái。
People fetching water chat with each other by the rails of the well.
这根井绳快磨断了，换根新的吧。
Zhè gēn jǐngshéng kuài móduàn le，huàn gēn xīn de ba。
This well rope is worn; get a new one, please.
这次的历史考试考了“井田制”的内容。
Zhècì de lìshǐ kǎoshì kǎo le“jǐngtiánzhì”de nèiróng。
The students are tested on the content of &quot;the well-field system&quot; on their history exam.
这种保守的观点是井蛙之见，不值得提倡。
Zhèzhǒng bǎoshǒu de guāndiǎn shì jǐngwā zhījiàn，bù zhídé tíchàng。
These conservative opinions are shallow and limited, and not worthwhile to promote.
我们不能井中观天，目光短浅。
Wǒmen bùnéng jǐng zhōng guāntiān，mùguāng duǎnqiǎn。
We can not watch the sky from inside the well and be short-sighted.
矿工们下到坑井里工作是很辛苦的。
Kuànggōngmen xiàdào kēngjǐng lǐ gōngzuò shì hěnxīnkǔ de。
Working in mining pits is very hard for miners.
打过下班铃后，井下的工人们就从坑口上来了。
Dǎguò xiàbān líng hòu，jǐngxià de gōngrénmen jiù cóng kēngkǒu shànglái le。
After the knock-off bell, workers came up from the mining pits.
负责管理矿务的人员虽然不一定要下井，但也很辛苦。
Fùzé guǎnlǐ kuàngwù de rényuán suīrán bùyídìng yào xiàjǐng，dàn yě hěnxīnkǔ。
The mine\'s management works laboriously, though it is not necesary for them to work in the mining pit.
古时的井有圆柱式的也有棱台式的。
Gǔshí de jǐng yǒu yuánzhùshì de yě yǒu léngtáishì de。
Some ancient wells were of the shape of columns, some pyramids.
城市打工人员大多是离乡背井的农民。
Chéngshì dǎgōng rényuán dàduō shì líxiāngbèijǐng de nóngmín。
Most of the labours in cities are farmers who have left their native places.
这是一座蝶式立交桥，去往各个方向的车辆井然有序。
Zhè shì yízuò diéshì lìjiāoqiáo，qùwǎng gègè fāngxiàng de chēliàng jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This is a butterfly-shaped crossroads. The vehicles driving towards all directions are in good order.
在所以茶叶中，我最喜欢龙井茶的茶香。
Zài suǒyǐ cháyè zhōng，wǒ zuì xǐhuan lóngjǐngchá de cháxiāng。
I like the flavor of longjing tea best.
绿茶的品类有很多，我最喜欢的是雨前龙井。
Lǜchá de pǐnlèi yǒu hěnduō，wǒ zuì xǐhuan de shì yǔqián lóngjǐng。
Of the many kinds of green tea, I like Yuqian longjing tea most.
我打算在院子里挖一口渗井。
Wǒ dǎsuàn zài yuànzi lǐ wā yìkǒu shènjǐng。
I intend to dig a seepage pit in the courtyard.
矿井里发生了塌方，工人们都从通风口里逃生了。
Kuàngjǐng lǐ fāshēng le tāfāng，gōngrénmen dōu cóng tōngfēngkǒu lǐ táoshēng le。
The mine pit caved in, and the workers escaped via the air vent.
不知道这个矿井的铜矿储量是多少。
Bùzhīdào zhège kuàngjǐng de tóngkuàng chǔliàng shì duōshǎo。
I\'m wondering how much copper reserves there are in this mine.
他被公司开除了，你应该安慰一下他，不要再投井下石了。
Tā bèi gōngsī kāichú le，nǐ yīnggāi ānwèi yíxià tā，búyào zài tóujǐng xiàshí le。
He was fired by his company, stop making him feel worse and give him some comfort.
节日的王府井熙来攘往，很是热闹。
Jiérì de wángfǔjǐng xīlái rǎngwǎng，hěn shì rènào。
The Wangfujing street is very crowded, and lively during festivals.
部队在行进中衔尾相随，井然有序。
Bùduì zài xíngjìn zhōng xiánwěi xiāngsuí，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
The soldiers walk one by one in good order.
挥别乡井二十余载，我今天总算得以重回故里了。
Huībié xiāngjǐng èrshí yúzǎi，wǒ jīntiān zǒngsuàn déyǐ chónghuí gùlǐ le。
After more than 20 years, I was able to go back to my hometown today.
电影散场了，影院里秩序井然，人们相率走出。
Diànyǐng sànchǎng le，yǐngyuàn lǐ zhìxù jǐngrán，rénmén xiāngshuài zǒuchū。
The movie is over, and the audience walk out orderly.
我们昨天去王府井商场买了一双黄色的绣鞋。
Wǒmen zuótiān qù wángfǔjǐng shāngchǎng mǎi le yì shuāng huángsè de xiùxié。
Yesterday we bought a pair of yellow embroidered shoes at the Wangfujing Department Store.

jíshù zhàdàn

炸辣椒的味儿呛鼻子。
Zhá làjiāo de wèir qiàngbízi。

Díjī rēng le jǐ kē zhàdàn。

sǎntóu zhàdàn

zhàyào xìnguǎn

The whole class was in an uproar at the bad news.

这个音响炸弹威力十足。
Zhège yīnxiǎngzhàdàn wēilìshízú。
这种鞭炮的爆炸力极强。
Zhèzhǒng biānpào de bàozhàlì jíqiáng。

这可是一条爆炸性新闻！
Zhè kě shì yìtiáo bàozhàxìng xīnwén！
What sensational news that is!
昨晚，一个非法爆竹销售点发生了大爆炸。

Last night, a big explosion happened in an illegal firecracker shop.

The era of the internet, is the era of the proliferation of information.
爆炸的声音震得他耳根发麻。
Bàozhà de shēngyīn zhèn de tā ěrgēn fāmá。
The noise of the explosion made his ears numb.
哈喇油炸出来的食物对人体有害，不要吃。

在化学实验中，回流会造成试管炸裂。

In chemical experiments, circumfluence will lead to the explosion of test tubes.
火电站一定要禁止烟火，以防发生爆炸。

急火现炸，是做某些菜肴的一种很好的办法。

半夜里，一声炸雷使我从梦中惊觉。
Bànyèlǐ，yìshēng zhàléi shǐ wǒ cóng mèngzhōng jīngjué。
I woke up with a start to the sound of midnight thunder.
他特别喜欢吃开口笑之类的油炸点心。

每年过年时，我们家总要炸一些好吃的排杈儿。

警方在爆炸现场发现了燃烧瓶的残骸。

Méiqì xièlòu kěnéng shì bàozhà de yuányīn。
煤气泄漏可能是爆炸的原因。
Laser-guided bombs cannot be used in cloudy weather.

jíshù zhàdàn 
cluster bomb

遭到拒绝
zāodào jùjué
meet with refusal; be turned down

来者不拒
抗拒逮捕
kàngjù dàibǔ
resist arrest

坦白从宽，抗拒从严
Tǎnbái cóng kuān, kàngjù cóng yán
leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to
抗拒从严的道理你是知道的，不要再心存侥幸了！
Kàngjù cóngyán de dàolǐ nǐ shì zhīdào de，búyào zài xīncún jiǎoxìng le！
You are aware that resistance can only lead to severe punishment, so stop counting on luck!

Tǎnbái cóngkuān、kàngjù cóngyán shì wǒmen de yíguàn zhèngcè。
It is our consistent policy to give leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to do so.

My boss wants me to be in charge of a new project, but I refused.
老板想让我负责一个新计划，但被我婉拒了。
to decline to do sth
婉言拒绝做某事
to deny sb entrance
拒绝让某人入场
to exclude sb from sth
拒绝某人做某事
to reject sth in favour of sth else
拒绝某事转而选择另外某事
I gave him the chance to deny it
我给他机会拒绝
to reject/dismiss sth out of hand
不假思索地拒绝/抛弃某事
it would be impolite to refuse the invitation
拒绝邀请将会是没礼貌的
to draw the line at doing sth
拒绝做某事
He refused to name the members of staff involved.
他拒绝说出职工中参加者的姓名。
to refuse to do sth
拒绝做某事
to refuse sb sth
拒绝给某人某物
to shake one\'s head
摇头拒绝
he declined with a shake of his head
他摇摇头拒绝了
He had refused to turn over funds that had belonged to Potter.
他拒绝移交属于伯特的款项。

我知道汤米还在生我的气，因为今早他拒绝和我打招呼。

玛丽按常规提出申请，被拒绝了。

顾客拒绝付这件衣服的工钱，因为布料不是他原先选的那种。

我对他的回答的理解是拒绝。

我向简求婚，但是她拒绝了我。

咬咬牙干下去
yǎoyǎo yá gàn xiàqù
go at it with set (or clenched) teeth

yǎozhù yá běngzhù jìn 
clench one\'s teeth and strain one\'s muscles

yǎoyǎo yá gàn xiàqù
go at it with set (or clenched) teeth
咬住牙绷住劲
yǎozhù yá běngzhù jìn 
clench one\'s teeth and strain one\'s muscles
傀儡集团内部狗咬狗的斗争
kuǐlěi jítuán nèibùgǒu yǎo gǒu de dòuzhēng
a dog-eat-dog struggle within a puppet clique
咬紧牙关，一声也不叫唤
Yǎojǐn yáɡuān, yì shēnɡ yě bú jiàohuɑn。
clench one\'s teeth and not utter a sound
乱咬乱攀
luànyǎo luànpān
make wild charges, while under interrogation, to implicate others
咬紧牙根不说
yǎojǐn yágēn bùshuō
clench one\'s teeth and refuse to say anything
蚊子咬得腿上直痒痒。
Wénzi yǎo de tuǐ shàngzhí yǎngyang。
The mosquito bites on my legs itch terribly.
咬不动
yǎo bu dònɡ
too tough to bite (or chew)
咬一口
yǎo yì kǒu 
take a bite
被蛇咬了
bèi shé yǎo le
be bitten by a snake
这个旧螺母咬不住扣儿了。
Zhège jiù luómǔ yǎo bu zhù kòur le。
This old nut won\'t bite (or grip).
双方比分一直咬得很紧。
Shuāngfāngbǐfēn yìzhí yǎo de hěn jǐn。
The score was very close throughout the match.
鸡叫狗咬
jījiào ɡǒuyǎo
cocks crow and dogs bark
别咬好人。
Bié yǎo hǎorén。
Don\'t implicate the innocent.
我最怕漆咬。
Wǒ zuì pà qī yǎo。
I\'m allergic to paint. or My skin is allergic to paint.
这把刀埋在地里让土咬了。
Zhèbǎ dāo máizàidì lǐ ràng tǔ yǎo le。
The knife had been buried in the ground and was corroded.
这个字他咬不准。
Zhège zì tā yǎo bùzhǔn。
He can\'t pronounce this word correctly.
他咬紧牙关忍受。
Tā yǎojǐn yáɡuān rěnshòu。
He gritted his teeth and resolved to hold out.
恐惧和焦虑正咬啮着她的心。
kǒngjù hé jiāolǜ zhèngyǎoniè zhe tā de xīn。
Fear and anxiety were gnawing at her heart.
恨得直咬牙
hèn de zhí yǎoyá
gnash one\'s teeth in hatred
用嘴咬住绳子
yòngzuǐ yǎozhù shéngzi
grip the rope with one\'s teeth
别老咬住我那句话不放。
Bié lǎo yǎozhù wǒ nàjùhuà búfàng。
Don\'t keep nagging me about that remark of mine.
她咬字儿清楚。
Tā yǎozìr qīnɡchǔ。
Her articulation is clear.
他一口咬定当时他不在现场。
Tā yìkǒu yǎodìngdāngshí tā bú zài xiànchǎng。
He stated categorically that he was not at the scene of the crime.
字音咬得真
zìyīn yǎo de zhēn 
pronounce words distinctly
咬着嘴唇
yǎo zhe zuǐchún 
bite one\'s lips
咬字眼儿
yǎo zìyǎnr
be nitpicking on words
由于养狗人的疏于防范，致使多人被狗咬伤。
Yóuyú yǎnggǒu rén de shūyú fángfàn，zhìshǐ duōrén bèi gǒu yǎoshāng。
赤链蛇并没有毒，被咬伤也不用太担心。
Chìliànshé bìng méiyǒu dú，bèi yǎoshāng yě búyòng tài dānxīn。
Brown snake is not poisonous. You don\'t need to worry too much if you are bitten by it.
别老咬你的大拇指，想想怎么解决问题。
Bié lǎo yǎo nǐ de dàmǔzhǐ，xiǎngxiǎng zěnme jiějué wèntí。
Instead of biting your thumb, think about how to solve your problems.
这明明不是我干的，你这是倒咬一口。
Zhè míngmíng búshì wǒ gàn de，nǐ zhè shì dàoyǎo yì kǒu。
Obviously I haven\'t done it. You retaliated unjustly.
他挂起了蚊帐，以免蚊虫叮咬。
Tā guàqǐ le wénzhàng，yǐmiǎn wénchóng dīngyǎo。
He put up a mosquito-curtain in order not to be bitten by mosquitoes.
夏天的时候，很容易被毒虫咬伤。
Xiàtiān de shíhou，hěn róngyì bèi dúchóng yǎo shāng。
In the summer, we often get bitten by poisonous insects.
他被虼蚤咬了，浑身痛痒。
Tā bèi gèzao yǎo le，húnshēn tòngyǎng。
He has been bitten by a flea and is suffering from pain and itching.
请你放心，被这种盲蛇咬伤是不会中毒的。
Qǐng nǐ fàngxīn，bèi zhèzhǒng mángshé yǎoshāng shì búhuì zhòngdú de。
Rest assured! You will not be poisoned by a blind snake.
没想到老鼠居然把这个米囤咬了一个洞。
Méi xiǎngdào lǎoshǔ jūrán bǎ zhège mǐtún yǎo le yígè dòng。
It is surprising that mice have bitten a hole in the store of rice bamboo.
夏天涂抹花露水可以防止蚊蝇叮咬。
Xiàtiān túmò huālùshuǐ kěyǐ fángzhǐ wényíng dīngyǎo。
Using toilet water can help you to avoid mosquitos, or flies.
他强忍疼痛，咬破了自己的下唇。
Tā qiángrěn téngtòng，yǎopò le zìjǐ de xiàchún。
He bit his lower lip, and endured the pain.
这里小咬儿太多了，打点杀虫剂吧！
Zhèlǐ xiǎoyǎor tài duō le，dǎdian shāchóngjì ba！
There are too many biting bugs, spray some pesticide!
昨天他和小张打架了，胳臂上全是被咬的牙印。
Zuótiān tā hé Xiǎo Zhāng dǎjià le，gēbei shàng quánshì bèi yǎo de yáyìn。
He had a fight with Xiao Zhang yesterday and there are bite marks all over his arms.
他一口咬定了张明是凶手。
Tā yìkǒu yǎodìng le Zhāng Míng shì xiōngshǒu。
He insists that Zhang Ming is the murderer.
这羊有点咬群，赶快隔离开吧。
Zhè yáng yǒudiǎn yǎoqún，gǎnkuài gélí kāi ba。
The sheep is prone to fight within the flock, it should be isolated soon.
别理他，这人就是咬群。
Bié lǐ tā，zhè rén jiùshì yǎoqún。
Leave him alone, he is apt to pick a quarrel within a group.
他咬牙切齿地说出仇人的名字，吓我们一跳。
Tā yǎoyá qièchǐ de shuōchū chóurén de míngzi，xià wǒmen yítiào。
He spoke out his enemy\'s name between clinched teeth, which gives us a fright.
小孩子一开始说话总有点咬字不清。
Xiǎoháizi yì kāishǐ shuōhuà zǒng yǒudiǎn yǎozì bùqīng。
Children always pronounce indistinctly at the very start when they are able to speak.
他唱戏的时候特别讲究咬字。
Tā chàngxì de shíhou tèbié jiǎngjiū yǎozì。
He pays excessive attention to wording when he is acting in Chinese opera.
她委屈的哭了，咬着衣角，让人不忍再批评了。
Tā wěiqū de kū le，yǎo zhe yījiǎo，ràng rén bùrěn zài pīpíng le。

小事情可以成为大新闻，比如人咬了狗。
Xiǎoshìqing kěyǐ chéngwéi dàxīnwén，bǐrú rén yǎole gǒu。
Small things can become big news, for instance if a person bites a dog.
我们咬紧牙关渡过了难关。
Wǒmen yǎojǐnyáguān dùguòle nánguān。
We gritted our teeth through the tough times.
这个钳子太小，咬不住。
Zhège qiánzi tài xiǎo，yǎo bú zhù。
These pliers are too small – I can\'t get a grip.

Yǎowénjiáozì wèibì néng xiěchū hǎo wénzhāng。

It is undesirable to believe a proposition when there is no ground whatever for supposing it true.
Rúguǒ yí xiàng zhǔzhāng bù néng bèi rènhé lǐyóu chōngfèn zhèngmíng shì zhēnshí de huà，nàme zhè xiàng zhǔzhāng shì hěn nán ràng rén xīngānqíngyuàn de xiāngxìn tā de。
如果一项主张不能被任何理由充分证明是真实的话，那么这项主张是很难让人心甘情愿地相信它的。
As the glycerides in fat slowly decompose the acid value increases.
Suānzhí suízhe zhīfáng zhōng de gānyóuzhǐ huǎnmàn fēnjiě ér shēnggāo。
酸值随着脂肪中的甘油酯缓慢分解而升高。
They were deglycerolized by alternately centrifuging and mixing.
Tōngguò jiāotìxìng líxīn guòlǜ hé hùnhé，tāmen bèi qùdiào gānyóu。
通过交替性离心过滤和混合，它们被去掉甘油。
Fresh fats contain glycerides of fatty acids and very little free acid.
Xīnxiān zhīfáng bāohán zhīfángsuān de gānyóuzhǐ hé jí shǎoliàng de zìyóusuān。
新鲜脂肪包含脂肪酸的甘油酯和极少量的自由酸。

这是他从这场磨难里能找到的唯一的少许安慰。

Yīnyuè huánrǎozhe tā，fǔwèizhe tā jǐnzhāng de shénjīng。
音乐环绕着他，抚慰着他紧张的神经。
Gazzer let his breath out in a long exhalation of relief.
Gàizé\'ěr xīnwèi de chángcháng de sōngle kǒu qì。
盖泽尔欣慰地长长地松了口气。
It\'s a relief that this problem has been brought to a head.

这个问题已时机成熟了，这让人宽慰。
Miller\'s self-styled heroics were a cold comfort for his team leader.

米勒自我标榜的英雄事迹对他的主管来说算不上什么安慰。
I\'m trying to comfort him  for  his loss.

我在试着安慰他关于损失的事。
I comforted myself with the belief that my friend was right and I didn\'t need to worry.

我用这样的信念安慰自己：我的朋友是正确的，我无须担忧。
He went into this career to find a new cure.
Tā jìnrù zhè yì háng，yǐqiú zhǎodào xīn de wèijiè。
他进入这一行，以求找到新的慰藉。
My husband was endlessly reassuring about how I felt.

我丈夫不断安慰我。

没有人去安慰她考试的结果。
I just sank back into the cushions beaming with joy and relief.

zhēnduì tèshū értóng de tèshūjiàoyù guīdìng

这几乎发生在特殊教育的每个方面而且有可能在我们没有预见的前提下发生。
The mutes attended a special school to help them learn.

For many of those who are disabled from birth or during childhood，special education is obviously necessary.
Duìyú hěn duō xiāntiān cánjí huòzhě yòunián zhìcán de rén láishuō，tèshūjiàoyù xiǎnrán zhìguānzhòngyào。

I decided to go into special education two years after I qualified as a teacher.

获得教师资格两年后，我决定再对自己进行特殊教育。
Because of their special needs, many premature babies requires intensive care.
就是因为这些特殊的需要，许多早产儿需要特别护理。

He had a special antenna for public relations.

医院对这位特殊的病人施行了特护。
Yīyuàn duì zhèwèi tèshū de bìngrén shīxíng le tèhù。
The hospital gave special care to that patient.
这个管片比较特殊，外来人员较多，所以你要特别注意。
Zhège guǎnpiàn bǐjiào tèshū，wàilái rényuán jiàoduō，suǒyǐ nǐ yào tèbié zhùyì。
This administrative region is very special, with many people from other places. You should therefore pay more attention to it.
矛盾的普遍性(特殊性)
máodùn de pǔbiànxìng（tèshūxìng）
the universality (particularity) of contradiction
不适当地强调情况特殊
búshìdàng de qiángdiào qíngkuàngtèshū
lay undue stress on special circumstances
特殊情况
tèshū qínɡkuànɡ 
an exceptional case; special circumstances
他依借自己的特殊地位，大发横财。
Tā yījiè zìjǐ de tèshū dìwèi，dà fā héngcái。
He took advantage of his special position to make huge ill-gotten gains.
矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。
Máodùn de pǔbiànxìngjí yùyú máodùn de tèshūxìngzhī zhōng。
It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
对有特殊贡献的，要给以重奖。
Duì yǒu tèshū gòngxiàn de，yào gěiyǐ zhòngjiǎng。
Those who have made outstanding contribution should be amply rewarded.
这个港湾地形特殊，是绝佳的泊地。
Zhège gǎngwān dìxíng tèshū，shì juéjiā de bódì。
The special landform of this harbour makes it perfect anchor ground.
用特殊材料堆焊制成的零件，使用寿命更长。

Tā de gèxìng duì tā jùyǒu yì zhǒng tèshū de mèilì。
她的个性对他具有一种特殊的魅力。
Certain types of problems have unique solutions.

一些特定问题是具有特殊的解决方案。

He always reasons from the particular to the general.
Tā de tuīlùn zǒngshì cóng tèshū dào yìbān。
他的推论总是从特殊到一般。
A special agency set up in corporate form.

The singer had to be boosted onto the stage by a special contraption.

他讨论的是一般情况而忽略了特殊情况。
He had a special antenna for public relations.

他在处理公共关系方面有一种非常特殊的敏锐触角。

Yí gè rén zhǐyǒu zài dàliàng shǐyòng tèshū jìnéng míbǔ shìjué quēxiàn shí，cáinéng bèi shìwéi zhēnzhèng de mángrén。

在这种特殊情况下问她的年龄是很不明智的。

tǎnɡxià

Tā běn shì kěyǐ shūfu de tǎngzài chuáng shàng de，nàyàng tā yě néng dédào tóngyàng de fàngsōng xiàoguǒ。
她本是可以舒服地躺在床上的，那样她也能得到同样的放松效果。
The girl lay in her arms lifelessly.
Nǚhái háowúshēngqì de tǎng zài tā de huái zhōng。
女孩毫无生气地躺在她的怀中。
He forced himself to lie absolutely still.
Tā pòshǐ zìjǐ wánquán yídòngbúdòng de tǎngzhe。
他迫使自己完全一动不动地躺着。
Someone sedated with scopolamine has difficulty lying.
Yìxiē shǐyòng Dōngliángdàngjiǎn lái zhènjìng de rén huì chūxiàn tǎngxià kùnnan。
一些使用东莨菪碱来镇静的人会出现躺下困难。
He was lying in bed sleeplessly.
Tā tǎngzài chuáng shàng，shuìbùzháo。
他躺在床上，睡不着。
The little cottage nestles in the forest.

这座小村舍躺在树林的怀抱里。
She was stretched supinely on her back.
Tā sìzhī shēn kāi，yǎng miàn tǎngzhe。
她四肢伸开，仰面躺着。

He was sprawling languorously on the sofa.
Tā píjuàn de píng tǎng zài shāfā shàng。
他疲倦地平躺在沙发上。
He is such a sprawler he needs a bed to himself.

Dead bodies strewed the ground.

尸体横七竖八地躺在地上。
He fell morosely on the bed.
Tā chóuméikǔliǎn de tǎng zài chuáng shàng。
他愁眉苦脸地躺在床上。
He lay doggo.
Tā tǎngzhe yídòngbúdòng。
他躺着一动不动。
Mao reposes in his mausoleum.
Máozédōng tǎngzài tā de língmù zhōng。
毛泽东躺在他的陵墓中。
A dextral flatfish lies with the right eye uppermost.

右侧比目鱼躺着时右边的眼睛朝上。
I feel like staying in bed all day.
Wǒ zhēn xiǎng yì zhěng tiān dōu tǎngzài chuáng shàng。
我真想一整天都躺在床上。
Lie down on the bed until you feel better.
Zài chuáng shàng píng tǎngzhe，zhídào nǐ gǎnjué hǎoxiē wéizhǐ。
在床上平躺着，直到你感觉好些为止。
Even as he lay dying they argued over his estate.
Tā tǎngzài chuángshàng hái méiyǒu yànqìr，tāmen jiù kāishǐ wèi tā de cáichǎn zhēngchǎo qǐlái。
他躺在床上还没有咽气儿，他们就开始为他的财产争吵起来。
你们躺好了再睡，别横躺竖卧的。
Nǐmen tǎnghǎo le zài shuì，bié héngtǎng shùwò de。

Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。

The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
北方的春城景色虽美，但经常有沙尘暴。

Though spring cities in the north are very beautiful, sand storms strike there frequently.
今年春上的沙尘暴很严重。
Jīnnián chūnshàng de shāchénbào hěnyánzhòng。
The sand storms are very serious this spring.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。

Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
人类乱砍滥伐，终于酿成了沙尘暴这杯苦酒！
Rénlèi luànkǎn lànfá，zhōng yú niàngchéng le shāchénbào zhè bēi kǔjiǔ！
Man cuts trees at random, finally causing a deplorable consequence --- the sand storm.

huīchén 
dust; dirt

The ceiling is covered with dust. We have to clean it.
高处的灰尘一定要用鸡毛帚才打扫得到。

这些书被沙尘暴带来的灰尘弄脏了。
I came back after vacation, and my room was so dusty.
度假回来后，我的房间里积满了灰尘。
We need to paint the walls again, the dust blacked them.
墙壁被灰尘弄脏了，我们得再刷一遍。
It is a busy, dusty, colorless city.
这是一个熙熙攘攘、满是灰尘而又平淡乏味的城市。
A film of dust covered every surface.
薄薄的一层灰尘覆盖了每一处表面。
a tiny speck of dust
一小粒灰尘
These borings consist of rock fragments, ash, coal and other materials.
这些孔屑包括石头碎片、灰尘、煤渣和其他东西。

因为隔壁施工，门把手上落了一层灰尘。

前几阵强风可以清除很大一部分灰尘。

他妻子戴着面纱来遮住面部，以防路上的灰尘。
The south tower crumpled to the ground in a suffocating cloud.
Nán tǎ chèdǐ bēngtā chéngle suìpiàn，yángqǐ ràng rén zhìxī de huīchén。
南塔彻底崩塌成了碎片，扬起让人窒息的灰尘。
She saw the little mouse lying dead in its corner covered in dust.
Tā kànjiàn xiǎo lǎoshǔ héngshī zài jiǎoluò lǐ，quánshēn bèi huīchén fùgài。
她看见小老鼠横尸在角落里，全身被灰尘覆盖。
I would rather taste ash on my tongue than blood in my mouth.
Wǒ gèng néng zhùyì dào shétou shàng huīchén de wèidào érbúshì zuǐ zhōng xiānxuè de wèidào。
我更能注意到舌头上灰尘的味道而不是嘴中鲜血的味道。
Nigel was on his knees brushing the soil away from the green glass bottle.
Nàijié\'ěr guìzhe shuā yí gè lǜsè bōlǐpíng shàng de huīchén。
奈杰尔跪着刷一个绿色玻璃瓶上的灰尘。
There was a fine film of dust on the the piano.
Gāngqín shàng yǒu yì céng báobáo de huīchén。

I stood up and brushed myself down.

the world of mortals; human society

Tā yǐ kànpò hóngchén，luòfà wéi sēng。
He has seen through the vanity of life and the world, so he took tonsure and became a Buddhist monk.
红尘攘攘，一切都犹如过眼云烟。

All the hustle and bustle in the world is as transient as fleeting clouds.
没过多久，她也看破红尘，削发为尼了。

The white dust of the road started to dull the shine of all the shoes.

房子的阴影投射在满是尘土的路上。
A tower of dust rose above the horizon.
Yì gǔ chéntǔ cóng dìmiàn shàng yángqǐ。
一股尘土从地面上扬起。
Blown soil mounded on the window sill.
