The fragile land quickly lost its topsoil and became nothing but sand and dust.
那单薄的土地很快就失去了表土，成为沙粒和尘埃。
一入禅门，你要抛却自己对于尘世的眷恋。

You have to discard your yearnings for the profane world once you become a monk.
他一直想剪发出家，以了却尘世的烦恼。

In order to free himself of secular worries he has been thinking of cutting his hair and become a monk.
贫道脱离尘世，现在在武当山隐居。

I am isolated from mortal life, and lead a monastic life on Mt. Wudang.
脱离尘世，遁入空门
世俗尘嚣
Nothing good could come of things here below.
Chénshìjiān méiyǒu shénme hǎo dōngxi。
尘世间没有什么好东西。
It\'s pretty much the same here below.
Tā zài chénshì jiān jīhū shì xiāngtóng de。
它在尘世间几乎是相同的。
She died to worldly things and eventually entered a monastery.
Tā duì chénshì yǐ wú juànliàn zhī yì，suǒyǐ zuìhòu dùnrù kōngmén。
她对尘世已无眷恋之意，所以最后遁入空门。

几个世纪过后，这些坍塌的大楼看起来只不过是一堆尘土而已。
清理尘封多年的旧资料
沙尘暴来临时，空气中飘浮着浓密的黄尘。
Shāchénbào láilín shí，kōngqì zhōng piāofú zhe nóngmì de huángchén。
When the sandstorms are coming, dense yellow dust floats in the sky.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。
Guójiā duìyú shāchénbào de zhìlǐ yǐjing chūjiàn chéngxiào。
The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
北方的春城景色虽美，但经常有沙尘暴。
Běifāng de chūnchéng jǐngsè suī měi，dàn jīngcháng yǒu shāchénbào。
Though spring cities in the north are very beautiful, sand storms strike there frequently.
今年春上的沙尘暴很严重。
Jīnnián chūnshàng de shāchénbào hěnyánzhòng。
The sand storms are very serious this spring.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。
Yóuyú guāqǐ le shāchénbào，zhěnggè chéngshì huángshā màntiān。
Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
人类乱砍滥伐，终于酿成了沙尘暴这杯苦酒！
Rénlèi luànkǎn lànfá，zhōng yú niàngchéng le shāchénbào zhè bēi kǔjiǔ！
Man cuts trees at random, finally causing a deplorable consequence --- the sand storm.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
未来的几天将有沙尘暴。
Wèilái de jǐtiān jiāng yǒu shāchénbào。
In the next few days there will be a sandstorm.
来了沙尘暴，尘雾漫天。

他脸上挂了一层尘土。
Tā liǎn shàngguà le yì céngchéntǔ。
His face was covered with dust.
大风过后，桌上落了一层灰尘。
Dàfēngguò hòu，zhuō shàngluò le yì cénghuīchén。
After the wind, there was a layer of dust on the desk.
掸掉桌上的灰尘
dǎndiào zhuō shàng de huīchén 
dust the table
静电除尘器
jìnɡdiàn chúchénqì
electrostatic precipitator
汽车飞驰而过，卷起一阵尘土。
Qìchē fēichí ér guò，juǎnqǐ yízhèn chéntǔ。
A car sped past, raising a cloud of dust.
煤尘爆炸
méichén bàozhà 
coal-dust explosion
蒙上一层灰尘
méngshàngyì cénghuīchén
be covered with a layer of dust
扑打身上的尘土
pūdǎ shēn shàng de chéntǔ
dust one\'s clothes
子弹把尘土打得噗噗直冒烟。
Zǐdàn bǎ chéntǔ dǎ de pūpū zhí màoyān。
Bullets whipped up the dust.
卡车驶过，扬起一片沙尘。
Kǎchē shǐguò，yángqǐ yípiàn shāchén。
The lorry raised a cloud of dust as it drove by.
所谓和战问题竟闹得甚嚣尘上。
Suǒwèi hézhàn wèntí jìng nào de shènxiāochénshàng。
A great clamor arose around the question of peace or war.
拭除镜面上的灰尘
shìchú jìngmiàn shàng de huīchén
wipe the dust off the mirror; dust the mirror
把帽子上的灰尘弹掉
bǎ màozi shàng de huīchén tándiào
flick the dust off a hat
真空吸尘器
zhēnkōngxīchénqì 
vacuum cleaner
一公顷松林一年可吸滞灰尘约36.4吨。
Yì gōngqǐng sōnglín yìnián kě xīzhì huīchén yuē sānshíliùdiǎnsì dūn。
One hectare of pine forest can retain 36.4 tons of dust annually.
室内窗明几净，纤尘不染。
Shì nei chuāngmíngjījìng，xiānchénbùrǎn。
The room is bright and spotlessly clean.
消烟除尘
xiāoyān chúchén
eliminate smoke and dust
他晓行夜宿，风尘仆仆，一路来到陕西。
Tā xiǎoxíngyèsù，fēngchénpúpú，yí lù lái dào Shǎnxī。
Travelling by day and resting by night, he came to the Province of Shaanxi, travel-worn and weary.
烟道尘
yāndàochén
flue dust
扬起灰尘
yánɡqǐ huīchén
raise (or kick up) a dust
身居闹市，一尘不染
Shēn jū nàoshì, yìchénbùrǎn
remain uncontaminated amidst the temptations of a big city
花草可以防风滞尘。
Huācǎo kěyǐ fángfēngzhìchén。
Flowers and grass can cut down wind and dust.
灰尘
huīchén 
dust; dirt
红尘
hóngchén
the world of mortals; human society
纤尘
xiānchén
fine dust
她扫地总是很用力，灰尘都播扬起来了。
Tā sǎodì zǒngshì hěnyònglì，huīchén dōu bōyáng qǐlái le。
She sweeps the ground with too much force, raising a lot of dust.
一入禅门，你要抛却自己对于尘世的眷恋。
Yí rù chánmén，nǐ yào pāoquè zìjǐ duìyú chénshì de juànliàn。
You have to discard your yearnings for the profane world once you become a monk.
长期在这种环境下工作会吸入许多尘毒。
Chángqī zài zhèzhǒng huánjìng xià gōngzuò huì xīrù xǔduō chéndú。
You will inhale a lot of poisonous dust if you work under this condition for a long time.
没想到她这样年纪轻轻就撒手尘寰了。
Méi xiǎngdào tā zhèyàng niánjì qīngqīng jiù sāshǒu chénhuán le。
We could never have expected she would leave the human world so early.
望着苍茫的大海，他突然觉得自己如同尘芥般渺小。
Wàng zhe cāngmáng de dàhǎi，tā tūrán juédé zìjǐ rútóng chénjiè bān miǎoxiǎo。
Looking at the vast ocean, he suddenly had the feeling that he was as insignificant as dirt.
冒着飞扬的尘沙，他赶去看望一位朋友。
Mào zhe fēiyáng de chénshā，tā gǎnqù kànwàng yíwèi péngyou。
He hurried off to visit a friend even as dust, and sand blew outside.
对于尘事中的纷争，他已经无心过问了。
Duìyú chénshì zhōng de fēngzhēng，tā yǐjing wúxīn guòwèn le。
He isn\'t concerned with world affairs.
他决定超脱尘网，一意修行。
Tā juédìng chāotuō chénwǎng，yíyì xiūxíng。
He decided to detach himself from the human world, and practice Buddhism.
最近污染比较严重，空气中含有大量尘雾。
Zuìjìn wūrǎn bǐjiào yánzhòng，kōngqì zhōng hányǒu dàliàng chénwù。
It\'s severely polluted, there is a great deal of smog in the atmosphere.
外面尘雾迷天，最好戴上口罩。
Wàimiàn chénwù mítiān，zuìhǎo dàishàng kǒuzhào。
The smog is so thick that you\'d better wear a respirator.
深山中的这座小屋真是个与尘嚣隔绝的好地方。
Shēnshān zhōng de zhèzuò xiǎowū zhēn shì gè yǔ chénxiāo géjué de hǎo dìfāng。
The hut is hidden on a remote mountain, and is really a good place to escape from busy city life.
那座老房子的彩绘承尘很漂亮。
Nà zuò lǎofángzi de cǎihuì chéngchén hěnpiàoliàng。
The coloured drawing on the ceiling of that old house is beautiful.
今天早晨我用吸尘器把屋里抽吸得很干净。
Jīntiān zǎochén wǒ yòng xīchénqì bǎ wūlǐ chōuxī de hěngānjìng。
This morning I thoroughly cleaned the room with a dust catcher.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。
Guójiā duìyú shāchénbào de zhìlǐ yǐjing chūjiàn chéngxiào。
The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
这台空凋有除尘功能，妈妈很喜欢。
Zhètái kōngtiáo yǒu chúchén gōngnéng，māma hěnxǐhuan。
This air-conditioner can get rid of the dust, so my mother likes it very much.
北方的春城景色虽美，但经常有沙尘暴。
Běifāng de chūnchéng jǐngsè suī měi，dàn jīngcháng yǒu shāchénbào。
Though spring cities in the north are very beautiful, sand storms strike there frequently.
今年春上的沙尘暴很严重。
Jīnnián chūnshàng de shāchénbào hěnyánzhòng。
The sand storms are very serious this spring.
大雄宝殿内，香烟缭绕，到处一尘不染。
Dàxióngbǎodiàn nèi，xiāngyān liáorào，dàochù yìchénbùrǎn。
In the Hall of Sakyamuni, smoke of incense curls up. It is unstained by an evil environment.
吊顶上沾满了灰尘，我们要把它清扫一下。
Diàodǐng shàng zhānmǎn le huīchén，wǒmen yào bǎ tā qīngsǎo yíxià。
The ceiling is covered with dust. We have to clean it.
火箭升空时，巨大的反推力吹起好多热浪烟尘。
Huǒjiàn shēngkōng shí，jùdà de fǎntuīlì chuī qǐ hǎo duō rèlàng yānchén。
The enormous reacting force raised a lot of heat and dust when the missile blasted off.
这个工厂在治理粉尘污染方面下了不少功夫。
Zhège gōngchǎng zài zhìlǐ fěnchén wūrǎn fāngmiàn xià le bùshǎo gōngfu。
This plant paid great attention to dealing with dust pollution.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。
Yóuyú guāqǐ le shāchénbào，zhěnggè chéngshì huángshā màntiān。
Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
高处的灰尘一定要用鸡毛帚才打扫得到。
Gāochù de huīchén yídìng yào yòng jīmáozhǒu cái dǎsǎo de dào。
You have to use a chicken-feather duster to clean the dust in high places.
他一直想剪发出家，以了却尘世的烦恼。
Tā yìzhí xiǎng jiǎnfà chūjiā，yǐ liǎoquè chénshì de fánnǎo。
In order to free himself of secular worries he has been thinking of cutting his hair and become a monk.
环境部门加大力度改善环境，市区降尘量明显下降。
Huánjìng bùmén jiādà lìdù gǎishàn huánjìng，shìqū jiàngchénliàng míngxiǎn xiàjiàng。
The fall of dust has obviously reduced since environmental protection departments determined  to improve the environment.
人类乱砍滥伐，终于酿成了沙尘暴这杯苦酒！
Rénlèi luànkǎn lànfá，zhōng yú niàngchéng le shāchénbào zhè bēi kǔjiǔ！
Man cuts trees at random, finally causing a deplorable consequence --- the sand storm.
色、声、香、味、触、法是佛教中所指的六尘。
Sè、shēng、xiāng、wèi、chù、fǎ shì fójiào zhōng suǒzhǐ de liùchén。
Eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body and mind are the six blemishes of Buddhism.
这些天家里没人，家具上有落尘是难免的。
Zhèxiē tiān jiā lǐ méirén，jiājù shàng yǒu luòchén shì nánmiǎn de。
Dust is inevitable since no one has lived in the house for several days.
他已看破红尘，落发为僧。
Tā yǐ kànpò hóngchén，luòfà wéi sēng。
He has seen through the vanity of life and the world, so he took tonsure and became a Buddhist monk.
首都马上就要失守了，皇帝只能蒙尘出逃了。
Shǒudū mǎshàng jiùyào shīshǒu le，huángdì zhǐnéng méngchén chūtáo le。
The capital will be captured soon, so the emperor has to go into exile.
贫道脱离尘世，现在在武当山隐居。
Píndào tuōlí chénshì，xiànzài zài Wǔdāngshān yǐnjū。
I am isolated from mortal life, and lead a monastic life on Mt. Wudang.
他一路风尘仆仆地赶来，只为了见上你一面。
Tā yílù fēngchénpúpú de gǎnlái，zhǐ wèi le jiàn shàng nǐ yí miàn。
He endured the hardships of a long journey just to see you once.
红尘攘攘，一切都犹如过眼云烟。
Hóngchén rǎngrǎng，yíqiè dōu yóurú guòyǎn yúnyān。
All the hustle and bustle in the world is as transient as fleeting clouds.
这座破庙里的石像已经破烂不堪，上面布满了蜘蛛网和灰尘。
Zhèzuò pòmiào lǐ de shí xiàng yǐjing pòlàn bùkān，shàngmiàn bùmǎn le zhīzhūwǎng hé huīchén。
The stone figures in this dilapidated temple are already in decay, covered with cobwebs and dust.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
这批无尘粉笔的质量不错，再去买一些吧！
Zhè pī wúchén fěnbǐ de zhìliàng búcuò，zài qù mǎi yìxiē ba！
The dustless chalk is of good quality, go and get some more.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
没过多久，她也看破红尘，削发为尼了。
Méiguò duōjiǔ，tā yě kànpò hóngchén，xuēfā wéiní le。
Before long, she saw through the emptiness of the material world and took tonsure.
你应该在扬尘天气的时候减少出行。
Nǐ yīnggāi zài yángchén tiānqì de shíhou jiǎnshǎo chūxíng。
You should reduce your travel during dusty weather.
北京为了改善环境，积极治理扬尘天气。
Běijīng wèile gǎishàn huánjìng，jījí zhìlǐ yángchén tiānqì。
To improve the environment, many measures have been taken to reduce and control flying dust.
通过高倍太空望远镜可以清楚地看到宇宙尘。
Tōngguò gāobèi tàikōng wàngyuǎnjìng kěyǐ qīngchu de kàndào yǔzhòuchén。
Through high-power space telescopes, people can see cosmic dust clearly.

他因看破红尘而出家了。
Tā yīn kànpòhóngchén ér chūjiāle.
He became a monk because he was disillusioned with the world.
望尘莫及
wàngchénmòjí
be too far behind to catch up
未来的几天将有沙尘暴。
Wèilái de jǐtiān jiāng yǒu shāchénbào。
In the next few days there will be a sandstorm.
大厅明亮宽敞，一尘不染。
Dàtīng míngliàng kuānchǎng，yìchénbùrǎn。
The great hall was bright and spacious – and spotless.

a whirl of dust
旋转的尘埃柱；一阵尘旋风
The books were dirty from the dust that came from the sandstorm.
这些书被沙尘暴带来的灰尘弄脏了。
The suction head for the vacuum cleaner improves cleaning performance.
Zhēnkōng xīchénqì de xīrù yā tóu gǎishànle xīchén xiàonéng。
真空吸尘器的吸入压头改善了吸尘效能。
The dust was sucked into the vacuum.
Huīchén bèi juǎnjìn zhēnkōng xīchénqì lǐ。
灰尘被卷进真空吸尘器里。
aspirating dust into the lungs

尘埃
a rain of ashes
尘雨
The rain settled the dust.
雨使尘埃平息了。
A dust particle weighs only a thousandth of a gram.
一粒尘埃的重量仅有千分之一克。
This product cleans off all the rust.
该产品能够彻底除尘。
I came back after vacation, and my room was so dusty.
度假回来后，我的房间里积满了灰尘。
We need to paint the walls again, the dust blacked them.
墙壁被灰尘弄脏了，我们得再刷一遍。
It is a busy, dusty, colorless city.
这是一个熙熙攘攘、满是灰尘而又平淡乏味的城市。
Her face was dirty and covered with dust.
她的脸很脏，满是尘土。
In a few centuries the collapsed building looks very much like a mound of earth.
几个世纪过后，这些坍塌的大楼看起来只不过是一堆尘土而已。
A film of dust covered every surface.
薄薄的一层灰尘覆盖了每一处表面。

Local observatory alerted residents that there would be a dust storm the next day.
当地气象台通知居民第二天可能会有沙尘暴。

这些孔屑包括石头碎片、灰尘、煤渣和其他东西。
This new product is rustproof, dustproof, and unbreakable.
这种新产品防锈，防尘并且摔不坏。
Scientists want to investigate the relation between xerophthalmia occurrence and smut contiguity.
科学家们打算探讨干眼症与煤尘接触之间的关系。
She crawled on the floor under the smoke until she was safe.
为了躲避烟尘，他在地板上爬行，直到找到安全的地方。
A layer of dust was deposited on the handle of the door by the construction next door.
因为隔壁施工，门把手上落了一层灰尘。
The fragile land quickly lost its topsoil and became nothing but sand and dust.
那单薄的土地很快就失去了表土，成为沙粒和尘埃。
The trim desk was spotless.
Zhè zhāng zhěngjié de zhuōzi yìchénbùrǎn。
这张整洁的桌子一尘不染。
Quite a bit of dust can be expelled with the first few blasts of air.
Qián jǐ zhèn qiángfēng kěyǐ qīngchú hěn dà yíbùfēn huīchén。
前几阵强风可以清除很大一部分灰尘。
A slight breeze stirred my hair, and I blinked dust out of my silver eyes.
Yízhèn qīngfēng chuī luàn le wǒ de tóufa，wǒ zhǎzhǎ yǎnjing，bǎ chuī jìn yǎnjing de chéntǔ zhǎ chūlái。
一阵清风吹乱了我的头发，我眨眨眼睛，把吹进眼睛的尘土眨出来。
First brush away the dust and dirt.
Shǒuxiān shuā diào huīchén hé wūwù。
首先刷掉灰尘和污物。
As the smoke cleared and the dust settled, two soldiers approached.
Yānwù sànqù，chén\'āi luòdìng，liǎng gè zhànshì zǒujìn le。
烟雾散去，尘埃落定，两个战士走近了。
His wife wore a veil to cover her face against the dust of the road.
Tā qīzi dàizhe miànshā lái zhēzhù miànbù，yǐfáng lùshàng de huīchén。
他妻子戴着面纱来遮住面部，以防路上的灰尘。

用推拿疗法治疗疼痛

睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
科学家宣称：目前他们发现了一种方法，可能将会使癌症治疗取得开创性进展。

The scientists claim that they have now found a new method that may bring about innovative developments for cancer treatments.
土法治疗。
Analysis, psychotherapy and the chemical and physical therapies all treat the patient alone.

an empirical remedy
经验主义的治疗法

她很适合做催眠治疗法的受试对象。

The treatment approach is illustrated by a description of case in which it was used.
Zhìliáo fāngfǎ shì tōngguò yí lèi ànlì lái shuōmíng de。
治疗方法是通过一类案例来说明的。

一些老年病的病因和治疗方法可以找到。

这种治疗方法使我痊愈了。

她领导这项寻找疾病治疗方法的工作。
Radiosensitive cancer cells can be treated with radiotherapy.

放射性癌细胞可以通过放射疗法来治疗。
Doctor Murphy has been analyzing Chris for two months but there was little progress.
墨菲医生用精神分析法治疗克理斯两个月了，但几乎没有成效。
Drugs have become a sickness they cannot cure.
Dúyǐn yǐjīng chéngwéi wúfǎ zhìliáo de jíbìng。
毒瘾已经成为无法治疗的疾病。
The scientist broke his neck, trying to find a cure for cancer.
Zhège kēxuéjiā pīnmìng xiǎng zhǎodào zhìliáo áizhèng de fāngfǎ。
这个科学家拼命想找到治疗癌症的方法。
Will they never find a cure for the common cold?
Tāmen yǒngyuǎn yě bù néng zhǎodào zhìliáo gǎnmào de fāngfǎ ma？
他们永远也不能找到治疗感冒的方法吗？
The only valid remedy for this patient is open heart surgery.
唯一能治疗这个病人的方法就是体外循环心脏手术。
Treatments for various illnesses are readily available.
Zhìliáo gè zhǒng jíbìng de fāngfǎ dōushì xiànchéng de。
治疗各种疾病的方法都是现成的。
Yet there is often no effective therapy for these diseases.
Mùqián shàng méiyǒu yǒuxiào zhìliáo zhèxiē jíbìng de liáofǎ。
目前尚没有有效治疗这些疾病的疗法。
Holistic medicine treats the mind as well as the body.
Zhěngtǐ liáofǎ shì shēnxīn jù zhì。
整体疗法是身心俱治。
预防和治疗并重
yùfáng hé zhìliáo bìng zhòng 
lay equal stress on prevention and cure
给治疗带来不便
gěi zhìliáo dàilái búbiàn 
hamper medical treatment
得到及时治疗
dédào jíshí zhìliáo 
get timely medical treatment
谁要是能够找到治疗癌症的方法，那真是功德无量。
Shuí yàoshì nénggòu zhǎodào zhìliáo áizhèng de fāngfǎ，nà zhēnshì gōngdé wúliàng。
Whoever finds a cure for cancer will render a great service to mankind.
治疗大面积烧伤
zhìliáo dàmiànjī shāoshāng
treat extensive burns
住院治疗
zhùyuàn zhìliáo 
be hospitalized
治疗效果
zhìliáo xiàoɡuǒ 
therapeutic effect
她还在医院治疗。
Tā hái zài yīyuàn zhìliáo。
She is still under treatment in hospital.
预防胜于治疗。
Yùfángshèngyú zhìliáo。
Prevention is better than cure.
治疗
zhìliáo
treat; cure
这位赤脚医生有治疗白浊的偏方。
Zhèwèi chìjiǎo yīshēng yǒu zhìliáo báizhuó de piānfāng。
The doctor has a way to treat gonorrhea.
赤带是一种妇科病，要及时发现及时治疗。
Chìdài shì yìzhǒng fùkēbìng，yào jíshí fāxiàn jíshí zhìliáo。
Leucorrhea is a type of gynecological disease that is characterized by a bloody discharge.  It should be detected, and treated as soon as possible.
这起事故的原因待查，我们先安排伤员住院治疗。
Zhè qǐ shìgù de yuányīn dàichá，wǒmen xiān ānpái shāngyuán zhùyuàn zhìliáo。
The reason for the accident is under investigation. We will arrange for the wounded people to be taken to hospital, and treated.
医生建议他采用电灼疗法治疗溃疡。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā cǎiyòng diànzhuó liáofǎ zhìliáo kuìyáng。
The doctor advised him to use fulguration to treat his ulcer.
经过一段时间的治疗，爷爷风湿痛的症状缓解了不少。
Jīngguò yíduàn shíjiān de zhìliáo，yéye fēngshītòng de zhèngzhuàng huǎnjiě le bùshǎo。
After a period of treatment, Grandfather\'s symptoms caused by rheumatism has improved.
这位医生妙手回春，不少耳聋的人经治疗复聪了。
Zhèwèi yīshēng miàoshǒuhuíchūn，bùshǎo ěrlóng de rén jīng zhìliáo fùcōng le。
The doctor is highly competent, many patients recover their lost hearing after receiving treatment.
干扰素可以用于癌症治疗。
Gānrǎosù kěyǐ yòngyú áizhèng zhìliáo。
Interferon can be used to cure cancer.
肿瘤一定要割治治疗吗？
Zhǒngliú yídìng yào gēzhì zhìliáo ma？
Do we have to cure tumors by excision?
谷芽入药可治疗消化系统疾病。
Gǔyá rùyào kě zhìliáo xiāohuà xìtǒng jíbìng。
Rice sprouts can be used in medicines that treat illness of the digestive system.
他患鬼剃头，我们总劝他去治疗，他不听。
Tā huàn guǐtìtóu，wǒmen zǒng quàn tā qù zhìliáo，tā bùtīng。
He has alopecia. We suggested that he receive many treatments, but he did not take our advice.
医生给他开了两盒红霉素来治疗他的病。
Yīshēng gěi tā kāi le liǎng hé hóngméisù lái zhìliáo tā de bìng。
The doctor prescribed two boxes of erythromycin to cure him.
此种药的主要成分是黄连素，治疗拉肚子很有效。
Cǐ zhǒng yào de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huángliánsù，zhìliáo lādùzi hěnyǒuxiào。
The basis of this medicine is berberine which is very effective in curing loose bowels.
爷爷的病经过一个月的治疗，日益见轻。
Yéye de bìng jīngguò yígèyuè de zhìliáo，rìyì jiànqīng。
After a month\'s cure, grandpa\'s condition has gradually improved.
这种中药对治疗女性经血不调很有效。
Zhèzhǒng zhōng yào duì zhìliáo nǚxìng jīngxiě bútiáo hěnyǒuxiào。
This kind of traditional Chinese medicine is very effective in treating menstrual disorders.
这家医院专门治疗精神病患者。
Zhèjiā yīyuàn zhuānmén zhìliáo jīngshénbìng huànzhě。
This hospital specializes in treating the mentally ill.

The scientists claim that they have now found a new method that may bring about innovative developments for cancer treatments.
在治疗脑血栓等病时，医生通常都要使用抗凝剂。
Zài zhìliáo nǎoxuèshuān děng bìng shí，yīshēng tōngcháng dōuyào shǐyòng kàngníngjì。

治疗口角炎要服用一些维生素B2。
Zhìliáo kǒujiǎoyán yào fúyòng yìxiē wéishēngsù B èr。
Angular stomatitis can be cured by VB2.
他这种狂虐的症状一定要及早治疗才好。
Tā zhèzhǒng kuángnüè de zhèngzhuàng yídìng yào jízǎo zhìliáo cái hǎo。
His terrible symptoms should be cured as early as possible.
他患的是劳伤，应该避免劳累，一边治疗一边静养。

He has an internal lesion caused by overexertion, so he\'d better avoid fatigue and rest quietly to recuperate.
您得的是老年病，配合医生治疗，不要有心理负担。
Nín dé de shì lǎoniánbìng，pèihé yīshēng zhìliáo，búyào yǒu xīnlǐ fùdān。
You have a disease associated with old age. Please do not worry; you\'ll be OK if you cooperate with the doctor.
经过累日经年的治疗，他的病情已经渐渐好转了。
Jīngguò lěirì jīngnián de zhìliáo，tā de bìngqíng yǐjing jiànjiàn hǎozhuǎn le。
After years of treatment, he is gradually getting well.
这位医生是专门治疗男性病的。

The doctor specializes in curing andropathy.

The doctor diagnosed that his brainstem has some pathological changes, and he must be hospitalized soon.
爷爷得了脑血栓，幸亏治疗及时，恢复得还算不错。

Grandpa suffered cerebral thrombus. But thanks to iearly treatment, he recovered well.

Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.

The department of cardiac surgery is very experienced in treating congenital heart disease.

Doctor Zhang is especially good at treating gynaecopathia.

经过治疗，他的眼睛好了，但角膜上留下了云翳。

His eyes have recovered after the treatment, but there are scars on his corneas.

to treat sb for a wound/injury
给某人治疗伤口/伤处
to have {or} receive treatment for sth
[医] 因某病接受治疗

医生分析了病人的病情，建议手术治疗。

墨菲医生用精神分析法治疗克理斯两个月了，但几乎没有成效。
The therapy team in conjunction with nursing colleagues will lead this service.
治疗小组与护士共同负责这项服务。
Wendy has to have a surgery due to her stubborn back pain.
温迪顽固的背痛必须要通过手术治疗。
My acne is very stubborn. I\'ve tried lots of treatment methods but none of them had done anything.
我的粉刺很难对付，我试过所有的治疗方法，但都没有效果。
It\'s hard to cure the wind-sucking of the house.
马的咽气癖很难治疗。
The generic drugs are just as effective treating the flu as the brand name ones.
一般性药品和品牌药对治疗流感都很有效。
The patient had to endure a lot of painful treatments before she could get better.
这位女患者忍受了很多痛苦的治疗，病情才好转些。
The medication didn\'t have an impact on the patient\'s illness.
药物治疗对这个病人毫无效果。
This is the preparation exported from America for the plague.
这是从美国进口的治疗瘟疫的特效药。
The herb is used as a home remedy for sore throats.
这种草药可以用作家庭常备药物来治疗喉咙肿痛。
She has responded well to treatment.
她对治疗的反应很好。
We have made significant progress towards the cure for breast cancer.
我们在治疗乳腺癌方面已经取得了巨大进展。
A new specific has just been invented for your lung disease.
一种治疗你这种肺病的特效药问世了。
Long-term atropine treatment of school myopia can eliminate accommodation tonus and prevent or retard the progress of myopia.
长期阿托品治疗能消除调节张力,中止或减慢近视的进行。
Jenny\'s prescribed treatment started working two days after it started.
珍妮的处方治疗开始进行了两天了。
The treatment for tularemia can cause aplastic anemia.
治疗兔热症会引起不可再生性贫血.

唯一能治疗这个病人的方法就是体外循环心脏手术。

混合使用这三种药物会促进治疗。

Nǐ kěyǐ zài yídìng qīxiàn nèi dédào miǎnfèi de yákēzhìliáo。

Mental depression is controllable through medication.

Treatments for various illnesses are readily available.
Zhìliáo gè zhǒng jíbìng de fāngfǎ dōushì xiànchéng de。

The treatment approach is illustrated by a description of case in which it was used.
Zhìliáo fāngfǎ shì tōngguò yí lèi ànlì lái shuōmíng de。
治疗方法是通过一类案例来说明的。
Patterson has expressed dismay over the current treatment.
Pàdésēn duì xiànzài de zhìliáo gǎndào juéwàng。

Poor self-care, even for short periods of time can result in hospital admissions.
Zìwǒ hùlǐ búdàng，jíshǐshì shíjiān hěn duǎn，yě nénggòu zàochéng zhùyuàn zhìliáo de hòuguǒ。
自我护理不当，即使是时间很短，也能够造成住院治疗的后果。
Finding the right herb to cure a particular ailment requires a little research.
Hái xūyào zuò xiē yánjiū cáinéng zhǎodào héshì de cǎoyào lái zhìliáo mǒuzhǒng jíbìng。

Acupuncture is widely used in human alternative medicine.

Sòng tā qù yīyuàn，tā xūyào yīshēng zhìliáo。

She had a history of chronic back pain that she treated with cupping.

Two people are being treated in hospital after the crash.

If treatment is needed the success rate is very high.

Scientists have found the effectiveness of this drug to be minimal against cancer.

Actually I was amazed at the treatment room - it did not look in the least clinical.

miǎnfèi yīliáo 
free medical care

implement a system of free medical care
免费医疗制度

system of free medical care

公费医疗

这是一场要求全面降低医疗费用的全球性运动。

大多数人只需承担很少的医疗费用。

他们要在五年内分阶段执行新的医疗保健计划。

With the reform of the medical and health undertakings of our country, many industries related to medical treatment are  continuously specialized.

Local medical conditions are so bad the doctor suggested he be transferred to a Three A-ranking hospital.

miǎnfèi yīliáo 
free medical care
正要送孩子上县医院，碰巧医疗队到村里来了。
Zhèngyào sòngháizi shàngxiànyīyuàn，pèngqiǎo yīliáoduì dào cūn lǐ lái le。
They were going to send the child to the county hospital when a medical team arrived in the village.
医疗设施
yīliáo shèshī
medical facilities
享受公费医疗
xiǎnɡshòu ɡōnɡfèi yīliáo
enjoy public health services
医疗卫生工作
yīliáo wèishēnggōngzuò 
medical and health work
医疗机构
yīliáo jīɡòu 
medical establishment (or institution)
医疗器械
yīliáo qìxiè 
medical apparatus and instruments
医疗事故
yīliáo shìɡù 
unskilful and faulty medical or surgical treatment; malpractice
贯彻以预防为主的医疗方针
guànchè yǐ yùfángwéi zhǔ de yīliáo fāngzhēn 
carry out the policy of putting prevention first in medical work
医疗
yīliáo
medical treatment
医生送来了催索医疗费的账单。
Yīshēng sònglái le cuīsuǒ yīliáofèi de zhàngdān。
The doctor sent over the bill for medical treatment which was urgently required.
这些带菌医疗器械必须马上消毒。
Zhèxiē dài jūn yīliáo qìxiè bìxū mǎshàng xiāodú。
These equipments carry bacteria. They must be sterilized soon.
劳动者应该享受公费医疗的待遇。
Láodòngzhě yīnggāi xiǎngshòu gōngfèi yīliáo de dàiyù。
Workers shall enjoy free medical treatment.
莱塞被广泛运用在医疗、商业、艺术等许多领域。
Láisāi bèi guǎngfàn yùnyòng zài yīliáo、shāngyè、yìshù děng xǔduō lǐngyù。
Lasers are widely used in many fields, such as medical treatment, commerce, and arts, etc..
随着医疗卫生条件的不断提高，现在百岁以上的老寿星越来越多了。
Suí zhe yīliáo wèishēng tiáojiàn de búduàn tígāo，xiànzài bǎisuì yǐshàng de lǎoshòuxīng yuèláiyuè duō le。
With the development of health care conditions,there are now more people living to over 100 years old.
春节前医疗小分队到农村为穷苦病人施诊，受到了村民的欢迎。
Chūnjié qián yīliáo xiǎofēnduì dào nóngcūn wèi qióngkǔ bìngrén shīzhěn，shòudào le cūnmín de huānyíng。
Before Spring Festival, small medical groups went to the countryside to treat poor people\'s illnesses and were welcomed by the villagers.
医生的误断是发生这场医疗事故的主要原因。
Yīshēng de wùduàn shì fāshēng zhèchǎng yīliáo shìgù de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for this medical accident is the doctor\'s misjudgement.
医疗队下乡给很多贫苦的人免费治病。
Yīliáoduì xiàxiāng gěi hěnduō pínkǔ de rén miǎnfèi zhìbìng。
The medical team went to the countryside to treat diseases for free for many poor people.
3M公司占居同类医疗器械公司的前位。
Sān M gōngsī zhànjū tónglèi yīliáo qìxiè gōngsī de qiánwèi。
The 3M Company holds the leading position among all medical equipment companies.
作为主营医疗器械的公司，他们在行业内部独占鳌头。
Zuòwéi zhǔyíng yīliáo qìxiè de gōngsī，tāmen zài hángyè nèibùdúzhàn áotóu。
As a company majoring in medical equipment, they lead the industry.
像这样的浊流之辈应该尽早清除出医疗队伍。
Xiàng zhèyàng de zhuóliú zhī bèi yīnggāi jǐnzǎo qīngchú chū yīliáo duìwu。
Such a mean person should have been kicked off the medical team long ago.
电子束被广泛地应用在医疗、测量等领域。
Diànzǐshù bèi guǎngfàn de yìngyòng zài yīliáo、cèliáng děng lǐngyù。
Electron beams are widely used in medicine and measurement.
医疗站的药品奇缺，给人民看病带来不便。
Yīliáozhàn de yàopǐn qíquē，gěi rénmín kànbìng dàilái búbiàn。
The health clinic is short of medicine, which is inconvenient for treating people\'s illnesses.
随着医疗水平的提高，我国新生儿的死亡率已经很低了。
Suízhe yīliáo shuǐpíng de tígāo，wǒguó xīnshēngr de sǐwánglǜ yǐjīng hěndī le。
As medical standards are being raised, the death rate of newborn babies in our country is already very low.
实行免费医疗制度
shíxíng miǎnfèi yīliáo zhìdù
implement a system of free medical care
免费医疗制度
Miǎnfèi yīliáo zhìdù
system of free medical care
改善医疗卫生条件
Gǎishàn yīliáowèishēng tiáojiàn
improve medical hygiene
医疗站
Yīliáozhàn
treatment centre
新医治疗肺结核很有一套。
Xīnyī zhìliáo fèijiéhé hěn yǒu yítào。
Western medicine is very effective in treating phthisis.
她还在医院治疗。
Tā hái zài yīyuàn zhìliáo。
She is still under treatment in hospital.
您得的是老年病，配合医生治疗，不要有心理负担。
Nín dé de shì lǎoniánbìng，pèihé yīshēng zhìliáo，búyào yǒu xīnlǐ fùdān。
You have a disease associated with old age. Please do not worry; you\'ll be OK if you cooperate with the doctor.
理疗科医生
lǐliáokē yīshēnɡ 
physiotherapist
这位赤脚医生有治疗白浊的偏方。
Zhèwèi chìjiǎo yīshēng yǒu zhìliáo báizhuó de piānfāng。
The doctor has a way to treat gonorrhea.
这位医生对治疗生殖腺疾病非常有经验。
Zhèwèi yīshēng duì zhìliáo shēngzhíxiàn jíbìng fēicháng yǒu jīngyàn。
This doctor is experienced in treating gonad diseases.
这家医院专门治疗精神病患者。
Zhèjiā yīyuàn zhuānmén zhìliáo jīngshénbìng huànzhě。
This hospital specializes in treating the mentally ill.
他打球扭伤了手腕，医生建议他蜡疗一下试试。
Tā dǎqiú niǔshāng le shǒuwàn，yīshēng jiànyì tā làliáo yíxià shìshì。
He sprained his wrist while playing a ball game, so the doctor suggested wax therapy.
这位医生是专门治疗男性病的。
Zhèwèi yīshēng shì zhuānmén zhìliáo nánxìngbìng de。
The doctor specializes in curing andropathy.
犯人生病了，狱吏都会找狱医来为他们治疗。
Fànrén shēngbìng le，yùlì dōuhuì zhǎo yùyī lái wèi tāmen zhìliáo。
If the prisoner is sick, the warder will call in the prison doctor to treat him.
睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好。
Zǔchuán de yīfāng jùshuō duìyú zhìliáo shènxū xiàoguǒ hěnhǎo。
The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
张医生在妇科病治疗方面很有一手。
Zhāng yīshēng zài fùkēbìng zhìliáo fāngmiàn hěn yǒu yìshǒu。
Doctor Zhang is especially good at treating gynaecopathia.
妈妈患了类风湿关节炎，医生说要尽快治疗。
Māma huàn le lèifēngshī guānjiéyán，yīshēng shuō yào jìnkuài zhìliáo。
Mother has rheumatoid arthritis and the doctor said she needs to be treated as soon as possible.
协和医院心脏外科对治疗先天性心脏病很有经验。
Xiéhé yīyuàn xīnzàng wàikē duì zhìliáo xiāntiānxìng xīnzàngbìng hěn yǒu jīngyàn。
The department of cardiac surgery is very experienced in treating congenital heart disease.
医生建议他采取保守疗法。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā cǎiqǔ bǎoshǒu liáofǎ。
The doctor suggested that he take conservative treatment.
医生建议他采用电灼疗法治疗溃疡。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā cǎiyòng diànzhuó liáofǎ zhìliáo kuìyáng。
The doctor advised him to use fulguration to treat his ulcer.
医生建议她使用耳针疗法。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā shǐyòng ěrzhēn liáofǎ.
The doctor suggested she should receive acupuncture treatment.
在治疗脑血栓等病时，医生通常都要使用抗凝剂。
Zài zhìliáo nǎoxuèshuān děng bìng shí，yīshēng tōngcháng dōuyào shǐyòng kàngníngjì。
When treating cerebral thrombus and diseases similar kind, doctors generally use anticoagulants.
医生参阅了大量的医案，终于给他制定了治疗方案。
Yīshēng cānyuè le dàliàng de yīàn，zhōng yú gěi tā zhìdìng le zhìliáo fāngàn。
The doctor referred to large numbers of medical records and finally worked out an treatment plan for him.
中医比较盛行这种针刺的疗法。
Zhōngyī bǐjiào shèngxíng zhèzhǒng zhēncì de liáofǎ。
The acupuncture treatment is very popular among doctors of traditional chinese medicine.
这名医生对精神分裂症的治疗颇有研究。
Zhè míng yīshēng duì jīngshén fēnlièzhèng de zhìliáo pōyǒu yánjiū。
This doctor is an expert in the treatment of schizophrenia.
医生给他开了两盒红霉素来治疗他的病。
Yīshēng gěi tā kāi le liǎng hé hóngméisù lái zhìliáo tā de bìng。
The doctor prescribed two boxes of erythromycin to cure him.
医生拿出梅花针，准备进行针灸疗法。
Yīshēng náchū méihuāzhēn，zhǔnbèi jìnxíng zhēnjiǔ liáofǎ。
The doctor has taken out  plum blossom needle, and is going to give an acupuncture treatment.
医生决定对他进行血液渗析治疗。
Yīshēng juédìng duì tā jìnxíng xuèyè shènxī zhìliáo。
The doctors decided to use hernodialysis to treat him.
这位医生妙手回春，不少耳聋的人经治疗复聪了。
Zhèwèi yīshēng miàoshǒuhuíchūn，bùshǎo ěrlóng de rén jīng zhìliáo fùcōng le。
The doctor is highly competent, many patients recover their lost hearing after receiving treatment.
医生说我的腿痛应该尝试一下沙疗。
Yīshēng shuō wǒ de tuǐtòng yīnggāi chángshì yíxià shāliáo。
The doctor said I could try sand therapy to cure my leg ache.
医生已经尽了最大的努力对他进行疗救。
Yīshēng yǐjing jìn le zuìdàde nǔlì duì tā jìnxíng liáojiù。
The doctor had tried his best to cure him.
医生诊断：他的脑干有些病变，必须住院治疗。
Yīshēng zhěnduàn：tā de nǎogàn yǒuxiē bìngbiàn，bìxū zhùyuàn zhìliáo。
The doctor diagnosed that his brainstem has some pathological changes, and he must be hospitalized soon.
医生说他上呼吸道被病毒感染了，需要治疗。
Yīshēng shuō tā shànghūxīdào bèi bìngdú gǎnrǎn le，xūyào zhìliáo。
The doctor said his upper respiratory tract was infected, and needed treatment.

The young doctor is interning at the Medical Center this year.
Zhè míng niánqīng yīshēng jīnnián zài yīliáo zhōngxīn zuò shíxí yīshēng。
这名年轻医生今年在医疗中心做实习医生。
He went off to work in a medical research center and the others doctors got all the credit.
他离职去了一家医疗研究中心工作，于是其他医生就夺走了所有的荣誉。
The fear of being sued for malpractice has magnified physicians\' defensiveness.
Dānxīn yīn yīliáo shìgù ér bèi qǐsù de kǒngjù jiājùle yīshēngmen de fángwèi xīnlǐ。
担心因医疗事故而被起诉的恐惧加剧了医生们的防卫心理。
The Medicaid Buy-In program offers Medicaid coverage to people with disabilities.
医疗补助的买入项目把残疾人也纳入到医保体系中来。
The Cuban Medical Brigade attended to 73% of earthquake victims in Pakistan.
古巴医疗队帮助治疗了巴基斯坦百分之七十三的地震灾民。
This is the best medical team in the country.
这是该国最好的医疗队伍。
There is a new global movement demanding affordable health care for all.
这是一场要求全面降低医疗费用的全球性运动。
The company wants to pocket the money that a badly disabled father got for medical care after an accident.
一位在车祸中严重致残的父亲急需这笔医疗救治的钱，但是公司却想要挪用。
This company has supplied all city hospitals with medical equipment for years.
这家公司为所有市立医院提供医疗器材已经有很多年了。
Most of the medical equipment is being trucked into the city, although some is arriving by train.
大部分的医疗器材都会由卡车运进城里，但还有一部分会由火车运进来。
Most people carry a minimum amount of med pay.
大多数人只需承担很少的医疗费用。
She promised help me find the best low cost health insurance.
她答应帮我找到最划算的低成本医疗保险。
Board found in a 2003 study that over half the collections reported on credit reports are for medical debt.
委员会在一份2003年的研究中发现，半数以上的信用报告为医疗负债。

He composed a plan of action for the development of the health system.

Yīliáo gǎigé réngrán zài xìtǒng zhìdìng zhōng。
医疗改革仍然在系统制定中。

Zhège juéyì kàn shàngqù gěi yīliáo zhíyè zhě zài juédìng bìyàoxìng shí liúxiàle kěguān de zìzhǔ kōngjiān。
这个决议看上去给医疗职业者在决定必要性时留下了可观的自主空间。

医疗服务不统一是战胜艾滋病的重要障碍之一。

Gōngchǎng bǔcháng le shòushāng gōngrén yīliáofèi。

Actually I was amazed at the treatment room - it did not look in the least clinical.

Xīn zǒngtǒng bìxū gǎigé yīliáo xìtǒng。

Yīliáo bǎojiàn yīngdāng shèhuìhuà！

The medical services are excellent.
Yīliáo fúwù shì chūsè de。

Ambulance drivers are paramedical personnel.
Jiùhùchē sījī shì jǐnjí yīliáo jiùhù de fǔzhù rényuán。

Sòng tā qù yīyuàn，tā xūyào yīshēng zhìliáo。

此药对于治理黄病有很好的疗效。

The medicine was very effective in curing icterus.
此种药的主要成分是黄连素，治疗拉肚子很有效。

爷爷的病经过一个月的治疗，日益见轻。

这种中药对治疗女性经血不调很有效。

这条斜坡长至几英里。

他们是在收费站的灯光下看到他的尸体的。
Dead carcasses were found all over the beach.
Hǎitān dàochù dōu néng fāxiàn dòngwù shītǐ。
海滩到处都能发现动物尸体。
All corpses will decay over time.
Suǒyǒu shītǐ suízhe shíjiān dōu jiāng fǔlàn。
所有尸体随着时间都将腐烂。
Police officers spent days digging the site, but no remains were ever discovered.
Jǐngguān huāle hǎo jǐ tiān zài xiànchǎng wājué，dànshì méi zhǎodào rènhé shītǐ。
警官花了好几天在现场挖掘，但是没找到任何尸体。
They\'re dragging the river for the body of the missing boy.
Tāmen zài hézhōng sōuxún shīzōng nántóng de shītǐ。
他们在河中搜寻失踪男童的尸体。
They know, quite literally, where the bodies are buried.
Tāmen fēicháng quèqiè de zhīdào shītǐ máizài nǎr。
他们非常确切地知道尸体埋在哪儿。
A woman\'s body was found at the bottom of a ravine, bound and blindfolded.
Zài gǔdǐ fāxiàn yìmíng fùnǚ de shītǐ，tā bèi kǔnbǎng érqiě bèi méngzhù shuāngyǎn。
在谷底发现一名妇女的尸体，她被捆绑而且被蒙住双眼。
A few weeks later, his body was washed ashore in Tel Aviv.
Jǐgè xīngqī hòu，tā de shītǐ zài Tèlāwéifū bèi chōng shàng le àn。
几个星期后，他的尸体在特拉维夫被冲上了岸。
The police found her cold body in the woods.
Jǐngfāng zài shùlín lǐ zhǎodàole tā bīnglěng de shītǐ。
警方在树林里找到了她冰冷的尸体。
The next morning a search-party found the corpse hidden under some bushes.
Dì-èr tiān zǎoshang，yì zhī sōuxún xiǎozǔ zhǎodàole cángzài guànmùcóng zhōng de shītǐ。
第二天早上，一支搜寻小组找到了藏在灌木丛中的尸体。
Police found Christine\'s body crammed into a suitcase in the loft.
Jǐngchá fāxiàn Kèlìsītīng de shītǐ bèi sāi zài gélóu de yí gè shǒutíxiāng lǐ。
警察发现克莉丝汀的尸体被塞在阁楼的一个手提箱里。
His body was discovered on the city\'s outskirts three days later.
Tā de shītǐ sān tiān hòu zài chéngshì de jiāowài bèi fāxiàn le。
他的尸体三天后在城市的郊外被发现了。
I could swear that some of them actually wanted the police to find a body.
Wǒ kěyǐ bǎozhèng tāmen zhōng de yìxiērén zhēn de xiǎng yào jǐngchá qù zhǎo yí jù shītǐ。
我可以保证他们中的一些人真的想要警察去找一具尸体。
The girl\'s body had been identified by her aunt, Mrs. Browne.
Zhège nǚhái de shītǐ bèi tā de āyí，Bùlǎng tàitai shíbié chūlái le。
这个女孩的尸体被她的阿姨，布朗太太识别出来了。
The DNA fiber was collected from the corpse.
Cóng shītǐ shàng cǎijíle yìxiē DNA xiānwéi zǔzhī。
从尸体上采集了一些DNA纤维组织。
Two decayed corpses were found in the park.
Gōngyuán lǐ fāxiànle liǎng jù fǔlàn de shītǐ。
公园里发现了两具腐烂的尸体。
They dragged up a young boy\'s body who was the victim of a ritualistic killing.
Tāmen tuōchū le yí jù nánhái de shītǐ，tā shì yíshì shālù de shòuhàizhě。
他们拖出了一具男孩的尸体，他是仪式杀戮的受害者。
The two bodies were lying face down on the grass a few meters apart.
Zhè liǎng jù shītǐ liǎn cháo xià，pā zài jǐ mǐ wài de cǎocóng lǐ。
这两具尸体脸朝下，趴在几米外的草丛里。
They also recover and identify bodies through DNA analysis.
Tāmen hái tōngguò DNA fēnxī fùyuán hé shíbié shītǐ。
他们还通过DNA分析复原和识别尸体。
The confused Night Goblins scattered leaving piles of dead in their wake.
Yèdìjīngmen yíhuò de sànkāile，zài tāmen de shēnhòu liúxiàle chéngduī de shītǐ。
夜地精们疑惑地散开了，在它们的身后留下了成堆的尸体。
He indulges himself with a victory leap over the carcass.
Tā zòngróng zìjǐ zài shītǐ shàng shènglì de yí tiào。
他纵容自己在尸体上胜利地一跳。
Often I would help him lay out the corpse in the simple coffin.
Wǒ huì jīngcháng bāngzhù tā bǎ shītǐ fàngjìn jiǎnyì guāncái lǐ zhǔnbèi xiàzàng。
我会经常帮助他把尸体放进简易棺材里准备下葬。
The polar bear can scent out a dead seal from 20 kilometres away.
Běijíxióng néng cóng èrshí gōnglǐ wài xiùdào hǎitún shītǐ de qìwèi。
北极熊能从20公里外嗅到海豚尸体的气味。
This body is ticketed with the wrong information.
Zhège shītǐ bèi tiēshàngle cuòwù xìnxī biāoqiān。
这个尸体被贴上了错误信息标签。
To the best of my belief the body was placed in the water shortly after death.
Jiù wǒ suǒ zhī，zài sǐwáng hòu bùjiǔ，zhè jù shītǐ jiù bèi fàngrùle Shuǐzhōng。
就我所知，在死亡后不久，这具尸体就被放入了水中。
The end of the police search was the discovery of a corpse.
Jǐngchá sōuchá de jiéguǒ jiùshì fāxiànle yí jù shītǐ。
警察搜查的结果就是发现了一具尸体。
The corpse was in an advanced state of decay.
Shītǐ fǔlàn de hěn yánzhòng。
尸体腐烂得很严重。
The body started to decay and needed to be cremated.
Shītǐ yǐjīng kāishǐ fǔhuài，xūyào jìnxíng huǒhuà。
尸体已经开始腐坏，需要进行火化。
The body lay in a pool of blood.
Shītǐ dǎozài xuèpō zhōng。
尸体倒在血泊中。
They found the body in the lake.
Tāmen zài hú zhōng fāxiànle nà jù shītǐ。
他们在湖中发现了那具尸体。
They dug a pit to bury the body.
Tāmen wāle yí gè kēng，máizàngle shītǐ。
他们挖了一个坑，埋葬了尸体。
Honor comes to bless the turf that wraps their clay.
Yīnggāi sòngyáng de shì fùgài tāmen shītǐ de cǎopídì。
应该颂扬的是覆盖他们尸体的草皮地。
The murderer confessed that he threw the stiff in the river.
Móushā fàn gòngrèn tā bǎ shītǐ pāorùle hé zhōng。
谋杀犯供认他把尸体抛入了河中。
A local motion keep the bodies integral.
Yìzhǒng dāngdì de fāngfǎ wánzhěng de bǎohùle shītǐ。
一种当地的方法完整地保护了尸体。
These organisms enter the body invisibly.
Zhèxiē wēishēngwù qiāoqiāode jìnrùle nà jù shītǐ。
这些微生物悄悄地进入了那具尸体。
The dead man\'s stomach was bloated.
Shītǐ de dùzi zhǎng qǐlái。
尸体的肚子涨起来。
The dead are to uprise.
Shītǐ huì péngzhàng。
尸体会膨胀。
Dead bodies strewed the ground.
Shītǐ héngqīshùbā de tǎngzài dìshàng。
尸体横七竖八地躺在地上。
The bodies decomposed in the heat.
Shītǐ zài gāowēn zhōng fǔlàn。
尸体在高温中腐烂。
The lions ravened the bodies.
Zhèxiē shīzi lángtūnhǔyàn de chīxià le nàxiē shītǐ。
这些狮子狼吞虎咽地吃下了那些尸体。
The gas distended the animal\'s body.
Qìtǐ shǐ gāi dòngwù de shītǐ zhàng le qǐlái。
气体使该动物的尸体胀了起来。
He was morbidly fascinated by dead bodies.
Tā duì shītǐ zháomó dào jìnhū bìngtài de chéngdù。
他对尸体着魔到近乎病态的程度。
The identified bodies were released for burial.
Yànmíngle shēnfèn de shītǐ bèi xiàzàng le。
验明了身份的尸体被下葬了。
The cadaver was intended for dissection.
Nà jù shītǐ shì jiěpōu yòng de。
那具尸体是解剖用的。
掩埋尸首
yǎnmái shīshǒu
bury a corpse
尸首。
法医的尸检报告证明：这人死于窒息，是被掐死的。
Fǎyī de shījiǎn bàogào zhèngmíng：zhè rén sǐyú zhìxī，shì bèi qiāsǐ de。
The autopsy report by the forensic doctor proves that the man died from suffocation, he was choked to death.
尸检报告
进行尸检。
Forensic reports concluded that he had been dead for at least a week.
shījiǎn bàogào de jiélùn shì，tā yǐ sǐwáng zhìshǎo yìzhōu。
尸检报告的结论是，他已死亡至少一周。
科考人员在森林中发现了很多毛象的尸骨化石。
Kēkǎo rényuán zài sēnlín zhōng fāxiàn le hěnduō máo xiàng de shīgǔ huàshí。
The scientific investigation team found many mammoth fossils in the forest.
尸骨未寒（指人刚死不久）。
掩埋烈士尸骨。
The remains of the dog was ploughed under the dirt.

战争年代，暴尸野外的无名小卒不计其数。

In the wartime, countless unnamed soldiers died on the battlefield.
救生员已经沉潜下水，打捞遇难者的尸体。
Jiùshēngyuán yǐjing chénqián xiàshuǐ，dǎlāo yùnànzhě de shītǐ。
The lifeguards have gone down to the bottom of the water, searching for the bodies of the people who died in the accident.
太平间是医院陈尸的地方。
Tàipíngjiān shì yīyuàn chénshī de dìfāng。
The morgue is the place in the hospital where dead bodies are kept until they are buried.
谁也说不清楚这个丛冢到底埋了多少具尸体。
Shéi yě shuō bùqīngchu zhège cóngzhǒng dàodǐ mái le duōshǎo jù shītǐ。
No one can tell exactly how many people are buried in this group of graves.
鸡鸭的浮尸把这条小河污染了。
Jīyā de fúshī bǎ zhètiáo xiǎohé wūrǎn le。
The river has been polluted by floating corpses of chickens and ducks.
博物馆里展出了一具有上百年历史的干尸。
Bówùguǎn lǐ zhǎnchū le yíjù yǒu shàngbǎinián lìshǐ de gānshī。
The museum exhibited a mummy which has a history of over a hundred years.
他的尸体被丢在荒沟中，无人认领。
Tā de shītǐ bèi diūzài huānggōu zhōng，wúrén rènlǐng。
His corpse was abandoned in a deserted ditch, and no one claimed it.
经过法院的勘验，这确实是他的尸体。
Jīngguò fǎyuàn de kānyàn，zhè quèshí shì tā de shītǐ。
After the court\'s on the spot examination, they determined that the dead body was him.
他的尸体没人认领，只好埋入了乱葬岗子。
Tā de shītǐ méirén rènlǐng，zhǐhǎo máirù le luànzàng gǎngzi。
No one came to identify the body and take it away, so it was buried in an unmarked burial mound.
他的尸体将于三天后落葬。
Tā de shītǐ jiāngyú sāntiān hòu luòzàng。
His body will be buried in three days time.
科考人员在森林中发现了很多毛象的尸骨化石。
Kēkǎo rényuán zài sēnlín zhōng fāxiàn le hěnduō máo xiàng de shīgǔ huàshí。
The scientific investigation team found many mammoth fossils in the forest.
法医的尸检报告证明：这人死于窒息，是被掐死的。
Fǎyī de shījiǎn bàogào zhèngmíng：zhè rén sǐyú zhìxī，shì bèi qiāsǐ de。
The autopsy report by the forensic doctor proves that the man died from suffocation, he was choked to death.
法医往往通过尸斑来判断死者的死亡时间。
Fǎyī wǎngwǎng tōngguò shībān lái pànduàn sǐzhě de sǐwáng shíjiān。
Legal medical experts often judge time of death from livor mortis.
大战过后，战场上到处都是尸骸。
Dàzhàn guòhòu，zhànchǎng shàng dàochù dōushì shīhái。
Dead bodies are everywhere on the battlefield after a great war.
建筑工人无意中从地下挖出一具尸蜡。
Jiànzhù gōngrén wúyì zhōng cóng dìxia wāchū yíjù shīlà。
The construction workers accidentally dug out a dried and preserved dead body from underground.
他空占着职位，却不负责任何具体工作，简直就是尸位素餐。
Tā kōngzhàn zhe zhíwèi，què bú fùzé rènhé jùtǐ gōngzuò，jiǎnzhí jiùshì shīwèi sùcān。
Although in that position, he doesn\'t take responsibility for any work. He is exactly like a person at ancient sacrificial rites who sat as a god but didn\'t have to do anything.
这个作恶多端的坏蛋，死了都没人给他收尸！
Zhège zuòè duōduān de huàidàn，sǐ le dōu méi rén gěi tā shōushī！
This rascal who committed numerous crimes won\'t have anyone pick up his dead body after his death!
他生性贪狠，为了夺人钱财竟然杀人毁尸。
Tā shēngxìng tānhěn，wèi le duó rén qiáncái jìngrán shārén huǐshī。
He is vicious by nature. How can he kill a person and destroy the body when he just wants to grab his money?
他什么家务活也不干，回来就知道挺尸。
Tā shénme jiāwùhuó yě búgàn，huílái jiù zhīdào tǐngshī。
He doesn\'t do any household chores. Every day after coming back from work, he just goes straight to bed to sleep.
他死后没有找到尸体，只能做了一个衣冠冢。
Tā sǐhòu méiyǒu zhǎodào shītǐ，zhǐnéng zuò le yígè yīguānzhǒng。
They haven\'t found his body, so they just make a cenotaph for him.
医生针对诈尸这种现象给市民进行了一次科普教育。
Yīshēng zhēnduì zhàshī zhèzhǒng xiàn xiàng gěi shìmín jìnxíng le yícì kēpǔ jiàoyù。
The doctor gave the citizens a science popularization education on the phenomenon of corpses coming to life.
领导告诉他不能回到原岗位工作的时候，他就诈尸般的撕打领导。
Lǐngdǎo gàosù tā bùnéng huídào yuán gǎngwèi gōngzuò de shíhou，tā jiù zhàshībān de sīdǎ lǐngdǎo。
The leader told him it was not the time for him to go back to his original position. Therefore, he began to beat his leader like a crazy person.

他很喜欢看僵尸电影。

在她外出喝酒後的次日早晨,她看起来了无生气，像一具死尸

僵尸终于从沉睡中复活，把属于自己的世界夺了回来。

All corpses will decay over time.

所有尸体随着时间都将腐烂。

警官花了好几天在现场挖掘，但是没找到任何尸体。
They\'re dragging the river for the body of the missing boy.
Tāmen zài hézhōng sōuxún shīzōng nántóng de shītǐ。
他们在河中搜寻失踪男童的尸体。
Some criminals were drawed to death.
Yìxiē zuìfàn bèi wǔmǎfēnshī。
一些罪犯被五马分尸。
They know, quite literally, where the bodies are buried.
Tāmen fēicháng quèqiè de zhīdào shītǐ máizài nǎr。
他们非常确切地知道尸体埋在哪儿。
A woman\'s body was found at the bottom of a ravine, bound and blindfolded.

Yí kàndào nà zhāng tàiránzìruò、 gāngzhèngbù\'ē de liǎn jiù zúyǐ shǐ tāmen lěngjìng xiàlái。
一看到那张泰然自若、刚正不阿的脸就足以使他们冷静下来。
Hitherto imperturbable，he now showed signs of alarm.
Suīrán qìjīnwéizhǐ yìzhí tàiránzìruò，dàn tā xiànzài biǎoxiàn chū yìxiē jīnghuāng。
虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若，但他现在表现出一些惊慌。
他在遇到突发事件时总能泰然处之，这点让我很佩服。
Tā zài yùdào tūfā shìjiàn shí zǒng néng tàirán chǔzhī，zhè diǎn ràng wǒ hěnpèifú。
He is always calm when faced with an emergency, which makes me admire him very much.

你不要总是凶巴巴的好不好？
Nǐ búyào zǒngshì xiōngbaba de hǎobuhǎo？
Don\'t always be so fierce, ok?
有理就慢慢讲，干什么凶巴巴的。
你不要那么凶，凶横的人一向不受欢迎。
Nǐ búyào nàme xiōng，xiōnghèng de rén yí xiàng búshòu huānyíng。
Don\'t be so fiendish. A fiendish person is never welcomed.
因为他在外边的朋友多，遇啥事都能逢凶化吉。
Yīnwèi tā zài wàibiān de péngyou duō，yù shá shì dōu néng féngxiōnghuàjí。
He has many connections, and he can always find some way of tiding over a crisis.
缉拿凶手
jīná xiōngshǒu 
apprehend the murderer
他们在海上遇上了大风暴，至今尚无消息，吉凶未卜。
Tāmen zài hǎi shàngyùshàng le dà fēngbào，zhì jīn shàngwú xiāoxi，jíxiōngwèi bǔ。
They\'ve met with a storm at sea, and we haven\'t had any news of them yet. Their fate is still unknown.
他看起来很凶，其实心眼儿挺好的。
Tā kàn qǐlái hěn xiōng，qíshí xīnyǎnr tǐnghǎo de。
He looks fierce, but in fact he\'s kindhearted.
凶手被当场拿获。
Xiōngshǒu bèi dāngchǎngnáhuò。
The murderer was seized on the spot (or was caught red-handed).
破获一起凶杀案
pòhuò yì qǐ xiōnɡshā\'àn
crack a murder case
露出青面獠牙的凶相
lòuchū qīngmiànliáoyá de xiōng xiàng
reveal the ferocious features of an ogre
穷凶极恶的敌人
qióngxiōngjí\'è de dírén
most vicious enemy
一副穷凶极恶的样子
yí fù qióngxiōngjí\'è de yàngzi
with the look of a fiendish brute
攘除奸凶
rǎngchú jiānxiōng
eliminate treacherous people
凶残的奴隶主剜掉了奴隶的双眼。
Xiōngcán de núlìzhǔ wāndiào le núlì de shuāngyǎn。
The brutal slave owner gouged out the slave\'s eyes.
这个人样子真凶。
Zhègerén yàngzi zhēn xiōng。
This chap looks really fierce.
病势很凶
bìnɡshì hěn xiōnɡ
be terribly ill
闹得太凶了！
Nào de tài xiōng le！
What a terrific row!
这场雨来势很凶。
Zhè chǎngyǔ láishì hěn xiōng。
The rain came down with a vengeance.
凶残成性
xiōnɡcán chénɡ xìnɡ
be cruel by nature
拼抢凶狠
pīnqiǎngxiōnghěn
scramble furiously for a ball
射门凶狠
shèmén xiōnɡhěn
make powerful shots at the goal
山洪来势凶猛。
Shānhónɡ láishì xiōnɡměnɡ。
The mountain torrents rushed down with a devastating force.
虎豹都是凶猛的野兽。
Hǔ bào dōushì xiōngměng de yěshòu。
Both tigers and leopards are ferocious beasts.
满脸凶气
mǎnliǎn xiōnɡqì
with murder written on one\'s face
这是一起凶杀案。
Zhè shì yì qǐ xiōngshā\'àn。
This is a case of murder.
病情凶险
bìnɡqínɡ xiōnɡxiǎn
dangerously ill; critically ill; in a critical condition
情势凶险
qínɡshì xiōnɡxiǎn
in a very dangerous situation
一脸的凶相
yì liǎn de xiōng xiàng
look fiendish
凶焰万丈
xiōngyàn wànzhàng
swell with aggressive arrogance
预卜吉凶
yùbǔ jíxiōng

jíxiōngwèibǔ

行凶
xíngxiōng

元凶
yuánxiōng
prime culprit; arch-criminal
杀人凶器可能就是这把柴刀。
Shārén xiōngqì kěnéng jiùshì zhè bǎ cháidāo。
The weapon used by the criminal might have been this axe.
这里并不是凶杀案发生的第一地点。
Zhèlǐ bìng búshì xiōngshāàn fāshēng de dìyī dìdiǎn。
This isn\'t the primary scene of the murder.
看你凶神恶煞的样子，都把孩子吓坏了。
Kàn nǐ xiōngshén èshà de yàngzi，dōu bǎ háizi xià huài le。
You look so frightening, and the kids are really scared.
警方这次缉凶行动非常成功。
Jǐngfāng zhècì jīxiōng xíngdòng fēicháng chénggōng。
The policemen successfully arrested the criminals this time.
他生性奸凶，动不动就恐吓别人。
Tā shēngxìng jiānxiōng，dòngbudòng jiù kǒnghè biérén。
He is a treacherous and ferocious person who is prepared to intimidate others.
经过一番搏斗，公安人员制服了奸凶。
Jīngguò yì fān bódòu，gōng\'ān rényuán zhìfú le jiānxiōng。
After a fight, the police beat the rascal.
这名教唆犯雇凶杀人，罪恶深重。
Zhè míng jiàosuōfàn gùxiōng shārén，zuìè shēnzhòng。
He instigated others to kill, which is a very serious crime.
这个瀑布虽不大，但流势凶猛。
Zhège pùbùsuī búdà，dàn liúshì xiōngměng。
沙鱼被认为是海洋中最凶猛的动物。
Shāyú bèi rènwéi shì hǎiyáng zhōng zuì xiōngměng de dòngwù。
Sharks are considered as the most ferocious animal in ocean.
他这个人真是比梼杌还要凶恶！
Tā zhège rén zhēnshì bǐ táowù háiyào xiōngè！
He is more vicious than the fierce beasts in an ancient myth.
他已经进过好几次监狱了，真是个屡教不改的顽凶。
Tā yǐjing jìnguò hǎo jǐ cì jiānyù le，zhēnshì gè lǚjiào bùgǎi de wánxiōng。
He has been put into prison several times. He is really a bad man who refuses to mend his ways in spite of repeated admonition.
这次冒险吉凶未卜，你们都要加倍小心。
Zhècì màoxiǎn jíxiōng wèibǔ，nǐmén dōuyào jiābèi xiǎoxīn。
This adventure is unpredicable, you must take care of yourselves.
因为杀人无数、残忍凶暴，他被判枭首。
Yīnwéi shārén wúshù、cánrěn xiōngbào，tā bèi pàn xiāoshǒu。
He was beheaded for his killings.
经过刑警们几天几夜的紧张侦察，凶案已经破获。
Jīngguò xíngjǐngmen jǐtiān jǐ yè de jǐnzhāng zhēnchá，xiōngàn yǐjing pòhuò。
After several days and nights\' investigation by the criminal police, the murder case was uncovered.
你不要总是凶巴巴的好不好？
Nǐ búyào zǒngshì xiōngbaba de hǎobuhǎo？
Don\'t always be so fierce, ok?
这家人都穿着凶服，一定是有人去世了。
Zhèjiārén dōu chuān zhe xiōngfú，yídìng shì yǒurén qùshì le。
This family are all wearing the mourning apparel. Someone must have died.
歹徒目露凶光的样子让她很害怕。
Dǎitú mùlòu xiōngguāng de yàngzi ràng tā hěn hàipà。
The ferocious look in the gangster\'s eyes scared her very much.
凶耗传来，他痛哭失声。
Xiōnghào chuánlái，tā tòngkū shīshēng。
Hearing the death notice, he broke out crying.
歹徒的凶蛮相是无论如何也吓不倒我们的。
Dǎitú de xiōngmán xiàng shì wúlùn rúhé yě xiàbùdǎo wǒmen de。
Gangsters can never threaten us by their cruelty.
今年遭天灾又遇人祸，真是一个凶年。
Jīnnián zāo tiānzāi yòu yù rénhuò，zhēnshì yígè xiōngnián。
There have been natural and man-made calamities this year. It is really a bad year.
面对凶人，小王面无惧色。
Miànduì xiōngrén，Xiǎo Wáng miànwú jùsè。
Facing the ferocious man, Xiao Wang showed no fear.
小张活生生就是一个凶煞。
Xiǎo Zhāng huóshēngshēng jiùshì yígè xiōngshà。
Xiao Zhang is really a demon.
警察正在调查小张凶死的原因。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá Xiǎo Zhāng xiōngsǐ de yuányīn。
The police are investigating the cause of Xiao Zhang\'s violent death.
面对凶顽的歹徒，勇敢的民警毫不畏惧。
Miànduì xiōngwán de dǎitú，yǒnggǎn de mínjǐng háobú wèijù。
Facing the dangerous gangsters, the brave policemen were not frightened at all.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。
Mínjǐngmen háobú wèijù，yǒnggǎn de zhuābǔ xiōngwán。
The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
根据报纸上的消息，凶嫌已经被抓捕归案了。
Gēnjù bàozhǐ shàng de xiāoxi，xiōngxián yǐjing bèi zhuābǔ guīàn le。
According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.
听到父亲病逝的凶信，他伤心得不能自已。
Tīngdào fùqīn bìngshì de xiōngxìn，tā shāngxīn de bùnéng zìyǐ。
Hearing the news of his father\'s death, he was too sad to control himself.
凶讯传来，现场无人不落泪。
Xiōngxùn chuánlái，xiànchǎng wúrén bú luòlèi。
Hearing the bad news, there was no one present that didn\'t shed tears.
他续娶的妻子很凶悍，他有点后悔。
Tā xùqǔ de qīzǐ hěn xiōnghàn，tā yǒudiǎn hòuhuǐ。
He kind of regrets getting married after the death of his first wife, as his second wife is quite fierce.
狮子张开血盆大口，样子十分凶猛。
Shīzi zhāngkāi xuèpén dàkǒu，yàngzi shífēn xiōngměng。
The lion opened its mouth, looking rather ferocious.
他一口咬定了张明是凶手。
Tā yìkǒu yǎodìng le Zhāng Míng shì xiōngshǒu。
He insists that Zhang Ming is the murderer.
经过三天拉网式搜捕，疑凶终于被抓捕归案。
Jīngguò sāntiān lāwǎngshì sōubǔ，yíxiōng zhōng yú bèi zhuābǔ guīàn。
After a search lasting three days, the suspect was finally arrested.
已知的情况说明当前这里的局势异常凶险。
Yǐzhī de qíngkuàng shuōmíng dāngqián zhèlǐ de júshì yìcháng xiōngxiǎn。
The known conditions show that the situation is extremely dangerous here.
警察展开撒网式侦查，凶手无处隐遁。
Jǐngchá zhǎnkāi sāwǎngshì zhēnchá，xiōngshǒu wúchǔ yǐndùn。
The police are conducting a drag net investigation, so the murderer has no place to hide.
他是由于看见了凶手才招祸的。
Tā shì yóuyú kànjiàn le xiōngshǒu cái zhāohuò de。
He brought trouble because he saw the murderer.
干警缴获了歹徒用来行凶的折刀。
Gànjǐng jiǎohuò le dǎitú yònglái xíngxiōng de zhédāo。
The policmen seized the folding knife that was used by the scoundrels.
原来真凶是他的妹妹。
Yuánlái zhēnxiōng shì tā de mèimèi。
The real criminal turned out to be his sister.
警员全力追堵这名穷凶极恶的逃犯。
Jǐngyuán quánlì zhuīdǔ zhè míng qióngxiōng jíè de táofàn。
The police are chasing an extremely vicious escaped criminal with all their resources.

They believe the killer has a split personality.

Courage is not peeking at the last pages of your whodunit book to find out who did it.
勇气，是看侦探小说时，不先翻到后面几页，偷看一下凶手是谁。

这个警察终于把那个凶手绳之以法。
The victims were filled with terror when they saw the assailant.

Detectives believe they may hold a vital clue to the killer.
Jǐngtànmen rènwéi kěnéng zhǎodàole zhuādào xiōngshǒu de zhòngyào xiànsuǒ。
警探们认为可能找到了抓到凶手的重要线索。
A devasting storm headed towards the island.
Yì chǎng láishì xiōngměng de fēngbào zhèng xiàng dǎoshàng xílái。
一场来势凶猛的风暴正向岛上袭来。
The killer is out there somewhere and I am not afraid to look for him.
Xiōngshǒu jiù zài mǒuchù，wǒ bìng bú hàipà qù zhǎo tā。
凶手就在某处，我并不害怕去找他。
This type of dog is known for its violent behavior.
Zhèzhǒng gǒu yīnwèi qí xiōngměng de biǎoxiàn ér chūmíng。
这种狗因为其凶猛的表现而出名。
Three beautiful young women are suspected of committing a series of brutal murders.
Sānmíng piàoliang de niánqīngrén bèi huáiyí shíshīle zhè yíxìliè xiōngcán de móushā。
三名漂亮的年轻人被怀疑实施了这一系列凶残的谋杀。
He has a brutal desire to kill his wife.
Tā yǒule shāsǐ tā qīzǐ de xiōngcán niàntou。
他有了杀死他妻子的凶残念头。
The police alerted the public of a butcher on the loose.
Jǐngchá xiàng gōngzhòng fāchū jǐnggào，yǒu yì míng xiōngcán de shāshǒu zàitáo。
警察向公众发出警告，有一名凶残的杀手在逃。
The victim said one assailant hit him with a club.
Shòuhàizhě shuō，yì míng xíngxiōngzhě yòng dàtóubàng dǎle tā。
受害者说，一名行凶者用大头棒打了他。
A year later she was brutally murdered hundreds of miles away.
Yì nián hòu tā bèi xiōngcán de móushā zài shù bǎi yīnglǐ wài。
一年后她被凶残地谋杀在数百英里外。
People were defending their opinions as to the identity of the murderer and scoffing at others.
Rénmen hànwèi zìjǐ de yìjiàn，yǐ xiōngshǒu de shēnfèn qù jīxiào biérén。
人们捍卫自己的意见，以凶手的身份去讥笑别人。
A police dog, which picked up the murderer\'s scent, followed the trail to the huge graveyard.
Jǐngquǎn wén dàole xiōngshǒu liúxià de qìwèi，yánzhe xiù jì zhuīzōng dàole yí dàpiàn mùdì qián。
警犬闻到了凶手留下的气味，沿着嗅迹追踪到了一大片墓地前。
He wants the killer brought to justice.

Yǒu sān yè bèi sīqù le。
有三页被撕去了。

他试着从第一页开始，一直读到最后。

先前的一些读者在书页上做了许多记号。

书页开始发黄了。

These pages don\'t belong.

采取预防措施
cǎiqǔ yùfángcuòshī 
take preventive measures
为了树木的健康成长，治虫是最主要的预防措施。
Wèile shùmù de jiànkāng chéngcháng，zhìchóng shì zuì zhǔyào de yùfáng cuòshī。
Wiping out insects is the main precautionary measure to keep trees growing healthily.
预防措施
yùfángcuòshī
preventative measures
There are five main precautions you can take to make your home safe.
为了确保家人的安全，你可以采取以下五大预防措施。
You should take precautions to cover yourself against sexually transmitted diseases.
Nǐ yīnggāi zuò yùfáng cuòshī yǐfáng xìngbìng。
你应该做预防措施以防性病。
The large machine was railed off as a safety precaution.
Dàxíng jīxiè yào yòng wéilán gékāi，zuòwéi ānquán yùfáng cuòshī。
大型机械要用围栏隔开，作为安全预防措施。
By the same token, people are expected to take reasonable precautions for their own safety.
Tóngyàng de，rénmen huì cǎiqǔ hélǐ de yùfáng cuòshī bǎozhèng zìshēn ānquán。
同样地，人们会采取合理的预防措施保证自身安全。
You must take all reasonable precautions to ensure against theft.
Nǐ bìxū cǎiqǔ yíqiè hélǐ de yùfáng cuòshī lái fángdào。
你必须采取一切合理的预防措施来防盗。
He put an ice pack on the injury as a precaution.
Tā bǎ yí gè bīngdài fàng zài shòushāng chù zuòwéi jiǎnqīng tòngkǔ hé yánzhèng de yùfáng cuòshī。
他把一个冰袋放在受伤处作为减轻痛苦和炎症的预防措施。
An insurance policy is a good safeguard.
Yí fèn bǎoxiǎn jiùshì yí gè hǎo de yùfáng cuòshī。
一份保险就是一个好的预防措施。
I would take precautionary steps to keep him away.
Wǒ yào zuò xiē yùfáng cuòshī yǐ shǐ tā líkāi。
我要做些预防措施以使他离开。
as (an) insurance against
[fig] 作为预防…的措施
More than half of the original wetlands in the continent of the United States have disappeared in the name of reclamation, disease prevention, and flood control.

植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。

Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。

The doctors are taking effective measures to prevent medical crises.
我们国家正在采取有效措施保护原生林。

Our country is taking effective measures to protect the primeval forest.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。

为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.

Xìngjiēchù shí cǎiqǔ bǎohù cuòshī kěyǐ yǒuxiào fángzhǐ àizībìng de chuánbō。
Taking protective measures while having sexual contact can effectively prevent AIDS from spreading.
Effective measures were taken to reverse the depressed economy.
必须采取有效的措施扭转经济的颓势。

措置裕如|
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
to subscribe to certain measures
同意采取某种措施
They were unwilling to panic in the face of economic crisis.
Tāmen bú yuànyì zài miànduì jīngjì wēijī shí huángkǒng shīcuò。
他们不愿意在面对经济危机时惶恐失措。
The discontented minority resorted to a boycott，lasting for months.
Bù mǎnyì de shǎoshùpài juédìng cǎiqǔ dǐzhì de fāngfǎ，dǐzhì cuòshī chíxù le jǐ gè yuè。
不满意的少数派决定采取抵制的方法，抵制措施持续了几个月。
The president stonewalled when he realized the plot was being uncovered by a journalist.
Dāng zǒngtǒng yìshí dào yì míng jìzhě jiāngyào bàoguāng tā de jìhuà shí，tā cǎiqǔle zǔnáo cuòshī。
当总统意识到一名记者将要曝光他的计划时，他采取了阻挠措施。
与其坐以待毙，不如先下手打他个措手不及。
Yǔqí zuòyǐdàibì，bùrú xiān xiàshǒu dǎ tā gè cuòshǒubùjí。
It is better for us to go into action now and take the enemy by surprise, rather than wait passively until the enemy comes and seizes us.
打他个措手不及
dǎ tā gè cuòshǒubùjí 
make a surprise attack on them
他匆卒到来，我有些措手不及。
Tā cōngzú dàolái，wǒ yǒuxiē cuòshǒubùjí。
His unexpected arrival has taken me by surprise.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。
He came at me with full force, so I was caught unprepared.
安排备补人员，以免临时措手不及。
They knocked him for six.
他们给他来了个措手不及。
to catch sb on the hop
[BRIT] [inf] 使某人措手不及
The enemy were caught off balance by the shock of the attack.
Díjūn bèi tūrán jìngōng dǎle gè cuòshǒubùjí。
敌军被突然进攻打了个措手不及。
Police officers are being caught on the hop with all these rioters.
Jǐngchá guānyuán duì zhèxiē lěngxiào cuòshǒu-bùjí。
警察官员对这些冷笑措手不及。
The unions were initially caught on the hop.
Zuìchū， Gōnghuì yǒudiǎn cuòshǒubùjí。
最初，工会有点措手不及。
He tried his best to prevent being caught on the wrong foot.
Tā jìnlì ràng zìjǐ miǎnyú cuòshǒubùjí。
他尽力让自己免于措手不及。
The sudden hammer of fists caught him off guard.
Lìng tā cuòshǒu-bùjí de yí dùn lǎoquán。
令他措手不及的一顿老拳。
The new product caught their competitors flat-footed.
Tāmen de xīn chǎnpǐn lìng jìngzhēng duìshǒu cuòshǒubùjí。
他们的新产品令竞争对手措手不及。

Having lost 300,000 worth of cash cheques, he is at a loss as to how to conduct himself.
他手足无措地站在舞台上，忘了该如何去表演。

Zhèngfǔ yǐ cǎiqǔ yìxiē cuòshī fángzhǐ jítuán xiāofèi zēngzhǎngguòkuài。
The government has taken measures to avoid excessive rapid increase in institutional spending.

强制措施
qiángzhì cuòshī
compulsory (or mandatory) measure

emergency measure

这些措施都着眼于建立一支庞大的科技队伍。

All these measures are aimed at building a huge contingent of scientists and technicians.
新制定的改革措施遭到了保守派的强烈反对。
Xīn zhìdìng de gǎigé cuòshī zāodào le bǎoshǒupài de qiángliè fǎnduì。
The newly-formulated reform measures met with fierce opposition from conservatives.
此项措施对改进工作大有裨补。
Cǐ xiàng cuòshī duì gǎijìn gōngzuò dàyǒu bìbǔ。
This measure is of great benefit to the improvement of the job.
他提出了各项补苴罅漏的措施，却迟迟得不到贯彻。
Tā tíchū le gè xiàng bǔjūxiàlòu de cuòshī，què chíchí débúdào guànchè。
The remedy measures he proposed were not carried out yet.

Chájiǎn yùhuìzhě suíshēn wùpǐn shì zhècì dàhuì de ānquán cuòshī zhīyī。
One of the safety precautions for this meeting is to check the attendants\' accompanying articles.
这种病的传染性极大，病人必须采取隔离措施。
Zhèzhǒng bìng de chuánrǎnxìng jídà，bìngrén bìxū cǎiqǔ gélí cuòshī。
This is a highly infectious disease. All the patients must be put under quarantine.
控制传染病的根本措施是切断传染源。
Kòngzhì chuánrǎnbìng de gēnběn cuòshī shì qiēduàn chuánrǎnyuán。
The fundamental measure for controlling infectious diseases is to cut the source of infection.
分封制是西周王朝巩固统治的重要措施。
Fēnfēngzhì shì Xī Zhōu wángcháo gǒnggù tǒngzhì de zhòngyào cuòshī。
The system of enfeoffment was one of the major measures adopted by the Western Zhou dynasty to consolidate its power.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
这座龟趺已经裂了，我们应该尽快采取措施保护上面的石碑。
Zhèzuò guīfū yǐjing liè le，wǒmen yīnggāi jìnkuài cǎiqǔ cuòshī bǎohù shàngmiàn de shíbēi。
There is a crack on the base. We should take measures to protect the stone tablet on it as soon as possible.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。

In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
由于我们提前采取了措施，因此这次溃堤没有造成什么损失！

We had adopted advance measures, so the burst dam didn\'t cause any damage.
黄河马上就要溃口了，要赶快采取防护措施！

The Yellow river will break soon; we should take protective measures as soon as possible.
我们的社会老龄人数越来越多，政府应该采取措施来保障老年人的生活。
Wǒmen de shèhuì lǎolíng rénshù yuèláiyuè duō，zhèngfǔ yīnggāi cǎiqǔ cuòshī lái bǎozhàng lǎoniánrén de shēnghuó。
There are more and more old people in society; the government should take measures to secure their lives.
对于他这样的死顽固，就得采取强制措施。
Duìyú tā zhèyàng de sǐ wángù，jiù děi cǎiqǔ qiángzhì cuòshī。
We have to take strong measures against him, he is as stubborn as a mule.
由于防病措施到位，今年晚造作物获得大丰收。
Yóuyú fángbìng cuòshī dàowèi，jīnnián wǎnzào zuòwù huòdé dàfēngshōu。
Having done well in preventing diseases, we had a successful harvest of late-grown crops.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。
Yīshēng zhèngzài cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī fángzhǐ fāshēng wēi xiàng。
The doctors are taking effective measures to prevent medical crises.

Xìngjiēchù shí cǎiqǔ bǎohù cuòshī kěyǐ yǒuxiào fángzhǐ àizībìng de chuánbō。
Taking protective measures while having sexual contact can effectively prevent AIDS from spreading.
我们国家正在采取有效措施保护原生林。
Wǒmen guójiā zhèngzài cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshēnglín。
Our country is taking effective measures to protect the primeval forest.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yào cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshǐlín，fángzhǐ shēngtài zāodào pòhuài。
We should take effective measures to protect the primitive forest and prevent the ecology from damage.
为了树木的健康成长，治虫是最主要的预防措施。
Wèile shùmù de jiànkāng chéngcháng，zhìchóng shì zuì zhǔyào de yùfáng cuòshī。
Wiping out insects is the main precautionary measure to keep trees growing healthily.
我们必须采取补救措施。
Wǒmen bìxū cǎiqǔ bǔjiùcuòshī。
We must adopt remedial measures.

The government is adopting urgent measures to prevent the spread of disease.

那个转弯处太危险了，他们应该对此采取点儿措施。

我的牙很不好，应该采取点儿措施了。

应该采取点儿什么措施来制止这场争论。

根据具体的形势可能会考虑采取几步相应措施。

为了确保家人的安全，你可以采取以下五大预防措施。

这些改进措施使中文课程更加完善。
In effect the government has increased security at their border.
事实上，政府已经在边界加强了安全措施。
Emergency call boxes are a mainstay in shopping center security, allowing shoppers to request help by simply picking up the receiver.

It\'s probably just a cost cutting measure.
这很可能只是为削减成本采取的措施。

measures to help developing nations
用以帮助发展中国家的措施
unprotected sex
无防范措施的性行为
unsafe sex
无防范措施的性行为

这些准备措施最后被证明是没有用的。

我们必须采取措施应对即将到来的台风。

Major improvements have been made to raise the engine efficiency.
已经采取了重大措施来提高发动机的效率。
There are five main precautions you can take to make your home safe.
为了确保家人的安全，你可以采取以下五大预防措施。
The new administration\'s large tax cut was highly controversial.
Xīn yí rèn zhèngfǔ de dàfú jiǎnshuì cuòshī shì gāodù yǒu zhēngyì de。
新一任政府的大幅减税措施是高度有争议的。
The socialist president introduced many popular reforms.
这名来自社会党的总统引进了很多大受欢迎的改革措施。
My brain is often at a loss to translate smells into words.
Zài yòng yǔyán biǎodá xiùjué shí，wǒ de dànǎo jīngcháng bùzhīsuǒcuò。
在用语言表达嗅觉时，我的大脑经常不知所措。
Emergency call boxes are a mainstay in shopping center security, allowing shoppers to request help by simply picking up the receiver.
紧急求助电话是大商场的主要安全措施，消费者只需拿起电话即可求助。
Our budget will only be insignificantly affected by these new cuts.
Zhǐyǒu zhèxiē xīn de xiāojiǎn cuòshī cáihuì wǒmen de yùsuàn chǎnshēng zhòngdà yǐngxiǎng。
只有这些新的消减措施才会我们的预算产生重大影响。
Our budget will be significantly affected by these new cuts.
Zhèxiē xīn de xiāojiǎn cuòshī duì wǒmen de yùsuàn bú huì zàochéng hěn dà yǐngxiǎng de。
这些新的消减措施对我们的预算不会造成很大影响的。
We can find great difference in wording and style of the two authors by contrasting their works.
通过对这两个作者的措辞和文风的比较，我们可以看出很大的区别。
The large machine was railed off as a safety precaution.
Dàxíng jīxiè yào yòng wéilán gékāi，zuòwéi ānquán yùfáng cuòshī。
大型机械要用围栏隔开，作为安全预防措施。
It seems ungenerous to end this review of a splendid work of scholarship on a critical note.
Yǐ pīpíngxìng cuòcí jiéshù duì zhè bù huīhuáng xuéshù zhùzuò de pínglùn sìhū yǒuxiē búgòu dàdù。
以批评性措辞结束对这部辉煌学术著作的评论似乎有些不够大度。
More than half of the original wetlands in the continent of the United States have disappeared in the name of reclamation, disease prevention, and flood control.
在美国大陆，已经有超过一半以上的原始湿地由于废料回收、疾病预防、以及防洪措施而消失了。
措辞强硬
cuòcí qiángyìng 
strongly worded
措辞不当
cuòcí bú dàng 
inappropriate wording
措辞严厉
cuòcí yánlì 
couched in harsh terms
措辞强硬
cuòcí qiángyìng 
strongly worded
从本质上说，我们的建议没有什么两样，只是措辞不同。
Cóng běnzhì shàng shuō，wǒmen de jiànyì méiyǒu shénme liǎngyàng，zhǐshì cuòcí bùtóng。
Substantially speaking, our suggestions are not different. We have just adopted different diction.
听说自己被公司辞退了，他爽然不知所措。
Tīngshuō zìjǐ bèi gōngsī cítuì le，tā shuǎngrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing that he was fired by the company, he was totally at a loss.
He preferred his erroneous but pleasing mumpsimus to the correct sumpsimus.
Yǔ jīngguò jiūzhèng de zhèngquè cuòcí xiāngbǐ，tā gèng xǐhuan tā de bú zhèngquè dàn què shǐ rén gǎndào yǒuqù de cuòcí。
与经过纠正的正确措辞相比，他更喜欢他的不正确但却使人感到有趣的措辞。
The barb of his wit made us wince.
他说话措辞的尖刻使我们畏避。

当心你的措辞！

措辞
strong language
激烈的措辞

May sat down, taking time to relax and frame her words carefully.

The words and tune were impressed on our minds forever.
Cuòcí hé yǔdiào shǐ wǒmen yǒngyuǎn míngjì。
措辞和语调使我们永远铭记。
You should pick your words carefully before you speak.
Shuōhuà zhīqián，nǐ gāi cuòcí jǐnshèn yìdiǎn。

He scrambled for the right words in his head.
Tā jiǎojìn-nǎozhī xiǎngzhe cuòcí。

His strange turns of phrase evoked no response.
Tā qíguài de cuòcí bìng méiyǒu yǐnqǐ rènhé fǎnyìng。

His words echoed john f. Kennedy.

他的措辞模仿了肯尼迪的演讲。
Accepted two or three verbal and rhetorical changes I suggested.
Jiēshòule wǒ suǒ jiànyì de liǎng-sān gè cuòcí hé xiūcí xiūgǎi。
接受了我所建议的两三个措辞和修辞修改。
He had trouble phrasing his interrogations.
Tā zài wènxún zhōng yùdàole cuòcí wèntí。
他在问询中遇到了措辞问题。

cuòcí wǎnzhuǎn

The newly-formulated reform measures met with fierce opposition from conservatives.

This measure is of great benefit to the improvement of the job.
他提出了各项补苴罅漏的措施，却迟迟得不到贯彻。
Tā tíchū le gè xiàng bǔjūxiàlòu de cuòshī，què chíchí débúdào guànchè。
The remedy measures he proposed were not carried out yet.
查检与会者随身物品是这次大会的安全措施之一。
Chájiǎn yùhuìzhě suíshēn wùpǐn shì zhècì dàhuì de ānquán cuòshī zhīyī。
One of the safety precautions for this meeting is to check the attendants\' accompanying articles.
这种病的传染性极大，病人必须采取隔离措施。
Zhèzhǒng bìng de chuánrǎnxìng jídà，bìngrén bìxū cǎiqǔ gélí cuòshī。
This is a highly infectious disease. All the patients must be put under quarantine.
控制传染病的根本措施是切断传染源。
Kòngzhì chuánrǎnbìng de gēnběn cuòshī shì qiēduàn chuánrǎnyuán。
The fundamental measure for controlling infectious diseases is to cut the source of infection.
他匆卒到来，我有些措手不及。
Tā cōngzú dàolái，wǒ yǒuxiē cuòshǒubùjí。
His unexpected arrival has taken me by surprise.
开业典礼所需要的东西，我替你措办。

I will make preparations for whatever needed for the opening ceremony for you.
他的行文措词恰当，有理有据。
Tā de xíngwén cuòcí qiàdāng，yǒulǐ yǒujù。
His article is written with appropriate wording and adequate reasoning and proofs.
他在会上的讲话，措词强硬。
Tā zài huì shàng de jiǎnghuà，cuòcí qiángyìng。
His speech at the meeting was strongly worded.
这些措举并不能解决燃眉之急。
Zhèxiē cuòjǔ bìng bùnéng jiějué ránméizhījí。
These measures can not solve the urgent problems.
世界各国都有各自的反腐倡廉的法律和举措。
shìjiègèguó dōu yǒu gèzì de fǎnfǔchànglián de fǎlǜ hé jǔcuò。
Each country has its own anti-corruption laws and regulations.
分封制是西周王朝巩固统治的重要措施。
Fēnfēngzhì shì Xī Zhōu wángcháo gǒnggù tǒngzhì de zhòngyào cuòshī。
The system of enfeoffment was one of the major measures adopted by the Western Zhou dynasty to consolidate its power.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
这座龟趺已经裂了，我们应该尽快采取措施保护上面的石碑。
Zhèzuò guīfū yǐjing liè le，wǒmen yīnggāi jìnkuài cǎiqǔ cuòshī bǎohù shàngmiàn de shíbēi。
There is a crack on the base. We should take measures to protect the stone tablet on it as soon as possible.
听到皇帝的诏令以后，他感到惶惶然不知所措。
Tīngdào huángdì de zhàolìng yǐhòu，tā gǎndào huánghuángrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing the order of the Emperor, he felt panic and didn\'t know what to do.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
由于我们提前采取了措施，因此这次溃堤没有造成什么损失！
Yóuyú wǒmen tíqián cǎiqǔ le cuòshī，yīncǐ zhècì kuìdī méiyǒu zàochéng shénme sǔnshī！
We had adopted advance measures, so the burst dam didn\'t cause any damage.
黄河马上就要溃口了，要赶快采取防护措施！
Huáng Hé mǎshàng jiùyào kuìkǒu le，yào gǎnkuài cǎiqǔ fánghù cuòshī！
The Yellow river will break soon; we should take protective measures as soon as possible.
我们的社会老龄人数越来越多，政府应该采取措施来保障老年人的生活。
Wǒmen de shèhuì lǎolíng rénshù yuèláiyuè duō，zhèngfǔ yīnggāi cǎiqǔ cuòshī lái bǎozhàng lǎoniánrén de shēnghuó。
There are more and more old people in society; the government should take measures to secure their lives.
听说要交一万元的学费才能被这学校录取，农村来的考生们都楞乎乎地不知所措。
Tīngshuō yào jiāo yíwàn yuán de xuéfèi cáinéng bèi zhè xuéxiào lùqǔ，nóngcūn lái de kǎoshēngmen dōu lénghūhū de bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing that they won\'t be accepted by the school unless they pay 10000 yuan, the examinees from the country were all bemused and didn\'t know what to do.
从本质上说，我们的建议没有什么两样，只是措辞不同。
Cóng běnzhì shàng shuō，wǒmen de jiànyì méiyǒu shénme liǎngyàng，zhǐshì cuòcí bùtóng。
Substantially speaking, our suggestions are not different. We have just adopted different diction.
他手足无措地站在舞台上，忘了该如何去表演。
Tā shǒuzúwúcuò de zhànzài wǔtái shàng，wàng le gāi rúhé qù biǎoyǎn。
He stood on the stage, and was at a loss at how to perform.
听说自己被公司辞退了，他爽然不知所措。
Tīngshuō zìjǐ bèi gōngsī cítuì le，tā shuǎngrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing that he was fired by the company, he was totally at a loss.
对于他这样的死顽固，就得采取强制措施。
Duìyú tā zhèyàng de sǐ wángù，jiù děi cǎiqǔ qiángzhì cuòshī。
We have to take strong measures against him, he is as stubborn as a mule.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。
He came at me with full force, so I was caught unprepared.

The leader of a local army acted as an organizer, communicator, fund-raiser, and rule-maker.
由于防病措施到位，今年晚造作物获得大丰收。

Having done well in preventing diseases, we had a successful harvest of late-grown crops.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。

The doctors are taking effective measures to prevent medical crises.
由于弄丢了三十万现金支票，他一时急得无所措手足。

Our country is taking effective measures to protect the primeval forest.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。

take precautionary measures
不采取相应的措施，计划就会架空。
bùcǎiqǔ xiāngyīng de cuòshī，jìhuà jiùhuì jiàkōng。
Unless we adopt the necessary measures the plan will come to nothing.
随着工业的发展，对环境保护也采取了相应的措施。
Suí zhe gōngyè de fāzhǎn，duì huánjìngbǎohù yě cǎiqǔ le xiāngyìng de cuòshī。
With the development of industry, appropriate measures have been taken to protect the environment.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
政府采取了一系列措施治理大气污染。
Zhèngfǔ cǎiqǔle yíxìliè cuòshī zhìlǐ dàqìwūrǎn。
The government has adopted a series of measures to combat air pollution.
采取正本清源的措施
cǎiqǔ zhèngběnqīngyuán de cuòshī 
take measures for thorough-going reform
采取措施，抑止油价抬升。
采取措施减少亏蚀。
采取措施防止天牛侵害树木。
面临变局，要采取应急措施。
采取防患措施。
采取断然措施
采取防暴措施
菜地要采取防冻措施
发现疫情应立即采取隔离措施
采取果断措施
超高建筑物要采取减震措施。
采取强制措施。
采取相应的措施。
采取强有力的措施。
take measures to stop him
采取措施制止他
to take measures to do sth
[frm] 采取措施以应对某事
to take steps to do sth
[fig] 采取措施做某事
The law enforcement department should implement measures to prevent people from being arrested based on race.
法律实施部门将会采取措施避免有人因种族问题被捕。
We must take improvements to stream the forceline.
我们应当采取措施精简警力。

我们必须采取措施应对即将到来的台风。

人们敦促政府采取措施保护环境。
I \'m trying to take steps to cancel the transaction.
Wǒ shìtú cǎiqǔ cuòshī qǔxiāo jiāoyì。
我试图采取措施取消交易。
He took measures to insure the territorial unity of Croatia.
Tā cǎiqǔ cuòshī bǎozhèng Kèluódìyà de lǐngtǔ wánzhěng。
他采取措施保证克罗地亚的领土完整。
Great care is taken to keep the operating rooms aseptic.
Hěnxiǎo xīndì cǎiqǔ cuòshī lái bǎochí shǒushùshì de wújūn zhuàngtài。
很小心地采取措施来保持手术室的无菌状态。
The ship\'s rapid rate of closing gave them little time to avoid a collision.
Chuán kàojìn de sùdù tài kuài，méiyǒu gěi tāmen liúxià cǎiqǔ cuòshī bìmiǎn pèngzhuàng de shíjiān。
船靠近的速度太快，没有给他们留下采取措施避免碰撞的时间。
It\'s probably just a cost cutting measure.
这很可能只是为削减成本采取的措施。
Clearly, both partners adopted measures to remain together.

很明显，双方都采取了措施以保持继续合作。
to resort to harsh measure
采取生硬措施
to subscribe to certain measures
同意采取某种措施

茫然不知所措
mánɡrán bùzhīsuǒcuò
be at a complete loss what to do

遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。

When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
不知所措
如堕云雾(比喻迷惑不解，不知所措)
惶急不知所措。
听到这个不幸的消息，他爽然不知所措。
骇然不知所措。
茫然不知所措。
搔头摸耳，不知所措。

把人看得不知所措

安全措施
ānquán cuòshī 
safety measures

受骗
shòupiàn
be taken in; be deceived

Don\'t trust him, he always makes up stories to get others\' compassion.
他骗取了上级的信任。
Tā piànqǔle shàngjí de xìnrèn.
He wormed his way into his boss\'s confidence.
你骗取不了我的同情。
Nǐ piànqǔ bù liǎo wǒ de tóngqíng.
You can\'t trick me into sympathizing with you.
他冒充记者招摇撞骗，诈取了不少钱财。
Tā màochōng jìzhě zhāoyáo zhuàngpiàn，zhàqǔ le bùshǎo qiáncái。
He pretended to be a journalist, and swindled lots of money.

to lie oneself into office

to cheat sb out of sth

为了骗取他的继承权，他们什么都做的出来。
He lied us into war and thousands into early graves.
Tā piànqǔ wǒmen de xìnrèn，ràng wǒmen juǎnrù zhànzhēng，chéngqiānshàngwàn de niánqīng shēngmìng jiùcǐ wánjié。
他骗取我们的信任，让我们卷入战争，成千上万的年轻生命就此完结。
He swindled me out of my inheritance.

他骗取了我的遗产。
Paying blacks less and charging them more is a form of victimization.
Shǎo gěi hēirén bàochóu ér duō xiàng tāmen suǒqǔ shì yì zhǒng qīpiàn。
少给黑人报酬而多向他们索取是一种欺骗。

当我被控骗税时，这个律师为我提供了咨询。
他想骗人，却先被人家骗了，真是搬起石头砸自己的脚。
Tā xiǎng piànrén，què xiān bèi rénjia piàn le，zhēnshì bānqǐ shítou zá zìjǐ de jiǎo。
He wanted to cheat others, but was cheated by others; he was really hoist by his own petard.
这些骗子都是冒称自己是银行职工进行诈骗的。

社区的流氓团伙总是使用这种下三烂的手段骗吃骗喝！

他坑蒙拐骗，无恶不做，迟早是要进监狱的！
Tā kēngméng guǎipiàn，wúè búzuò，chízǎo shì yào jìn jiānyù de！
He will be imprisoned sooner or later for committing swindles and every crime imaginable.
老大妈心地太善良了，让骗子有了可乘之机。

Aunty is too kindhearted for the cheater to have a chance.

When struggling with wily cheaters, we need not only ability and wisdom but also boldness and equanimity.
这件事情你一定要临机应变，千万不能被骗。
Zhèjiàn shìqing nǐ yídìng yào línjīyìngbiàn，qiānwàn bùnéng bèi piàn。
As for this matter, you must play to the score and not be cheated.
这件事情你是瞒骗不过去的，还不如早些承认吧。

他骗腿骑车的动作很麻利。

He passed himself off as a professor to go about cheating people.

Long ago, he was abducted to labor in foreign countries.
他不想再欺骗别人，于是把整个事情搬到桌面儿上说清楚了。

He doesn\'t want to deceive others any more. Therefore, he put the whole incident on the table and made things clear to everybody.
不要被阴阳先生的话唬住啊，那都是骗人的！

He used to kite checks.
他曾用空头支票骗过钱。
He keeps giving me that line about not being able to do any work because his computer isn\'t working properly.
他总骗我说他的电脑坏了，不能工作。

如果你穿得像个游客，在市场里就会成被骗的目标。
Check fraud can leave victims hundreds of pounds out of pocket.
支票诈骗会使受害者损失几百英镑。
She played a really nasty trick on her ex-boyfriend and told him that she is pregnant!
她以各种无耻的手段欺骗前男友，告诉他自己怀孕了。
Tom tricked young girls, claiming that he would make them super models.
汤姆欺骗年轻女孩，声称自己可以让她们成为超级名模。
They were trying to put one over on us and they would no longer get away with it.
他们总是想花言巧语地骗我们，但是他们以后休想再得逞了。
He\'s selling his girlfriend short.
他欺骗了自己的女朋友。
I let him snow me with his big-name band.
我让他吹嘘的“大牌”乐队给骗了。
The embattled administration is facing a blanket indictment from the media for defrauding the public.
这个陷入窘境的政府部门将因欺骗公众而面临媒体铺天盖地的指控。
She was fooled by his words.
她被他的话骗了。

你真是个大骗子。你说什么我都不信。

陪审团证明他未犯诈骗罪。
It is not fair the way you\'ve been done by the company.
公司这么骗你太不公平了。
to feel cheated
感到受骗上当
to cheat sb out of sth
骗取某人的某物
to con sb into doing sth
骗某人去做某事
to deceive sb into doing sth
骗某人去做某事
to denounce sb as a traitor/impostor
痛斥某人是叛徒/骗子
a dirty tricks campaign
大骗局
tax fiddle
骗税
you can\'t fool me
你骗不了我
you\'ve been had!
你被骗了！
to take sb for a ride
[fig] 欺骗某人
I wasn\'t going to be taken in by his charm.
我不会被他的魅力所蒙骗。
to pull the wool over sb\'s eyes
蒙骗某人
Her apparent indifference didn\'t deceive me.
她外表的冷漠没有骗到我。
That looks like funny money to me.
我觉得那钱像是骗来的。

在护照和驾照中嵌入微型芯片能有效减少假冒身份进行的诈骗。

杰克发现自己被骗了后暴跳如雷。

竟然被他骗了五年 你还真够蠢的。

我以为他真想做生意，但我被骗了。他卷了我的钱跑了。

我必须承认， 想到我要做欺骗这个诚实君子的工具，心里的确很难过。

他欺骗人, 气得她把他大骂了一顿。

我估计他不过是个骗子。

我揭发了他的诈骗伎俩，并悄悄的报了警。

我和他都不是骗子。

这起诈骗案对这家公司的声誉造成了极大的损失。

这个诈骗犯靠贿赂法官而免于被起诉。

他的欺骗给我们的生活造成了严重破坏。
He purposely deceived his friends and family.
Tā yǒuyì qīpiànle tā de péngyou hé jiārén。
他有意欺骗了他的朋友和家人。

Tā xiāngxìn tā shì Shìjièshàng zuìhòu yí gè mēngpiàn tā de rén。

Tā kěnqiú tā búyào zài qīpiàn tā le。

Zhèyàng de huāzhāo zhǐnéng qīpiàn nàxiē zuì róngyì qīngxìn de rén。
这样的花招只能欺骗那些最容易轻信的人。
Always before he had been able to outwit his pursuers.
Tā zǒngshì nénggòu mánpiànguò zhuīgǎn tā de rén。
他总是能够瞒骗过追赶他的人。
How did you ever fall for a shtik like that?
Nǐ shìfǒu céng bèi nàyàng de guǐjì suǒ qīpiàn？
你是否曾被那样的诡计所欺骗？
He could see through the indirections of diplomats.
Tā nénggòu kànchuān wàijiāo qīpiàn。
他能够看穿外交欺骗。
They tried to sell me a bill of goods about a secondhand car.
Tāmen shìtú piàn wǒ mǎi yí liàng èrshǒuchē。
他们试图骗我买一辆二手车。
The immigrant was duped because he trusted everyone.
Zhè míng yímín bèi piànle，yīnwèi tā shuí dōu xìn。
这名移民被骗了，因为他谁都信。
I told him, quite untruthfully, that I had just returned from leave.
Wǒ piàn tā shuō wǒ gānggāng xiūjià huílái。
我骗他说我刚刚休假回来。
The cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change.
Zhè míng shōuyínyuán shǎozhǎo língqián，xiǎngpiàn wǒ de qián。
这名收银员少找零钱，想骗我的钱。
He spoke gloatingly about people he had cheated out of their money.
Tā zhānzhānzìxǐ de tán qǐ nàxiē céng bèi tā piànguò qián de rén。
他沾沾自喜地谈起那些曾被他骗过钱的人。
She had willfully deceived me.
Tā xùyì qīpiànle wǒ。
她蓄意欺骗了我。
He was snookered by the con-man\'s smooth talk.

他被骗子天衣无缝的谈话蒙住了。
I was victimized by this con-man.

我上了这个骗子的当。
He is implicated in the scheme to defraud the government.
Tā juǎnrùle zhè qǐ qīpiàn zhèngfǔ de yīnmóu。
他卷入了这起欺骗政府的阴谋。
Less scrupulous producers sent bundles that were deceptive in appearance.

The blue wall cracked when some officers refused to take part in the cover-up.
Dāng mǒuxiē jǐngguān jùjué yǎnshì shí，jǐngfāng piànrén de huǎngyán biàn bùgōngzìpò le。
当某些警官拒绝掩饰时，警方骗人的谎言便不攻自破了。
He cozened the money out of the old man.
Tā piànle zhège lǎorén de qián。
他骗了这个老人的钱。

他欺骗教授，使教授误认为他很熟悉这门学科。
Armed with permeative irony...he punctures affectations.
Miànduì mímàn de fěngcì，tā jiēlùle zhège piànjú。
面对弥漫的讽刺，他揭露了这个骗局。
It was all a snare and delusion.

这股怪味是那块焦烂的塑料发出的。

The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
这个枕头表面看来很漂亮，内瓤却是破烂的棉花！
Zhège zhěntóu biǎomiàn kànlái hěnpiàoliàng，nèiráng quèshì pòlàn de miánhuā！
The pillow appears beautiful, but the inside is filled with rotten cotton.

He leads a dissipated and corrupt life and sleeps with a prostitute every so often.
管理严格的小区，收破烂儿的人是进不来的。
